1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa ka la tan+t+ran+ta sa b+ha bA 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): sany+tso ta ni shrI gu h+ya sid+d+hiM nA maH/ bod skad du/ rgyud ma lus pa'i 
1b3(rgyud 'grel): du chu pal ga// dngam pa ma 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang 'jig rten spyod pa dag las rnam grol ma// gang 
2a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig rtag 'byung zhi la rgyal ba dam pa khyu mchog rnams kyis phyag byas bsam gtan dang bral ba/ 
2a3(rgyud 'grel): ci yang rung ba'i gnas gyur dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sku yi dam pa rnam dag nang gi bdag nyid kyis 
2a4(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal nas// go 'phang mchog tu 'gro ba tshol byed pho nya mchog gyur sangs rgyas thob 
2a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyur gyur cing // spyod pa sna tshogs dang 'brel rtsod pa'i dri ma'i bgegs kyis byas pa'i g.yeng 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): ba spong byed pa'i// dngos grub rnams kyi skyes rgyal ba rnams kyi yon tan brgya phrag mang po'i gnas gyur ma lta bu// mchog tu legs spyod thar pa ster byed rin chen gyur pa dpal ldan gsang ba 
2b2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa bshad// yon tan dpag med gzhir gyur pa// mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyi sku// gang gi spyod yul las 'das pa// dang por bde chen phyag byas nas// gsang ba grub pa bla med pa// sgrub pa po la 
2b3(rgyud 'grel): pan gdags phyir// sems ni snying rje'i dbang gyur pas// pad+ma rdo rje bdag gis bshad// rgud gzhan du ma nyid du yang // sangs rgyas mgon pos ma gsungs pa// nges pa'i man ngag dang ldan pas// 
2b4(rgyud 'grel): de ni da ltar bdag gis bshad// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'bad pa thams cad spang bar bya// bskyed pa mang zhing ring ba dang // dang po'i las can bsgom pa'i phyir// rgyud kyi dam pa'i dngos brten 
2b5(rgyud 'grel): nas// dngos grub bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid can// bsgom pa yi ni bar chad can// rgyas pa thams cad nam spangs la// sangs rgyas dngos grub legs ster ba// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// 
2b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba grub pa bla med pa// bzang pos mdor bsdus bshad par bya// dge 'byung nyon mongs med pa dang // bgegs rnams thams cad 'jigs mdzad cing // dngos grub kun gyi rten gyur pa// yid bzhin 
2b7(rgyud 'grel): nor bu mchog lta bu// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed cing // g.yeng ba'i dgra rnams 'joms byed pa// don rnams thams cad grub byed pa// mngon par byang chub mtshan nyid do// gang dang gang der gnas na 
2b8(rgyud 'grel): yang // thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yis// bsgom pa dag la rab gnas na// sgrub po gang de dngos grub 'gyur// sbas pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pas// tshes rnams dang yang 'gal med par// rdor 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum dbye ru med gzugs can// byang chub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dus kyis nges pa yongs spangs nas// bla med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// srog chags gsod cing khro ba/ 
3a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // gang yang khro ba'i las dga' zhing // rdzun gyi tshig gis spros pa yis// mi gang rmongs pas 'tsho ba yi// mi de dag kyang myur bar 'dir// spyod pa 'dis ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan gyi chung ma spyod pa dang // 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi nor la rku ba dang // dman pa'i las can spang pa gang // rtag tu spyod par byed pa dang // gang la spyod pas 'dod khams kyi// steng gi pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur// sbas pa'i rdul zhugs ngo bo nyid// sgrub pa po 
3a4(rgyud 'grel): la bdag gis brjod// gsang ba'i spyod pa mchog bzang po// dngos grub kun ster thabs bcas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gang yin// tshe 'dis la las thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mchog tu zhi ba nyer// 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs pa'i gnas// thob par 'dod pas mchog zhi pa// gsang ba grub pas bsgrub par bya// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor nyid// de nyid ldan pas bsgom par bya// gzhan du 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid dman pas ni// dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro// de nyid brtags pa rnams las gzhan// khyad par thams cad rnam spangs shing // mtshan ma med cing snang ba med// gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba 
3a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid// lung dang bstan bcos lugs rim pas// ji srid rtog pa dang bcas pas// de srid bar du rgyas 'gyur te// chu la 'bru mar thim pa bzhin// re zhig rtogs des dgos med cho ga/ rnam rtog sna tshogs 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yi// brtan bcos de nyid tshol mi dgos// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo nyid// dang por de nyid shes byas la// de nyid bsgrub phyir nyes gnas bya// de nas bsgom la 'bad pa yis// nyams su myong ba 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya// de nyid gsal bar gyur sems kyis// phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad// rig pa dang ldan brtul zhugs kyang // de yi rjes la spyad par bya// gcig pu brtan pa'i sems kyis ni// gsang ba'i spyod pa 
3b2(rgyud 'grel): spyad nas ni// de ni mthar thug skyes gyur nas// phyi nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// gzhan du de nyid dman pa yi// 'tsho ba'i rgyu can nyid gyur pa// dmyal ba 'thob par byed pa'i rgyu// brtul zhugs kyis ni ci zhig bya// 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): grub po de nyid la gnas pas// brtul zhugs med par 'grub par 'gyur// brtul zhugs brgya phrag la spyad kyang // de nyid dman na 'grub mi 'gyur// de nyid ldan na thams cad kyis// dri med de ni 'grub par 'gyur// 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub po sgom pa dang ldan zhing // sdig pa kun las rnam grol bas// brtul zhugs kyis ni chags med thob// dngos grub rgyal bas thob ma gsungs// dngos grub de nyid shes gyur nas// 'thob kyi brtul zhugs kyis// 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): ni min// chags pa kun las log gyur cing // slongs mo gtso bor bya ba ste// de tsam brtul zhugs kyis khyab 'gyur// de nyid spangs nas dngos grub med// 'bab stegs lha rten sbyin pa'ang min// khrus dang 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub de bzhin te// 'di kun bden pa ma yin gyi// 'di nyid gcig pu bden pa nyid// gnod pa skyed par byed pa yi// ngan pa'i las ngag sngon byas pas// de nyid dman pa'i lus can gyis// brtul zhugs ngo bo 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): ma lus myong // mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // srid par ngal bar byas pas kyang // de nyid ldan na 'grub 'gyur te// nor rnams phun tshogs bdag nyid kyi// de nyid rin chen sgom byed na// brtul zhugs med kyang
3b8(rgyud 'grel): de nyid ni// nges par bla na med par 'gro// lung gi spyod pa las gsungs pa'i// brtul zhugs gang zhig 'dir gnas pa// nor rnams srub par mi nus pas// 'tsho ba'i phyir ni brtag pa nyid// phung po lnga yi/ 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gzugs// rnam par shes pa'i gnir gyur ltar// de ltar de nyid ldan brtul zhugs// de nyid las ni 'jug par brtan// 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyu phyir dang // nor la sogs pa 
4a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub phyir dang // sems can don du de nyid bcas// bcugs zhugs zhal gyis bzhes pa yin// 'tsho ba yis ni thabs tsam du// so so'i skye bos gtsor byed pas// ji ltar mtshan ma'i che ba nyid// de nyid 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): bral na dngos grub med// nor gyi 'byor pa ldan pa'i bdag/ rtag tu bsgoms pas ngal byas pa'i// smyon pa'i gzugs nyid la brten cing // gsang ba grub par rnam gnas nas// de nyid rdo rje 'chang bla ma// bsgom dang 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan du de nyid ldan gyur kyang // dngos 'grub 'bras bu'i snong mi 'gyur// de ltar phyi rol yongs bcang la// de nyid tha med shes byas nas// sangs rgyas nyid du nges bya ste// blo ldan gas ba 
4a5(rgyud 'grel): grub par spyod// rnam par g.yeng ba kun gyi gzhi// brtul zhugs spangs shing de nyid shes// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya// de nyid de yang chud gnas pas// dpal ldan gsang 
4a6(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dus par gsal// spos pa du ma rgyas gyur pas// gzhan du sbas nas bstan pa yin// bya ba spyod pa'i dbye ba dang // mdo sde'i rje snod la sogs su// mchog tu dag pa gcig pu nyid// rnam pa du mar rnam par gnas/ 
4a7(rgyud 'grel): phung po rin chen snod nyid du// sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis// de nyid 'bad pas sra mdzad nas// sangs rgyas mgon pos rnam par bzhag/ byang chub sems mchog rnam par dag/ bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin 
4a8(rgyud 'grel): gyis// rang gi lus la rab gnas pa// de ni 'bad pas rig par bya// de nas spyod pa bya ba 'am// khyim du gnas te bsgom par bya// de nyid rin chen rnam dag bdag/ rtsod pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// thabs bzang 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): po ni rnam spangs nas// 'gal ba'i dam tshig la sogs la// gzhan du gang zhig sgrub gyur pa// de ni ngu 'bod sogs par 'tshed// ji ltar me ni 'bar gyur pa// de ni rtsa shing phung po dag/ bcug nas thal ba nyid du 'gyur// 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): myu gu sogs pa'ang 'byung mi 'gyur// de bzhin de nyid med bzhin du// ngo mtshar che ba ltar byed pa// ji srid nam mkha' gnas par du// shi ba'i 'og tu dmyal bar 'gro// ji ltar 'ga' zhig grul gdug la// 
4b3(rgyud 'grel): sman dang sngags sogs mi ldan par// rmongs pa bdag nyid gang rtse ba// gshin rje'i gnas 'gro 'dod pa yin// ji ltar mtha' med rgya mtsho la// gru med gzhan zhig 'jug 'gyur ba// thabs dang rten med 
4b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas ni// skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur// de bzhin dza yi mtha' can rmad// yang dag rab sbyin spangs gyur pa// smad cing dman pa'i las rnams ni// byas na mnar med 'gro bar 'gyur// rnyed dga'
4b5(rgyud 'grel): bla me go 'phang mchog/ de nyid ces byar mngon brjod pa// gang gis dag pa de thob pa// de yi thabs ni bdag gis brjod// bla ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin// gang gis gnyis su med par mthong // dngos grub bsdus pa'i 
4b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid can// de nyid de ni 'dir thob 'gyur// gang yang khro zhing nga rgyal can// bslus pa byis dang spros la dga'// 'dod cing chags pa'i sems can gang // gang las rnyed cing gang las min// g.yo 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): glus bla mar phyag byed cing // skyon rtog pa la ched du byed// brdzun pas nga rgyal gdug pa can// tshig gis rtsod la rtag tu gnas// rdo rje spun dang bla ma la// bslu ba'i bsam pa brtan pa can// sems can des ni 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kun// ster ba'i go 'phang de mi thob// 'dir ni 'di 'dra gzhan yang mthong // ji srid 'dod pa thob par du// phyag 'tshal mchod dang bsnyen bkur gyis// brtan par bla ma mnyes byas nas// go 'phang 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni thob nas ni// mdun nyid na ni gnas na yang // su zhig gang nas ji ltar 'ongs// rang bzhin ngan pas mi shes so// gcig pu mthong nas ring po nas// gus par phyag ni 'tshal byed cing // 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): de yang mang po'i nang du ni// bde bar byon nam tsam gyis phongs// de lta bu yi sems can gang // mya ngan 'das mchog go 'phad mchog/ yang dag gsung bas gang gsungs pa// de yi thob par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
5a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can 'di lta bu// bla ma smon dang dag kyang mthong // ngo tsha spangs shing spyod pa ring // yang dag rim pa sun 'byin pa// rgyud ni bsdu ba tsam nyid kyis// de yi dngos la kha phyir ltas// dbang bskur rjes gnad med par yang // / 
5a4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dag ni sdud par byed// glegs pam mthong bas dga' gyur nas// gsang sngags rang nyid len par byed// slob dpon las ni shes min pa// dam tshig spyod pa rnam par spangs// sems can rnams ni sdud pa na/ 
5a5(rgyud 'grel): glegs bam bka' yi byed pa yin// de nyid shes pa ma yin par// gang phyir yang dag gsungs pas brtan// de lta bu dang de dag nyid// kun kyang sdig pa'i las can de// dam pa min pa'i lam zhugs nas// dmyal ba 
5a6(rgyud 'grel): dag tu 'gro bar gcig/ sdug bsngal 'phongs dang nyon mongs dang // sna tshogs nad kyis bcos pa'i mthar// shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur// bde gshegs dngos grub 'dod na ni// 
5a7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig spyod pa spangs pa yis// sgrub dka' de dang lhan cig tu// gnas pa nyid du'ang mi bya'o// dngos po kun gyi slob dpon la// ji srid mnyes par gyur par du// lus ngag yid kyi brtan pa ru// dus ni ring por mnyes byed 
5a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// slob ma shin tu dri med pa'i// de nyid yang dag rab sbyin gnas// tha ma'i zhabs kyis bka' drin gyis// de nas bgegs med thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i dngos// de nyid rgyal po yangs pa ste// nyin dang mtshan du 
5b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pa yis// dngos grub myur du des 'thob 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyas gyur pa'i// dngos grub grub pa'i dbang po la// rgyud rnams du mar gsungs pa yi// bzlas dang sbyin bsreg brtul zhugs sogs// thun mtshams bzhi 
5b2(rgyud 'grel): yi cho ga yi// yul dang dkyil 'khor bri la sogs// kha dog gzugs sogs dbye ba yi// rig rnams su ni rnam brtags dang // khrus dang lha mchod sbyang ba dang // phyag rgya 'ching ba'i rigs de bzhin// sku gzugs la sogs cho ga dang / 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten las ni rgyas pa dang // de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// rnam rtog sna tshogs byed pa yi// grub pa sems can bsam rim bzhin// dpal 'byung ba yi mgon pos gsungs// de ltar rnam rtog 'bum phrag gi/ yang dag gsung ba 
5b4(rgyud 'grel): grub gsungs pa// der ni dngos grub gang 'grub pa 'am// 'on kyang 'dir ni de mi 'grub// lo gcig la sogs bskal pa dang // gcig dang gnyis su srid pI mthar// sgrub po gang gis 'grub 'gyur ba// chos kyi rnam grangs 
5b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gyur pa// skye ba grangs med du ma ru// bsgom la brtan ning chags med pas// sgrub pa'i dbang po grub pa ru// 'gyur bar gang zhig sngar gsungs pa// de ni re zhig 'dir mi dgos// thob par 'gyur ba dgos ma yin/ 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i bde ba las lhag pa'i// lus gdungs sdug bsngal gyis mi 'thob// dpal ldan 'dus pa zhes bya 'dir// spros pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan 'dus las mchog gzhan med// 'jig rten gsum gyi rin chen gyur// snying po las kyang snying po mchog/ rgyud kun gyis ni bla ma'i bla// bstan dang bshad pas rnam gnas pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor rim pa nyid// 'dus 
5b8(rgyud 'grel): pa gang gis mi shes pa// de yi dngos grub ji ltar 'grub// the tsom thams cad gcod byed cing // mi shes rab rib sel byed pa// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ dpal ldan 'dus pa yongs spangs nas// rnam rtog du mas 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa yis// rmongs pa dngos grub 'dod gyur pa// mkha' la khu tshur rdeg pa dang // smig rgyu'i tshul 'thung ba bzhin// dang po'i las can bsgom pa yi// spros pa'i rgyud rnams spang byas 
6a2(rgyud 'grel): shing // thabs dang shes rab shes byas nas// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par mnos// de phyir nges byas sems gcig pa// blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya// nyin dang mtshan du bsgom byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom 
6a3(rgyud 'grel): med// tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// 'di la smad pa bshad pa med// gnyis med ye shes dang ldan na// bde bar gshegs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// yon tan gter gyur rdo rje 'chang la dri med rdo rje gsum gyis rtag
6a4(rgyud 'grel): tu gus byas la// skye ba'i rgya mtsho sdig pa'i rlabs dag mang ldan pa la grub gyur gcig pu mchog/ gsang ba'i yon tan 'byung 'gyur dri ma bral zhing don kun sgrub cing rab tu sbyin par byed pa yi// rgyud nas gsungs pa'i 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): lam dang ldan pa'i sgrub po blo dang ldan pas deng nas bsnam par bya// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyis dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pas dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba dang brtul 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): zhugs dang de kho na nyid nges par bstan pa zhes pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // rgyud gzhan rim pa ma yin pa'i// cung zad sdus pa'i lam nyid las// gsang ba las byung sgrub pa'i thabs// de las yang dag bshad par bya// phyi rol de nyid bya ba'i 
6a7(rgyud 'grel): lam// shin tu ring ba kun spangs la// lugs bcas rnal 'byor rim pa yis// ji lta ba bzhin bdag gis brjod// slob dpon phal cher 'di skad brjod// dpal ldan 'dus pa mdangs chen gyi// rgyud kyi sdud par byed pa
6a8(rgyud 'grel): po// dpa' bo 'jig rten dbang phyug zer// tha ma zhabs kyi bka' dron gyis// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i sdang pa po// gzhan dag yod pa ma yin zhes// bdag nyid 'ba' zhig smra bar byed/ rlung mngang pa ni thugs rje che/ 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung ba po de brjod pa'ang de// de las gzhan dag yod min pas// bde chen las gzhan gsung ba med// 'di skad zos pa'i tshig gang dang // bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig gnas pa// thugs kyi rdo rje bdag nyid kyis// 
6b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun la bstad pa yin// dpal ldan pa de chen mgon po yis// bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig bzang por// de ltar bzang po gang bstan pa// de bzhin bdag gis nung zhig brjod// dus gcig mchog tu mdor bstan/ 
6b3(rgyud 'grel): pa// gang che gtso bos gsungs pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyung bden don// bde ba chen po bdag nyid rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyis// rlung don bden pa de thos nas// 'dar zhing 'jigs pa dang ldan pas// dbang phyug 
6b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog la de nyid zhus// dpa' bo chos nyid 'di lta bu// gtso bo gsung bar dka' ba gsung // sangs rgyas kun kyang thams cad du// shin tu 'jigs pa skyed byed pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// shin tu gas pa 'byed par
6b5(rgyud 'grel): byed// chos kun mnyam cing gcig pa nyid// gang yin gtso bo khyed kyis gsungs// 'di sang brjod par gyur pa na// sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad kyang // 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur nas kyang // byang chub sems ni 
6b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs la bzhag/ e ma 'o gsang ba las gsang ba// rdo rje theg pa'i bshad pa 'di// ngo bo med cing dag zur la// gang las dpe yang yod min pas// sangs rgyas thams cad brgyal gyur pa// rdo rje sems dpas de gzigs 
6b7(rgyud 'grel): nas// bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyang // ting 'dzin bzang po la gnas nas// de nas sangs rgyas rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i snyoms 'jug sbyor ba mdzad// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyi// 'jam po'i gsung gis gsung 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad// kye kye rgyal ba thams cad gzigs// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin// gang du lus ngag sems med pa// der ni gzugs su rab tu mthong // byang chub sems kyi sbyor ba yis// ji srid 'bang pas 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas shes pa// chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid// shes rab rang gi dngos de sring // kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis// spros pa med cing dag pa las// 'di dag/ 
7a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam par 'phrul// mchog tu shis shing rnam ngag gang // sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa'i// brjod min kun la khyab par gnas// thams cad de yi rnam 'phrul yin// bzang po de nyid gnas pa yang // mkha' dbyings 
7a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'i sgrib bral la// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis// sems can kun gyi bde 'byung byed// rnam dag shes rab lus las byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhi ba// lha rdzas chos 'byung mi 'gyur ba// blo yis de ni bdag 
7a4(rgyud 'grel): gis brten// e'i dbyang bzang po la// dbus su bgis rnam par brgyan// bde ba kun gyi gnas gyur pas// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ rlud kyis dang por gang gnas pa// dbyir do ni bshad par bya// dpa' bo ba chen 
7a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di skad du// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gsungs// gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi tshul dag gis// gnas shing dngos grub bzang ster ba// shes rab ces bya'i ming gi gnas// de la gnas pa gang 
7a6(rgyud 'grel): yin pa// b+ha ga zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// dag pa'i de nyid ces bya ste// don dam pa de bdag gis brten// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // bcas pa'i sku gsung rdo rje nyid// dag pa de la gnas nas// ji ltar 
7a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du spyod// chos kyi 'byung gnas spangs pa yis// chos gnas dag pa gzhan dag med// gang la sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas pa'o// dag pa de nyid gnas med pas// 'jig pa nyid du 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): mabyed cig/ chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nying // rdo rje bdun mo nyid la gnas// drang 'grol logs 'gro ba kun// delas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyal bar kyi ma byir na yang // khyod ni 'arigs pa nyid du gyur// sangs tu 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po las byung ba// de ni de yi chos nyid mchog/ snying po'i ye shes mtha' gcig pu// mabyungad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nyid 'di gang thos 'gyur te// sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas nas// bye ba kun gyi bstod byed cing // phyag 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal gzugs kyi 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can kun la phan ston pa'i// sman pa'i tshig nams smra byed pa// thub chen dpa' bo chen po ni// 'gro ba'i mgon gyis bshang drugasol// sangs rgyas kun gtsa yongs dag pa// rdo rje/ 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): theg pa skor mdzad cing // 'gyur ba med cing snang ba med// gnas med de nyid bshad du gsol// dpa' bo nyon mongs mtsho chen las// rgyal bas ri ltar nges grol ba'i// de nyid mchog ni bshad du gsol// de nyid kun gyi mchog 
7b4(rgyud 'grel): gi mchog/ bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshig gi 'gor// e baM tshig gis rnam brgyan pa// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// bde gshegs dngos grub 'gyur 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan pade chen rdo rje 'chang // de ltar gsol 'debs 
7b5(rgyud 'grel): gsan gyur nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// go bang mchog ni gsung bar mdzad// 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad la// rdo rje nying po kun bsdus pa// shin tu gsang ba byed mdzad nas// rdo rje thugs kyi bstan paltar// 
7b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar rnam par gnas pa bzhin// de bzhin bdag gis bshad par bya// bla ma nabs kyi bka' drin gyis// gsal por thams cad shes byas nas// dngos grub thams cad kun bsdus pa// bzang bden bshad par bya// gur kyi 
7b7(rgyud 'grel): dang per rnam gnas pa// snying pa las ni snying po mchog/ dating ba de chen mgon po yis// gsang btsod ces kyar gsungs// sangs rgyas byung chub sems dpa' dang // sems can kun gyi ba de 'byung ba// gsang ba'i rtog pa'i 
7b8(rgyud 'grel): rabang rgyal po// dpal ldan 'dus par rnam par gnas// a ba na dag yig la// 'amam gsum po kun nus phyag 'chal// gang da dpal ldan 'gromagan gyis// phyag tu mchog zur brtags pa nyid// de ni 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ces byar grags// thog ma bar mtha' dri ma med// ye shes rdo rje gsum 'byung ba// kun rdzob gzugs su rnam par gnas// sems can rjes su bzung ba'i phyir// las kyi phyag rgya zhes byar 
8a2(rgyud 'grel): grags// mi mo'i lus la brten nas ni// sems can kun la phan par mdzad// kun khyab dag pa thams cad pa// shes rab lha mo bla na med// gcig pu bzang po 'byung 'gyur ba// sems can mgon gyis bsten pa yin// 
8a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings po brang nyams dga' na// sna tshogs thugs rje can gnas pa// de la b+ha ga zhes brjod dang // e baM zhes bya'i yig gnyis la// lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi de nyid gnas// de phyir de nyid mdor 
8a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan dang // rgyas par bstan pa'i tshul gyis gnas// dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rje btsun gyi nang na gnas pa yang // de'i gzhung lugs nyams pa sbas pa las shin tu sbas pa'i don dam pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid dbang du byas 
8a5(rgyud 'grel): nas brjod par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i brtan pa dang / g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes sgyu ma'i rang gyi rjes su byed pa'i gzugs can thugs rdo rje'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi 
8a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'i skur gyur nas/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa e baM zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i de kho na nyid sangs rgyas rang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi nges par ston to// don dam pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
8a7(rgyud 'grel): lha'i gzugs de nyid rgyud kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu bdun gyi go rims kyi nges par rdzogs par gyur nas de rab tu ston par mdzad de/ dang po gleng gzhi'i le'u las/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bdun gyi ming 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i mtha' na/ ji ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo mngon par bsgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang zhes bya ba la sogs dbang du byas nas brjod de/ 'di ni re zhig dang po lha'i rnal 'byor yin te/ chos kyi 
8b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dngos po med pa'i gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bdag nyid can du gyur nas/ dam tshig dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bzlas pa'i cho ga'i lugs sngon du 'gro bas/ sa la sogs pa'i ma bzhi'i rigs 
8b2(rgyud 'grel): dang lhan cig nam mkha'i khams su rnam par gnas nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod kyi sgo nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i dud 'gro la sogs pa'i sems can gyis rim pa ma lus pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags 
8b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can/ bde ba mchog gi gtso bo'i dpal pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgra thos pa na/ 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyal bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir/ e baM zhes bya ba la sogs pas don dam pa'i de kho na nyid gang yin pa de 'dir brjod par bya'o// rgyud kyi dang por gang gnas pa/ sbas pa de phyir bshad par bya// rdo rje 
8b5(rgyud 'grel): btsun mo las byung ba// e ba rnam dag yi ge nyid// e ba nam mkha'i khams su bzod// ma yi phyag rgyar rjes su thob// gang zhig de ni son byed pa// thos pa zhes bya 'dir brjod do// tog me kun mkhyen ye shes nyid // 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): dus cig pa yang de yin no// b+ha ga'i gzugs can gang yin te// nam mkha'i khams zhes bya bar brjod// dus gcig na zhes gang bstan pa// de mdor bstan pa zhes brjod do// nam mkha'i khams zhes bde 'byung ba// gang 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): yin bdag gis der brten to// sna tshogs dril bu rnga yab phreng // dril bu rin chen gyis nyer brgyan// sangs rgyas rang bzhin kun bzang po// gnas kyi mchog der mchod par byed// bcom ldan 'das zhes nyer bstan pa// 
8b8(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo bdag po thugs nyid do// rdo rje btsun mo zhes brjod pa// shes rab rgyal ba kun dngos te// thams cad ces bya sgra brjod pa// mi bskyod la sogs de bzhin gshegs// de yi sku gsung thugs gang yin// thugs nyid du 
9a1(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam par gnas// rnam dag btsun mo'i b+ha ga der// bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs// dngos po kun gyi ngo bo yis// mchog tu dga' bas rnam rol cing // e yi cha byad bzang po la// dbus su 
9a2(rgyud 'grel): baM gis rnam par brgyan// der ni rdo rje 'dzin mchog gnas// shes rab las byung zhi ba nyid// der ni sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing // de nyid du ni rnam par gnas// ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi// mtha' med bskal pa bye ba 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): ru// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // bcas pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor de// dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje 'chang // dpal dang ldan de de na bzhugs// nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba der// til gyi gang bu gang zhing mthong // 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): gan+d+ha'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// de bzhin gshegs pas yongs gang ba// yi ge de yi de kho na// brten par byas pa'i thabs nyid kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur// de ltar bzhugs 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i tshig/ don dam nyid du rnam par gnas// gzhan du de nyid rnal 'byor pa'i// nyams su myong ba skye mi 'gyur// rdo rje thugs sam gzhan yang rung // dpal ldan pa de chen rgyal po ni// 'dus pa zhes bya'i byed po gang // de ni e baM 'di rab gnas// 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): e paM zhes sogs rnam dag dang // shru ta zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// gsang ba'i tshig gnas nges par yang // rgyud kyi dang por brjod par bya// 'di dang 'chad par 'gyur ba yis// de ni byed pa por 'dod do// 'di ni yi ge gnyis po ni// rgyud 
9a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dang por med mi 'dod// mchog tu dri med go 'phangs ni// de ltar rnam dag shes gyur nas// dpal ldan 'dus par gang gsungs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas zhi ba// dngos grub mchog gur de shes nas// rgyud las 
9a8(rgyud 'grel): khyab par brjod par bya// dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhin gsungs pa// dam tshig spyod ba ston pa po// dag cing brjod du med pa yi// byang chub sems ni thams cad du// rab tu rgyas pa'i rgyung thams cad// la mnyer ston 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): par rnam par gnas// chos 'byung yi ge zhi nyid du// brjod du med par rnam par gnas// de yi dbye ba mtha' mod pas// sna tshogs khyab nas rnam par gnas// 'di ni srun pa 'dra ba yi// de yi dbye ba kun spangs pa// de ni rnam 
9b2(rgyud 'grel): dag ngo bo nyid// sgrub pa'i thabs ni bdag gis brjod// dngos po med pa de nyid ni// thabs bcas pad+ma rdo rje skyes// dga' bral mchog dga'i bar nyid du// mtshon nas gang zhig rnam gnas par// rtag tu der gtad yid nyid kyis/ 
9b3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig der gnas 'grub par 'gyur// sgrub po sgom pa ldan pa yis// lha yi ye shes nyams myong 'gyur// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi dam pa'i don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal 
9b4(rgyud 'grel): rdorje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las bzhugs pa'i tshig nges par bstan pa zhes bya ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsang ba bshad par bya// shes rab thabs ni rnam sgom pas// thugs ni rdo rje dran pa nyid// gsang 
9b5(rgyud 'grel): ba las kyang gsang ba mchog/ rang gi lus la gnas pa yi// dag pa gang zhig shes gyur nas// gnas bzang por ni gnas par 'gyur// de ni bdag gi yang dag bshad// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rjes 'brangs pa'i// dngos grub bzang 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): po sgrub pa'i phyir// mkha' dbyings lha yi gzhal yas na// ji lta ba bzhin yang dag gnas// bzang po rang gi skyed byed pa// thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med// dang po'i las can sems can rnams// mtshon cing yid ches byed pa'o// 
9b7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings rdo rje kun sbyor ba'i// reg las ngo mtshar chen po nyid// bde ba gang zhig 'brur 'gyur te// mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'o// de zad nas ni dga' bral te// gang gi mtha' na dag 'bral can// rang gi ngo bo bstan med pa'i// 
9b8(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid nung zhig 'byung bar 'byung // dbar po kun las rnam grol zhing // gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid// khyab cing rang bzhin med pa yi// rtogs pa de ni go 'phang mchog/ lha rdzas kun bzang zhes bya ba// dga' bral mtha' 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): na rnam par gnas// mchog 'di sgrub po rnams kyi ni// grol ba'i gnas su rab tu grags// dpal ldan 'dus pa de ci gang // bde gshegs dam pas gang gsungs pa// dngos med mchog tu rnam par 
10a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag/ byang chub sems ni tha med pa// rang bzhin dag pa nyid ni// bdag gis rgyas par bstan par bya// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan par 
10a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// gang zhig mkha' dbyings steng du rin chen 'gyur// bde ba kun gyi rang bzhin rnam par gnas// dbus su yon tan gyis brgyan sems gyur pa// de 'dir gyes bu'i sna rtse zhes byas bstan// rtog pa dang bcas sems zhes 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): byabs der// zla ba'i gzugs dang sangs rgyas su yis khyab// longs spyod rdzogs su bde ba'i bde ba'i ngo ba nyid// kun rdzob byang chub sems zhes de la brjod// kun rdzob byang chub sems ni nub gyur cing // der ni dga' bral 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya 'byung gyur nas// mnyam med sprul pa'i su yi brgyan gyur cing // sangs rgyas sna tshogs du ma spo bar byed// gnas skabs gang la dga' bral zhes bya ba'i// skad cig b+ha ga'i dbus su 'byung 'gyur te// yungs 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): kar zhes bya'i ming gi rnam gnas pa// de la sprul pa'i su zhes rgyal bas gsungs// bde ba'i dngos 'dir longs spyod rdzogs su dang // sprul pa'i su yang 'gags shing bzhugs gyur pa// bdag med rdo rje rim gyis chog bzhin/ 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): kun rtog rnam par rtog pa nges par spangs// bdag med rdo rje shin tu dri ma med// de nas dga' bral bde ba rnam par spangs// maral mar bzhag bzhin du skad cig gis// byang chub gnas dang lhan cig gcig tu byas// der ni 
10a8(rgyud 'grel): dga' bral bde ba son gyur nas// bdag med rdo rje shin tu brtan par bzhugs// der ni brjod med shes byar gang gnas pa// rnam dag byang chub go 'phar kun 'gro ba// shes bya'i bdag nyid dpag med mdangs ldan pa'i// 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bdag nyid lhan cig gzugs bsgom bya// dga' bral zhes bya gang gis brjod min pa// de yi mtshon rdzogs bsam mi khyab pa'i gzugs// kun tu dri ma med pa'i rab nyid// yid bzhin nor dang bum pa bzang zhes pa/ 
10b2(rgyud 'grel): so so rang rig lugs bzhin rig gyur pas// don dam rnam dag rgyal ba rnams kyi sku// byang chub dam pa mchog gcod nas bsgom// bzang po bde ba'i sar gyur kun 'gro ba// gsang gsum dri med rin chen de nyid bcas// 
10b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu sems can don du lugs rig pas// dbang po gnyis sbyor mchog tu rab brtags nas// 'od zer du ma de nas spro bar bya// gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo khams gsum 'di// dngos po rang bzhin med par rnam par dpyad// / 
10b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid de ni bzung ba la// 'bad pa'i thabs gzhan spyod min pas// bla ma zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// shes nas blo dang ldan pas bsgom// bdag nyid dri med zhi ba yi// de nyid de dang ldan gyur pas// las kyi phyag 
10b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bsgom pa yang // 'dir ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// las kyi phyag rgya mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// bden pa gsung bas mngon sum du// 'di 'dra'i bsgom pa gang gsungs pa// dang po'i las 
10b6(rgyud 'grel): can sems can la// las kyi phyag rgya gang spangs nas// byang chub sems ni rab bstan pa// gzhan gyi mtshon pas mi 'thob ste// dang po'i las pas rig bya ba// thog ma bar mtha' dri med pa// gnas te gzhan du nus 
10b7(rgyud 'grel): ma yin// de lta'i de nyid mchog zhi ba// mkha' dbyings zhes byar gnas pa ni// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor dang // yang dag rang bzhin gyis thob 'gyur// kun tu 'gro ba de nyid ni// dang po'i las pas bzung ba'i phyir// 
10b8(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings pho brang bzang po ru// sgrub po mchog gis thob par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das mchog gang yin te// bde ba'i ngo bo dngos med pa// de ni phyag rgya la brten nas// rang gi rig pa'i ngo bor gnas// shes rab thabs 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): dag rnam bsgoms pas// de ltar de nyid shes byas la// chos 'byung mi 'gyur zhi ba nyid// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// ngo mtshar mchog grur rdo rje can// de yi tshe na sgrub par bya// rang lus thabs 
11a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa 'am// yang na las kyi phyag rgyas so// las kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma ra gnas// mtshon du med par gang gnas pa// gong nas gong du bsgoms pa yis// zhi dpal rdo rje 'dzin par mtshon// de ni bdag gis thams cad 
11a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan// gzhan yang bdag gis bstan par bya// las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas// de nyid ldan pas bsgom par bya// phyag rgya med par lha rdzas nyid// de bzhin sgrub pos 'thob par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang 
11a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya// las kyi phyag rgya khro rgyu can// ye shes phyag rgya yang de bzhin// rnam rtog mang ba sngar byas la// phyag rgya chen po rnam sgom bya// rnam par g.yengs pa 
11a5(rgyud 'grel): kun 'byung ba'i// bud med phyag rgya rnam grangs la// rang lus thabs dang ldan pa yi// phyag rgya chen po bsnyen par bya// rang gi rig pa'i lha rdzas de// phyag rgya chen po mchog tu dge/ tha mal lus
11a6(rgyud 'grel): la brten nas gnas// shes rab chung bas mthong mi 'gyur// mi 'gyur ba yi rang lus de// mchog gcig gis ni shes par 'gyur// bla ma'i bka' 'drin gnang ba la// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// / 
11a7(rgyud 'grel): rtswa shing 'khri shing la sogs la// kun du gnas par gyur pa yang // mi yi thabs dang bral ba yis// me ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yin// thabs dang bral na nam du yang // lha rdzas yon tan kun 'byung ba// gnyu 
11a8(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lus la gnas na yang // shes rab de bzhin mthong mi 'gyur// ji ltar bud shing khu ba dang // til la til mar ji bzhin pa// de bzhin lus la thams cad du// shes rab pha rol phyin pa gnas// lha rdzas mchog 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): de thams cad la// rnam par gnas par shes par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis skyed byed pa// shes rab lha mo bla na med// khams gsum ma lus pa 'di dag/ gang gis thams cad gsal byed pa// mya ngan 'das pa gnas 
11b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos kyi// thog ma par mtha' rnam par mdzes// de ltar shes nas 'bad pa yi// shes rab pha rol phyin zhi ba// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// dbang phyug mchog gis khyab par 'gyur// gang zhig sems la 'dod 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// de ni de nas bsgom par bya// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab tu stsol// de dang lhan cig tshal byed pas// de nyid bdag gis rtag tu rig/ nyin dang mtshan du bsgom 'gyur na// 
11b4(rgyud 'grel): sa na ma dang // ston pa gzugs la na nas // dasal pa ba ste bye de// ngas pa nga ldan pa sa// napa mab brnam par \u0f7f// ba gtanan da gsas pa/ 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med// rang lus de nyid blo ldan gyis// de dang ldan pas bsgom par bya// dngos grub kun sbyin sgrub pa'i thabs// phung po lnga yi bdag lus nyid// ji ltar gsang ba gnas gyur pa// de nas 
11b6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol ring du spangs// gcig gis rtag par 'dzin gyur cing // gzhan dag gis ni steng nyid du'o// rtag dang chad pa'i sbyor ba las// mchog tu 'dzin pa zad pa gang // ye shes ci zhig 'byung 'gyur ba// thog ma dbus/ 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dri ma med// gtso bo rtag pa mchog tu zhi// chu dang dpe ni rnam spangs pa// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// rtag tu 'byung zhing 'gyur ba med// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad
12a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam spangs pa// der gnas sgom dang ldan gyur pa// sangs rgyas kyis kyang sbyor yul min// de mi bgrod dang bzod bya med// bzod par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med// skom dang bsgom bya sgom pa 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): bo// don dam par na yod ma yin// dpalas 'das shing brjod du med// bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// mtshan ma med cing rdul dang bral// mya ngan 'das zhes de la bshad// gang la mchog ces brjod bya ste// phyag 
12a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po mngon par gnas// lha rdzas longs spyor grol nyer ba// mya ngan 'das pa'i go 'phang mchog/ bzang po'i gnas de sems can la// sal pa ji bzhin rab tu bstan// gcig nyid gnyis su rnam par gyur// 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa'i dbye bas mchog nyid de// lha rdzas mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs// dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med// bud med skyes pa sogs gzugs kyis// thams cad du ni rnam par gnas// dbang 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): las 'das zhi ba gang // rjod med kun tu 'gro ba mchog/ 'phel zhing 'grib las rnam grol ba// dpal ldan pa de chen zhes brjod pa// nung bar rdzas su 'du shes gang // thams cad de las kun tu 'byung // 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum pa yi la ma bzang po// kun tu de ni rnam par gnas// de ni dngos grub sa bon te// dngos grub rnams kyi go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog ste// bde ba can zhes mngon 
12a7(rgyud 'grel): par brjod// lha dang lha min mer bcas pa// thams cad 'di las nges par 'byung // khams gsum ma lus pa 'di dag/ thams cad bde ba nyid du gnas// gang gis gzugs ni shes min ning // gang 
12a8(rgyud 'grel): zhig cig dbro spangs la// gla dang dri dang rolas 'das// blo yi yul las gang 'das pa// de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa// mchog tu bden pa'i gzugs gang zhig/ rang gis dbang gis 'dug 'gyur ba// chos kyi/ 
12b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskor bar gyur// gsang sngags bye ba grangs med kyang // de la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// bden pa gsung ba'i lung gis 'ga'// bden par gyur pa'i rim ston pa'i// bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// 
12b2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar de nges shes byas la// thabs gang gis ni de yi dngos// mchog tu brjod med gang thob pa// blo ldan de nyid rang lus la// sngags pas de nyid sgrub par bya// dngos po med pa dang bsres la// rtse gcig sems
12b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa yi// thabs bzang po dang ldan byas nas// yang dang yang du ngal bar bya// gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs pas// dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur// shin tu sbas pa'i rab sbyin dang // rig pa yis/ 
12b4(rgyud 'grel): ni gang shes dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pa'i// dag pa'i bdag nyid gang gros bya// gsang ba grub pa la gnas pa'i// dngos grub des ni gdon mi za// las kyi phyag rgya ldan pa'am// yang na phyag rgya chen 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): po yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs gyur pa// 'di ni chos nyid mchog yin no// snying po'i ye shes gcig bsdus pa// ma b+hur 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bdag med gnas 'di ma gtogs pa'i// rnam dag 
12b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gzhan dag med// rnam par mi rtog dmigs med pa// gang las sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur ba'i// shes rab lha mo bla na med// 'di ni pha rol zhes byar brjod// gal te shes nas sgoms gyur na// 
12b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi grol ster 'gyur// sngar bstan cho ga'i rim pa yis// dag pa'i de nyid gang bsgoms pa// rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag pas// bdag nyid rdo rje kun las skyes// mtshan rnams kun gyis
12b8(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// tha mal pa yi lus spangs nas// lha rdzas nga rgyal ldan yid kyis// thabs dang yang dag ldan pa dang // ting 'dzin mchog la rnam gnas nas// pad+ma rdo rje tshig
13a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// de ni 'grub 'gyur the tsom med// gang zhig phyag rgya chen ldan pas// bde ba chen po myong gyur pa// ye shes bdud rtsi mchog bzang po// de ni brjod par nus pa yin// rang gis rig pa'i 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid de// gzhan gyis brjod par nus mi 'gyur// gus dang bsgom pas rtogs 'gyur gyi// de ni gzhan du rtogs mi nus// de nyid shes nas nyin mtshan du// gus pas bsgom par bya ba yin// mya ngan 'das pa'i ge 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phang mchog/ bde ba zhi pa bla med der// der ni gus pa'i stobs nyid dang // bsgom pa'i stobs kyis gang sprul pa// der ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs// kun dga' las byung ci yang mchog/ spro zhing sdud par
13a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa can// gsal por yud kyis byung gyur pa// sa 'ogs blas stengs 'di// rgyu dang rgyu min snang bar byed// de nyid bsgoms pa'i stobs nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab dngos zhi ba// nyon mongs kun las rnam 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): grol zhing // mtshan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan pa// stong nyid ye shes las byung zhes// gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba nyid// rnam pa kun tu mchog ldan zhing // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// rnam dag 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgyu ma'i dngos// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// sgra dang dri dang ro las 'das// de bzhin reg pa rnam par spangs// ting 'dzin ye shes mig nyid kyis// mchog gcig pu de mthong bar 'gyur// bzang po 
13a7(rgyud 'grel): grib ma'i sgyu 'dra yis// 'du byed bzang po dang ldan pa// me yis thag pa bsregs pa bzhin// nyon mongs 'ching ba las grol ba// rnam pa sna tshogs lus rnams ni// ye shes rlabs kyi phreng ba spros// dbang po'i
13a8(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang 'dra ba'i sku// de nyid bsgom pas thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i nus pa dang // dam tshig rnams ni brgyar byas pas// rgyal ba yis kyang brjod med pa'i// de 'dra'i gzugs ni thob par 'gyur// gang 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): du lus ngag sems med pa'i// gnas gang kun 'gro mchog gyur pa'i// der ni yang dag bstan dbang gis// rang bzhin bsgom par gyur la ltos// e ma'i ngo mtshar byed pa'o// e ma'o zhi ba dbang po 
13b2(rgyud 'grel): las// e ma'o mchog tu zhi ba nyid// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin// lha yi rnal 'byor mchog nyid kyis// rim gyis 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas go 'phang bsgrub pa'i phyir// de nas spyod pa 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): spyad par bya// nyon mongs kun dang bral ba'i gnas// brjod dang brjod bya rnam spangs la// 'bad pa nyid kyi mngon sum du// sgrub pa pos ni yang dang yang // brtan pa'i sems kyis nges par yang // gsang
13b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i spyod pa spyad par bya// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs la// wardzas gang dang rgod sogs kyis// ji ltar skyob mi skye bar// sangs rgyas spyod pa la mos pas/ 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs can gyis gsang ba spyad// brtul zhugs dang ldan der gnas nas// der gtang bsgom pa dang ldan pas// nyon mongs thams cad mthar byas la// go 'phang mchog ni 'grub par bya// rgyun
13b6(rgyud 'grel): tu mchog tu gsang ba ste// bla ma'i zhabs la rab gnas pas// sangs rgyas dngos grub bzang ster ba// de ni thams cad bdag gis bshad// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi dam pa'i don nges
13b7(rgyud 'grel): par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las mngon par byang chub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // dang po'i las pa'i sems can gyis 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa nyid// cung zhig rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid can// de nas da ni bshad par bya// dpal ldan 'dus par yongs gsal bar// 'gro ba'i mgon pos gang gsungs pa 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): gong mgong ma'i lam nyid kyis// bsgom par bya ba bzhi po nyid// dang po yi ge dgod par bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pas// sgrub po'i dbang pos bsgom bya ba// gnyis
14a2(rgyud 'grel): ba rang gi rang bzhin nyid// gsum pa bzang po mchog gyur ba// ye shes phyag rgya rnam par bsgom// bzhi pa gong mar gang gsungs pa// phyag rgya chen por rnam par bsgom// de ltar de nyid bzhi po ni// 'di 
14a3(rgyud 'grel): ngag la ni yang dag gnas// bsgom pa dag gis gang bstan pa// de dag bdag gis so sor bshad// yi ge dgod pa'i sbyor pa yis// bsgom par bya ba gang gsungs pa// sems can dang po'i las 
14a4(rgyud 'grel): can rnams// gzhug par bya phyir gang gsungs pa// ji lta ba bzhin rnam gnas pa'i// dang po re zhig bstan par bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lam nyid du// gcig nyid rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yi// ye shes mchog tu dge ba nyid// ji ltar bstan par shes gyur nas// rtag tu gnas te 'dir bshad bya// gong mgor ma'i rim nyid kyis// thugs kyi rdo rje gar gsungs 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// yi ge dgod pa'i sbyor ba yis// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid bdag/ bzang po nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can// kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yi// kun 'gro'i ye shes rnam dag pa// thog ma par 
14a7(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dri ma med// chos rnams kyis ni ngo bo gang // so so'i gzugs su gang gnas pa// bdag med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'bad pa nyid kyi so sor brtag/ spros pa thams cad las grol ba'i// 
14a8(rgyud 'grel): gzugs gang mchog ni zhi ba nyid// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo shes// ye shes 'di la 'di rab grags// gnas bzang po der gnas nas ni// nyon mongs thams cad rnam spangs la// sems can 
14b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi don bya gang // gzugs kyi mchog nyid dmigs par bya// thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yi// shes rab dang ni bcas pa'i gzugs// gsal po rnam pas byung gyur pa// mtshan rnams kun gyis
14b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// bzung med mchog tu zhi ba nyid// rang zhing rkyen bral dri ma med// phyag rgya chen por rjes rig bya// gzugs de las ni 'byung 'gyur ba// de yi gzugs
14b3(rgyud 'grel): brnyan ltar byed pa// sgyu ma'i rjes grub bzang po gang // rnal 'byor phyag rgya gzugs ldan pa'i// dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gzugs brnyan yid kyi rang bzhin nyid// yon tan mtha' med 'byung 'gyur ba// 
14b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi mkhyen pa'i// dpal ldan me lor ming can du// ye shes de la brjod par bya// dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du// der ni 'gog pa'i ye shes gang // de yi rang bzhin rnal 'byor ldan// mnyam
14b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid ye shes zhes brjod do// rgyas pa spyan zhes bya ba gang // lha rdzas bud med dkyil 'khor ro// 'bad pas so sor rtogs gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// bdag med gnas kyi rnal 'byor pa/ 
14b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can// lha rdzas nam mkha'i khams kyi dor// sangs rgyas kun gyi pho brang mchog/ phra me'i rnal 'byor sbyor gcig pas// ji srid de la rtogs 'gyur bas// rtog pa cung zhig bskul 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// de srid de ni mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag/ srid gsum gnas na gang gnas pa// gang zhig gnas pa de dag kun// til gyi gang bu bzhin 'dir mthong // gang+gA'i 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): klung gi bye nyid kyi// de bzhin gshegs pas yongs ga ba// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'od chen po// bzang po de ni mthong gyur nas// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas bzang por// rnal 'byor 'di ni brtag 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// der ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun// da ltar bzhugs dang gang 'das dang // gang dag 'byung bar gyur pa dag/ de dag kun gyis gnas mchog ni// dag cing dang badri med de// de bzhin 
15a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa kun gyi mchod// ye shes de ni mdor bsdus na// so sor rtog pa zhes byar brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang du// 'bad pas so sor rtog pa nyid// de yi phye nas nyams len pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i 
15a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phrul pas// lha yi rnal 'byor kun 'gengs shing // mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis// sa la sogs pa'i rim pa yis// byang chub sems ni yang dag spro// gang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor ni// der ni nges par 
15a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub par bya// rtag dang mi bskyod rin chen tshe// rigs la sogs par gang gnas pa// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya// bzang po'i rgyan dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya chen po 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes rig pa// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar bas// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa'i// ye shes rlabs kyi phreng ba spos// bya ba nan tan ye shes zhes// mchog tu gyur pa 
15a6(rgyud 'grel): de la brjod// gang la rgyal ba rnams 'byung bas// gang du phyag rgya byin rlabs pas// ting 'dzin lnga po 'dir gnas pas// gang zhig yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yi// ye shes zhes ni 
15a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dir rab grags// bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas par// de yi khyad par brjod pa yin// lha dgod rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// khams drug pa dag mnyam ldan pa'i// rgyud las gsungs
15a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor los myur// rim gyi yum gyur bzhi po dang // khro bo sems dpa' de dang mtshungs// 'khor bcas pa yi byang chub sems// bcu drug dag dang mnyam ldan pa'i// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 
15b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin dpe byang brgyad bcur ldan// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa yin// rtag dang mi skyong rin chen gyis// rigs la sogs par yang dag gnas// de ltar rnam pas tshogs 
15b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// rnam par rtog pa'i rgyas gang ba'i// dang po'i las can sems can gyi// bsgom par bya bar gsungs pa yin// 'khor lo'i rim par bsgom bcas pa// 'di ni phyi rol zhes bshad de// yi ge dgod pa'i rnal 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyis// dang po nyid du gang gnas pa'o// sems can dang po'i las can la// las kyi phyag rgya bsgoms pa yi// rnam par gnas pa'i bar gnas gang // gong ma mchog gi go 'phang yin// byin gyis brlabs pa'i
15b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas bsgoms te// de nyid mchod pa rab tu brtag/ de nyid dpal ldan 'dus par ni// rdo rje 'dzin pas mchog tu gsungs// bskyed pa'i rim pa nyung ldan pas// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// 'di ni bsgom pa gnyis pa 
15b5(rgyud 'grel): ste// rang gi ngo bo yin zhes grags// gsum pa de ni bstan pa ste// nang gi go bangs bsgom pa yin// rnam pa kun ni mchog ldan pa'i// ye shes phyag rgya rab brtag pa'o// bzhi pagong na med pa'i rgyu// mngon 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): par byang chub byed pa po// phyag rgya chen po rnams bsgom pa// de yi gong na gzhan med pa'o// dbang po kun las rnam grol zhing // 'byung ba'i spyod pa sras gyur pa// zhi zhing grub pa myur ster la// bla ma'i zhal 
15b7(rgyud 'grel): las rab gnas pa'o// gcig min du ma ma yin zhing // rlabs med snang ba med pa dang // thams cad kyis ni bde gnas pa// mchog tu dga' ba byed pa po// rang sems tsam du shes par bya// nyon mongs tshogs 
15b8(rgyud 'grel): ni'agag 'gyur zhing // dam pa'i shes rab gyur ba'i lus// de ltar rgyud kyi rim shes nas// lha yi rnal 'byor mchog nyid dang // gong mgong ma'i lam nyid kyis// drang po min pas gang 'ongs pa// de dag 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nges btang la// rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya// phyag rgya chen por 'bad pa yis// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// grub pa thams cad rab sbyin zhing // thabs kyi mchog 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bcas par ni// de dag bsgom pa dang ldanan// tshe 'di nyid las grub par 'gyur// gang zhig sems ni bla med pas// skye ba med par gang rtogs pa// de yi dngos med shes rab ste// thabs kyi rab tu bskul ba nyid// de ltar 
16a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid shes pa la// phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsgom// de nas thabs dang bcas gyur pas// gang 'dod pa yi brtul zhugs bya// sangs rgyas gos med zhi ba'am// de bzhin nor gyi bdag po'am// yang na brtul zhugs chen 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): po'am// yang na sems la 'dod pa'o// bshad par gyur pa shes byas la// brtul zhugs ma yin shes pa nyid// blo dang ldan pas shes bya ba// rgyu las gzhan dag bshad pa yi// dor ba'i brtul zhugs kun mi bya// 
16a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gyur pa yin par 'dod// de las yid la gang 'dod pa// spyad pa med par spyad par bya// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rjes su 'brel gyur pa// lam mchog dpe med 'bad pas shes byas la// brtan pa'i blo yi
16a6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa de nyid gcig/ phyi rol dri ma ma lus spangs byas nas// bde ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan gnyug ma'i gzugs// 'du 'dzi dri ma spangs la bsgom par bya// ye shes rang bzhin rjes 'brel nyin mtshan du// sangs rgyas
16a7(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i rgyur gur bstan pa nyid// dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan dga' ba'i sems// rtag tu byang chub la bzhugs bsgom pa'i sems 'brel ba// dri ma ma lus zad par gyur pa yis// 'khor ba'i 'ching ba rnams 
16a8(rgyud 'grel): ni spang byar bya// bde ba'i go 'phang mchog gyur brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom// rtag tu goms par byas pa'i rnal 'byor dang // bdag nyid de nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// dri ma'i rab rib spangs dag mthong ba bzang / 
16b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu gsang ba'i sa phyogs yon tan n+ya'i gzhir gyur ri'am khyim stong ngam// skyed tshal snying dang brag phrag dur khrod dag gams phug nyams dga' 'am// de ltar dri med byas pa'i sa phyogs dag tu bzang po mtshon cing bzug/ 
16b2(rgyud 'grel): yul gyi bde ba skyed byed de cing rin chen rdo rje can gyi 'dra 'dzi sa das la bsgom// rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyang // de nyid la ma la rab chags pas// thabs dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// doni 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// 
16b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyeng ba'i rim pa lam gyis ni// gzhan dag tu yang 'gyur ba yin// skye ba du ma ngag gis kyang // 'dir ni gcig gis 'byung bar bshad// de ltar the tshom med shes nas// shes rab thabs kyi bsgom pa yis// phyi rol rnam 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs kyi// bya ba'i bye brag yongs spangs la// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i lam 'bras bcas// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab ster ba// thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yi// blo ldan gsang ba grub par spyad// yul dang 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): dus dang gza' rnams dang // chu skar phyi rol dkyil 'khor rnams// med par gsang ba rdo rje can// sgrub pa'i thabs 'di bshad par bya// nges pa brtul zhugs gso sbyong sogs// yi ge brjod pa'i bsgom pa yis// 
16b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar dngos grub gang brtags pa// spyod pa dka' bas brtags yin// yi ge brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid// kha dog dbye bas mtshon bya ba// sems can kun gyi gsang dbang gis// dpal ldan gsang bar gang gsungs 
16b7(rgyud 'grel): pa// dkyil 'khor dag ni gang gsungs pa// rigs nyid so so so so dang // phyag rgya'i bye ba sna tshogs dang // de bzhin sngags kyi dbye ba rnams// mchod dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // rigs kyi dbye ba du ma
16b8(rgyud 'grel): nyid// ting 'dzin dbye ba phye ba yi// lha rnams su ni brtags pa dang // dus nges pa yi bye brag rnams// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa yi// spo ba dang ni bsdu ba dang // sbyor ba du ma nyid dang ni// 'dod chags la 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs dri ma rnams// sna tshogs gzugs kyi gang gnas pa// 'khor bar rab tu 'ching byed pa'i// khams gsum pa yi bstan pa'i lam// de kun dngos po med gyur pa'i// ye shes mchog gi 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phrul yin// rtog med rnam par dag pa ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu kun tu song // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // de bzhin gzhan yang yod ma yin// dang po'i rnal 'byor ngo bo yis// ji srid kun la rnam par spyod// / 
17a3(rgyud 'grel): chos dang chos min mtshan nyid kyi// thams cad mngon du brtags pa can// bdag med gnas kyi sbyor ba yis// ji srid brtan par ma brtags pa'o// rnam par mi rtog gnas pa med// dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med// / 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad nyid// lam gyi so sor brtags byas nas// phung po'i bden pa yod ma yin// su zhig gis ni so sor rtog/ 'dir ni gang la brtag par bya// 
17a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas de nyid de kho na// ji srid bar du brtag byas pa// de srid thams cad 'od gsal te// rnam dag rang bzhin dri ma med// dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing // spros pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas
17a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang rtogs min na// skye bo gzhan gyis smos ci dgos// rtag dang chad pa las grol zhing // kun 'gro mchog tu zhi ba nyid// dngos med sdang ba med pa yi// byang chub sems dpas phyag byas pa'o// yon tan med cing nga rgyal med// mtshan 
17a7(rgyud 'grel): ma med cing sgrib pa med// 'grib dang 'phel las rnam grol ba// ngag gi spyod yul dag las 'das// de la 'gro dang 'ong ba dang // 'dir ni 'gro ba po 'ga' med// sgom dang sgom pa sgom bya dag/ don dam par na
17a8(rgyud 'grel): yod ma yin// de nyid mchog gyur gcig pu nyid// byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod// dbye ba sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// bye ba snyed du rab rgyas pa// bzang po kun 'gro rnam dag ste// ming gcig nyid kyi gnas 
17b1(rgyud 'grel): pa min// sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gis// khams gsum kun tu rab tu khyab// zhi ba rnams kyi de nyid mchog/ rig byed smra ba tshangs pa zer// sangs rgyas pa rnams byang chub mchog/ gos med pa rnams 
17b2(rgyud 'grel): srog ces zer// grangs can rig pa can la sogs// dbye ba gang zhig rnam brtag pa// de dag brjod par gal nus// sna tshogs nyid la khyab gnas nas// rnam pa sna tshogs ngo bo rnams// des ni smra bar nus ma 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): yin// bzang po'i dbye bas gang gnas pa// yang dag mtha' nyid du mar bstan// kun mkhyen ye shes mi rtog pa// rdo rje can mchog gang yin te// khams gsum ma lus 'di dag ni// thams cad 'di las kun tu 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // zhi zhing dag pa'i gnas gang de// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// brjod med kun 'gro'i gnas yin te// 'di kun de yi rnam 'phrul yin// cung zad dngos grub mtshan nyid gang // thams cad de la 
17b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnas// spros pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par skor// khams gsum rnam dag 'di thams cad// sa bon shes rab las byung kun// mtshan ma med cing mchog tu zhi// 
17b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgyu ma'i rjes 'jug pa// mang po dag ni gcig pa nyid// ji srid yod pa'i bud shing kun// stong pa'i me yi ma bsreg par// sgrub pa po yi ji ltar mthong // lta ba'i bud shing phung po rnams// stong 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid me yi bsreg byas nas// 'dir ni mnyam nyid la gnas na// de bzhin nyid kyi me yang 'gag/ bsam gtan shes rab mig sma ni gyis// ji srid bsrub ma byas pa// ji srid lta ngan rab rib rnams// 
17b8(rgyud 'grel): dri ma med par ji ltar 'gyur// dngos po stan dang g.yo ba kun// 'bad pas de ltar rnam sbyangs nas// bdag med go 'phang la gnas la// de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya// bdag gi gang du gang smras pa'i// 
18a1(rgyud 'grel): lha'i rnal 'byor shes byas la// de ni 'bad pas bsgom byas na// 'di ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// sangs rgyas nges par sgrub par byed pa yi// cho ga rkang gnyis mchog gis nges par 
18a2(rgyud 'grel): gang bstan pa// spyod pa du mas mdzes shing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i rgyung dugasal// de srid de ni ma bsten yon tan ldan pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar// shes nas mkhas pa rnams kyis spyod pa dang ldan tshe 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): ga bzhin du sgrub partsom// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las mngon par byang chub pa lnga bstan pa'i
18a4(rgyud 'grel): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // dpal ldan gsang ba rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i thabs// yang dag spyod pa sbas gyur pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 
18a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par g.yeng ba'i dgra gsod cing // dge bzang gsang ba'i grub thabs kyis// rol mo'i las kyi sgrub par bya// dbang bsku rab ni mchog bzang po// dpal ldan 'dus par rjes 'gro bas// phyag rgya chen po dbang 
18a6(rgyud 'grel): bkur nas// bzang po dngos grub rab tu bsgrub// de bzhin 'dod chags rab gnas nas// lha'i rnal 'byor der gnas pas// gsang ba grub par rab gnas na// sgrub po gang phyir 'grub par 'gyur// bzang 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): po ye shes goms byas shing // spyod pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// gnyis pa thams cad las grol bas// gang du 'dod pa de ru gnas// sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir// gsang ba grub pa mdor bsdus 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): nas// dngos grub rnams kyi go 'phang mchog/ de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// gang zhig skye ba du ma yi// dngos grub thob par 'dod 'gyur ba// des ni gsang ba'i brtul zhugs kyis// gnyis pa thams cad 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): spang bar bya// dge ba thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyud// 'dus pa zhes bya'i dbang bskur bas// bzang po dngos grub sbyin byed pa'i// phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bsku rabs// de nas rang 'dod la gnas shing // dang po'i 
18b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gcig gtad pas// bla ma'i zhal nas 'byung ba yis// rnal 'byor rin chen goms par bya// dpal ldan bde ba'i mgon po yis// mchog tugasang zhing sbas pa yis// shin tu sbas pa'i 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// gzugs bzang yon tan 'byung 'gyur ba// phyag rgya 'bad pas rnyed gyur nas// rgyud kyi spyod pa dang ldan pas// slob dpon la ni dbul bar bya// 
18b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyar bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin// gus pa'i 'o ma mar me dang // dri dang phreng ba rgyan chen gyis// de nas blo dang ldan pas mchod// de la gus pas mchod bya zhing // tho dang ldan pas cho ga bzhin// bla ma 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyar ldan mthong nas// rtog pa'i cho ga'i rim pa bzhin// pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang ni// sa la rab tu btsugs byas la// bstod pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can// cho ga bzhin du brjod par bya// kun mkhyen 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): sa kun dbang phyug pa// kun gyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i bdag/ thugs kyi bdag po dpa' bo che// dpa' bo gtsel phyag 'tshal bskyod// 'thung po kun bdag bdag nyid gnas// rdo rje ye shes gsum 'byung ba/ 
18b7(rgyud 'grel): d+hoHSh+T+ri mdza rnaMm ngad pa// chen mongs ma thar mdang byug 'tshal bskyed// sangs rgyas kun mchog sdug 'tshal 'dud// rdo rjegasum dbyed med pa na// chos bdag med pa las byung ba// ye shes bdud 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): ci phyag 'tsha la 'dud// kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can// srid pa'i 'bar lo rnam myong ba// dpa' chen ye shes tshon pa pa// gze brjid chen pa phyag 'tshal bsnyad// phyag can dpa' ba chen za/ 
19a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen mchod pa chen po pa// bdud mthar byed pa dpa' chen po// dpa' bo dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod// skye dang gnas dang sdud pa yi// byed pa por 'gyur 'gro ba'i gtso// / 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin nyid// ngo mtshar mchog gyur phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes rnam shes zhes bya ba'i// lam du 'jug 'gyur phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod// 
19a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma las byung phyag 'tshal 'dud// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// cho ga bzhin du gsol btab nas// sems can kun la phan 'dod pas// snyan pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya// khyod kyi zhabs kyi 
19a4(rgyud 'grel): bka' drin gyis// ye shes bla med bya ba shes// de ltar dbang skur rin chen gyis// mgon pos bdag ni dbang skur mdzod// dpal ldan bde ba'i mgon po yis// dpal ldan chos kyi rdo rje la// 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba de nyid bstan pa ltar// mgon pos de bzhin bka' drin gsol// sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas gyur pa// dmyal ba nas ni gtso bos drongs// sdug bsngal thams cad thar mdzad pa/ 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): mgon med bdag la thugs rje mdzod// khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni// gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis// 'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis// de phyir sangs rgyas mchog gnang mdzod// gsol 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): ba 'debs pa'i cho ga mchog/ bzang po de ltar thob gyur nas// snying rje slob ma la bskyed de// bla ma dpal ldan yon tan mchos// bzhin ni rab tu dang gyur pas// rjes su rtse phyir rab dga' bas// 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): gsang zhing mchog tu gsang gyur pas// dam tshig de nas thob par bya// bu yi srog chags gsang par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// gzhan gyi chung ma brten// 
19b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// 'di ni cho ga mdor bsdus pa'i// phyag rgya chen po nges bsten pas// 'di ni rtag tu bya ba yin// dam tshig bzhi po 'di nyid ni// bzang po khyod kyi rtag tu bsten// de ltar dam tshig thos gyur 
19b2(rgyud 'grel): nas// bzang po dngos grub kun ster ba// phyag rgya dang ni ldan gyur pa'i// slob dpon thugs rje ldan pa yi// rdo rje pad+ma snyoms 'jug cing // yang dag rab sbyin la gnas nas// lha yi rnal 'byor skyer 
19b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// 'bad pas gsung gi rdo rje yi// pad+ma las byung blang bar bya// khrag dang khu ba rnams bsres la// slob dpon mchog gis mchod pa'i phyir// mi yi 
19b4(rgyud 'grel): thod par blugs nas ni// bshang gci rdo rje chur ldan pas// de nas slob ma bkug byas la// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs nas// gnyug ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas// dam tshig 
19b5(rgyud 'grel): di ni sbyin par bya// dngos grub kun gyi gnas gyur cing // sangs rgyas byin brlabs la ma gyur pas// rdo rje slob ma de nyid rig/ tshegs de ltar gtad byas pas// rang gi phyag rgya dam tshig ni// / 
19b6(rgyud 'grel): bzang ldan rgyud nas gsungs pa nyid// shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma// rtag tu byang chub sems la dga'// mA ma kI ltar yongs dag pa// rab dga' gos ni rnam spangs ma// 'di ni yang dag 
19b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod byas nas// phyag rgya'i pad+ma rnam gnas pa// sngon bzhin spyod pa'i slob ma ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa gnyis pa la// bkra shis brjod pa'i tshig gis ni// dbyangs ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnga yab rgyal mtshan 
19b8(rgyud 'grel): gdugs las so// phreng ba tsan dan la sogs mchod// phyag rgya'i dbang bskur rin chen gyis// dam tshig la gnas brtan par bzhag/ khams gsum pa yi dbang bskur nas// slob mas thal mo sbyar byas la// 
20a1(rgyud 'grel): de la rjes gnang sbyin bya ste// chung las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// chos kyi rdo rje gang 'dod par// chos kyis 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// chos / 
20a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bla na med// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs gyur pa// sangs rgyas mchog gis bshad par gyis// de ltar bstan pas slob ma la// yang dag par sbyin rab sras dang / phyag rgya rin chen dbang bskur 
20a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // rjes su gnang ba'i khyad par gyis// rgud kyi don la nges byas nas// rdo rje theg pa'i rim 'byung ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstan// sems can mchog gis bshad par gyis// 
20a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta bu yi dbang bskur bas// sgrub pa'i nges pa byas kyur nyid// de nyid bsgom pas ngal gyur pas// nges par mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges byas nas// lugs bcas rim
20a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs la// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba sgrub// lugs bcas rim pa de nyid nges pa'i blo ldan sgom gyur rdo rje can// 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang po rab dga'i 
20a6(rgyud 'grel): yid can dngos grub don kun sgrub// mi yis tshe 'di nyid la 'grub 'gyur dpal ldan gsang grub la gnas nas// thabs bzangs dag dang ldan pas brjod med mchog grur go 'phang dam par 'gro// de ltar thams
20a7(rgyud 'grel): cad shes byas la// rim pa ji bzhin gnas byas te// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rim pa yis// ji ltar yang dag bstan pa ltar// de nas rang 'dod la gnas pa'i// gsang ba grub pa la gnas pa'i// dngos grub
20a8(rgyud 'grel): bzang po la 'bad pas// rigs kun la ni kun tu spyod// yang na phyag rgya ldan pa yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan pas// rgod dang phreng la sogs bzang po// sems ni spro bar byed pa can// chags med 
20b1(rgyud 'grel): gsarab grub pa yis// go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya// gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs la// mchog tu dga' ba spel bar byed// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par sdud par byed pa/ 
20b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las sgrub pa phyag rgya chen po mngon par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // gsang ba'i spyod pa dge 'byung zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad skyed 
20b3(rgyud 'grel): byed la// g.yeng ba'i sgra rnams zad byed pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rkang pa rkyang ba grangs nas ni// 'khor ba'i mngag gzhug dor nas ni// rtag tu brtson dang ldan yid kyis// rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu sgrub// 
20b4(rgyud 'grel): rgod dang 'gyod dang gnyid la sogs// 'bad pas rab tu spang bar bya// gzhan du bskal pa bye ba ni// bachar yang dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// mgon po rdo rje slob dpon la// dngos po kun gyi phyag byas nas// rdo rje gsum 
20b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med pa'i gzugs// gsang ba'i dngos grub yang dag spyad// mtshan ma med cing snang ba med// rang gi lus kyi thabs ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'bad pas rab tu bsgom par bya// 'bad 
20b6(rgyud 'grel): pas de ltar shes byas nas// rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun dbang po// sngags pas rang lus de nyid dang // rdo rje can dngos dbyer med pa'i// sna tshogs spyod pa gsal gyur pa'i// gsang ba'i brtul zhugs bzang po spyod// thabs 
20b7(rgyud 'grel): bzang dag dang ldan pa yis// mchog tu dga' bas yongasu dgang // rnam rtogs yid las byung ba yi// 'jig rten pa yi gang spar pa'i// de de gzugs su gnas byas la// gsang ba'i brtul zhugs brtul 
20b8(rgyud 'grel): zhugs can// ji ltar dpal ldan 'dus spyod pa'i// gsang ba zhes byar rab gnas pa// gshar gci zas su byas gyur na// sgrub pa'i snong du nges par 'gyur// dam tshig bzang po gzhan dag kyang // gsal byang la sogs 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): khyad par dang // phyag rgya'i 'ching ba byin brlabs nas// rgud nas gsungs pa'i bzang po kun// rdo rje'i tshig ni bzang po 'di// rdo rje thugs kyis gsungs pa yis// gsang ba'i spyod 
21a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bla med pa// de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// rdo rje thugs kyis gang sbas pa// de ni bdag gis bshad par bya// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yi// sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir// mnyam gzhag mi smra gyur pa 
21a3(rgyud 'grel): yi// smon pa'i gzugs su bzhag par bya// rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// sha za bzhin du kun tu 'khyam// yang dang yang du ngal byas la// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bsgom// rtag tu bsgom dang ldan gyur pa'i// rig pas 
21a4(rgyud 'grel): rang gis rtogs byas la// grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer dang // tshal la sogs par 'khyam par bya// bzhi mdo dag dang dur khrod dang // lha rten pho brang khyad par du// dor ba rnying pas mgo bcings la// tshogs bcas 
21a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas su 'jug na yang // mchog tu bde ba bsgom par bya// 'bad med rol mo brdung ba der// gar dang gla yi g.yeng bar bya// 'o ma sgron mar ldan pa de'i// rgyal mtshan can gyi gnas 'jug bya// la lar rgod cing la lar/ 
21a6(rgyud 'grel): swA// la lar glu yang blang bar bya// la lar gar bya la lar brdab// la lar sna tshogs brjod bya ba// ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur ba// thams cad rim gyis rim gyis bya// skyo bar gyur nas sangs rgyas nyid// nam yang
21a7(rgyud 'grel): grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten spyod pa rnam spangs la// rigs rnams kun la kun tu spyad// 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad du// gcig tu 'o ma goms byed par// rol la sogs pa'i dam tshig la// 
21a8(rgyud 'grel): shin tu sred par mi bya'o// nga rgyal spang bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid kyis kyang goms par bya// mchog tu dga' ba'i sems nyid ni// ji ltar myos par mi 'gyur bar// dam tshig thams cad sngon
21b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba// sngags pas de ltar bya ba nyid// klu dang gar gyi dga' ba ni// ji ltar yid ni mi nyams par// ji srid mngon sum gyur gyi bar// de ltar de nyid la sems bzhag/ bdud rtsi lnga la gcig gus pas// de nyid 
21b2(rgyud 'grel): nges par byas nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad blang byas nas// smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyis brgyan pa'i// smyon pa'i mtshan ma gang yin pa// de ni rtag tu brten par bya// sngags pas gsang ba'i spyod pa ni// cho ga
21b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du spyad par bya// srog chags kun lus las byung ba'i// sgron ma rtag tu cho ga bzhin// lha yi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// 'bad pas bza' bar bya ba nyid// sbrang ma'i skyug pa 'dres pa dang // bshad dang ga ci 
21b4(rgyud 'grel): ba bsres byas nas// sgron ma lnga dang bsras pa yi// rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa bya// dngos med mchog tu zhi ba yi// dpal ldan pade chen rdo rje can// rang rig tsam zhig bskyed byas la// go 'phang mchog de sgom par 
21b5(rgyud 'grel): bya// sngags pas 'di ltar bsgom byas la// rang gi lus mchog bsgom par bya// smad par gyur pa ma lus pa// dpyad pa med par bya ba nyid// btsun mo'i rang byung me tog ni// byang chub sems dang bcas gyur pa// 
21b6(rgyud 'grel): blangs la gsung gi rdo rje can// bde ba chen po yang dag mchod// glang po khyi rta rnga mo yi// sgron ma mi las byung ba dag/ sngags pas rtag tu bza' bya zhing // gzhan du bza' bar mi bya'o// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// 
21b7(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig rtag tu goms byed pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i ting nge 'dzin// de ni 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// slongs mo spyod pa bya ba'i phyir// brtul zhugs can gyis snod mi bzung // grod pas zos shing bor ba yi// gyo dum la sogs 
21b8(rgyud 'grel): der bza' zhing // gang du bor zhing byin par bza'// des ni gang du zos gyur nas// tshim par gyur nas de yang dor// de yi smad g.yogs dum bu yang // rnying zhing dum bur gyur pas bya// yang na phyogs kyi gos can 
22a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis// gong du 'gro bar 'dod par bya// til 'bras tsam gyi dngos po yang // yongs su bzung bar mi bya'o// yongs su 'dzin las sdug bsngal 'byung // sdug bsngal gyis ni sems 'khor 'gyur// 
22a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bas sems ni zhum 'gyur te// zhum pas dngos grub nyams par 'gyur// dngos grub med na 'khor ba ste// 'khor bas dmyal ba sgrub par byed// dmyal bar nyon mongs sdug bsngal gyis// grangs med bsngal bar 
22a3(rgyud 'grel): gnod par 'gyur// bzhin skabs sdug bsngal gyur pa dang // gzhan gyi bran la sogs par skye// rnam dag legs par 'dod pa yi// skye ba slar yang thob mi 'gyur// de ltar bdag gis bdag nyid kyis// gsang ba'i 
22a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa rnam bsgoms nas// khams gsum rnam pa gcig gyur pa// rnam dag thabs bzang la gnas pas// rnam dag legs par 'dod pa yis// skye ba slar yang thob par 'gyur// gsang ba grub pa la gnas
22a5(rgyud 'grel): nas// de nas seng ge bzhin du spyod// smyon pa'i gzugs 'dzin gyur pa yis// kun spyod thams cad rnam spangs la// gsang gsum dri med rnal 'byor gyis// bza' ba kun la spyod par bya// shing rdos yi rang bzhin gyis// 
22a6(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams la yang phyag mi bya// lus nyid la ni mchod pa dang // bla ma gus pas phyag bya'o// sa rdo'i rang bzhin mchod rten dang // glegs bam la sogs mi bya zhing // rmi lam du yang dkyil 'khor sogs// lag pa'i phyag 
22a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya mi bya'o// theg pa gsum la zhugs rnams la// phyag la sogs pa mi bya'o// sangs rgyas dam par mi 'dzin na// rnal 'byor pa gzhan smos ci dgos// bsgom pa la chags gyur sems kyis ni// ngag gi
22a8(rgyud 'grel): rtsod pa mi bya'o// dam tshig dag ni nyams par 'gyur// nyams 'gyur yid ni g.yengs gyur pas// sbyor ba la sogs 'bad pa yis// de nyid rig par rtag tu spang // rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal nyid// spangs 
22b1(rgyud 'grel): nas gzhan du mi bya'o// dag pa de nyid la gnas pas// sbyor ba rnams kyang mi bya ste// dam tshig dag ni nyams par 'gyur// nyams pas yid ni sdug bsngal 'thob// bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yi// ji srid / 
22b2(rgyud 'grel): de la rtogs gyur pas// dngos med go 'phang la gnas nas// thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yi// rtog las gang zhig 'byung ba rnams// ma brtag par ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bsgom bya'i sbyor ba'i stobs kyis ni// 
22b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub mtshan nyid gang ci'ang rung // de kun skad cig tsam la ni// rang nyid gnas par 'gyur ba yin// bsgom pa 'di ni bar chad can// sngags pas gsang sngags mi bzla zhing // dkyil 'khor dag kyang mi byal/ 
22b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya mi bcing phyag mi bya// lus nyid dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs te// shes rab phyag rgya zhes byar grags// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dag sngags// de bsnyen pa ni phyag yin no// nang gi bdag nyid de byas nas/ 
22b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas phyi rol thams cad spangs// gsang ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pas// de nyid rig pas rtag tu spyad// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ rnam par rtog med sngags pa yis// gsang ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pas// de ltar 
22b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur med 'grub par 'gyur// spro zhing de la rab sbyor bas// dam tshig dag ni stong ba dang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yis// shes rab thabs dag rnam par bsgom// gang dang glu sogs sbyor ba yi// pAd+ma rdo rje rnam 
22b7(rgyud 'grel): rol zhing // bur chang sgron ma gus pa dang // dri dang phreng sogs rgya chen dang // gling bu rnga zlum sgra dag dang // rdza rnga'i sgra la sogs pa dang // lha rdzas lus bzangs dri bzangs ma// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgrub// lha rdzas 
22b8(rgyud 'grel): bzang po mchog 'di dang // nang gi bdag nyid bsgom pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub 'gyur ba// spyad par bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can gyis// byang chub sems ni 
23a1(rgyud 'grel): rab spros pas// chu skyes khyad par bza' bar bya// rtag tu chags pa dang ldan zhing // mchog tu dga' ba la sred pas// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// mang du smras pa ci zhig dgos// rtag tu ngo tsha
23a2(rgyud 'grel): spangs gyur pas// dam tshig spyod la ci zhen pa// smyon pa'i gzugs kyis mi smra ba// dur khrod la sogs gar gnas nas// mA ma kI dang spyan la sogs// rgyan rnams la sogs kyis brgyan pa'i// phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 
23a3(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig tu// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bsgom// rdo rje nam mkha'i khams sbyor bas// der ni thams cad bsgom par bya// zhal gsum pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// ye shes rgya chen rlabs spro bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba
23a4(rgyud 'grel): yis// rang dngos rig pa bskul byas nas// sangs rgyas ye shes gzugs can rnams// rab tu bsdus pa dag kyang bya// phyogs bcu dag tu rgyug byed pa'i// rang sems gal te 'dzin par 'dod gyur na// sangs rgyas thob 
23a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyur gyur rang gi sems// de tshe yang dag sbyor ba mchog tu bya// gong du nyams myong phyag rgya rjes bsam bya// rtser ldan rjes 'gro bzang dga' chag pa can// chag pas thob gyur de las sems gtad nas// slar yang 
23a6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'i khyad par gsal bar bsgrub// bsam gtan 'di la sbyor ba yi// rin chen sems ni brtan gyur nas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gnas de// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par 'gyur// de lta de nyid shes gyur nas// 
23a7(rgyud 'grel): der gtad nas ni bsgom par bya// ji srid yid ni mi skyo bar// glo bzang sems ni mnyam gzhag pas// skyon ji ltar 'dod pa yi// sems kyis kun tu khyab par bya// cung zad mig ni rgyal 'gyur bas// byang chub rin chen 
23a8(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// la la rgod dang smra ba dang // la la ragar dag byed pa na// ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur bas// bsgom pa la chags sems kyis so// rnam par rtog med sngags pa yis// de lta'i ting 'dzin dang ldan pas// 
23b1(rgyud 'grel): dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs nas// bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur// bzang po'i rigs lnga las byung ba'i// dam tshig rtag tu bza' bar bya// khyad par gzhan dang ldan pa yi// dam tshig brten pa'i mchod par bya// 
23b2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bde gshegs bsam gtan pas// spyan ni rgyas par gyur nas su// byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// spyod pa rin chen la gnas shing // rdo rje ye shes la mos pas// 
23b3(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs go 'phar 'dod na ni// mi dge'i sems su mi bya'o// khams gsum du ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i// btsun mo kun la 'dod par bya// dman las skyes dang 'gyur ba can// de nyid rnal 'byor pas mchod bya// rnam par 
23b4(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad las byung dang // srog chags kun lus las byung ba'i// srog chags rnams ni rnal 'byor pas// dngos grub 'dod na sgrub par bya// bshang gci sa bon la sogs pa// sna yi nang nas byung ba yis// rang lus 
23b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya// khams gsum pa las byung ba yi// rtag tu dam tshig la mchod pas// de nyid rin chen la rab sbyar// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'dir ni mang du smra ci dgos// / 
23b6(rgyud 'grel): gang dang gang zhig dmigs 'gyur ba// de kun de nyid rnal 'byor du// rig pas rtogs shing blta bar bya// rdo rje sgrub par ga gsungs pa// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// dam tshig bzang po dang ldan pa'i// de nyid gsum dbyer 
23b7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sku// sngags pas rtag tu mchod par bya// kun kyang rtog pa sngon 'gro bas// khams gsum 'di dag rnam par dag/ ma rig drabs yang dag bsgribs// rmi lam rtsed mo rjes su 'gro// phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid
23b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams// de ltar 'bad pas dpyad na ni// mtshan ma med cing snang med pa'o// thabs dang bcas pa rnam par bsgom// de ltar cho ga ldan shes pas// sems ni de nyid byin brlabs nas// ji ltar thos pas 'tsho byed cing / 
24a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ma lus la rab sbyor// tshong dpon bram ze rje'u rigs dang // shi ba sogs kyi 'gron pos na// zos shing tshim nas bor gyur pa'i// gcig tu bsdus pa'i dman pa rnams// kyi dang wa/ 
24a2(rgyud 'grel): yi sad pa dag/ blangs nas de ni bza' bar bya// de nyid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// nung zhig smyon pa'i sems ldan pa'i// rigs rnams kun la mnyam par sbyor// bzang // 
24a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gar// rdo rje gar gyis gom par ga nas// glu rnams len par byed pa yi// rdo rje glu ni mi gsal bar// khams gsum ngag tu grags pa yi// gzhan dag gsal ba nyid du len// 
24a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs skad bsred glu len cing // sha za bzhin du kun tu 'khyam// las dag gang gis skye bo rnams// gang da dgang du 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis// srid pa'i 'ching las grol bar 'gyur// 
24a5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par thams cad spangs pa yi// de nyid zhi ba thob gyur nas// thabs bzang dag dang ldan pa yi// go 'phang mchog ni bsgrub par bya// 'byung po kun gyi de nyid gang // bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// 'gro kun 
24a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu zhi ba nyid// khyad par gnas pa'i bzang po gang // rang lus thabs dang bcas pa yi// de nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya// bus pa kun la thal mo'i sgra// rim gyi gar ni bzang po bya// kun rtog thams cad 
24a7(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa yi// byang chub mchog tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bzang po go 'bar der gnas nas// gang dadag daduganas na yang // byang chub mchog tu nges byas pas// skyo dngan can yang 'grub par 'gyur// smyon pa'i brtul
24a8(rgyud 'grel): zhugs la brten nas// yid ni de nyid byin brlabs nas// gsung spyod mchog gi rol pa yi// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gal te rgya chen khyim rnams ni// spong bar nus pa ma yin yang // dpal ldan gas
