24b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus las bstan pa'i// byang chub 'byung ba'i spyod pa rnams// khyim de nyid du gnas byas nas// 'jig rten spyod pa la gnas nas// ji ltar rig pa mi 'gyur bar// gsang ba'i dam tshig spyad par bya// mtshan mo gsal por
24b2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni// 'o ma gcig tu goms byas pas// phyag rgyar bcas pas bya ba ste// yid ches pas yin gzhan gyis min// dri chu la sogs dam tshig rnams// rtag tu spyad par bya ba nyid// gcig tu dam tshig goms byed na// 
24b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid tha med 'grub par 'gyur// shin tu gsang ba'i grogs dag nyid// de nyid shes shing mchog gyur pa// de dang lhan cig dam tshig rnams// rgyud las gsung baspyad par bya// bud med bzang dang longs spyod bzang // de bzhin// 
24b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas mal bzang sogs kyis// de nyid bsgom pas dal gyur pa'i// ye shes ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig spyod pa der gtad par// khyim nyid du yang 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig spyod pa dman gyur na// spyod pa 
24b5(rgyud 'grel): min zhing khyim du'ang min// de ltar dam tshig mngon ldan zhing // ye shes bzang po la dga' ba// cho ga 'dis ni bskul byas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// nyams su blangs bya thams cad ni// 'gal ba'i dam tshig 
24b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa// smad par gyur pa sngon 'gro ba'i// ma lus pa dag gang bstan pa// dngos grub bzang po'i rgyu yi phyir// de dag thams cad bya ba nyid// 'di kun mngon sum nyid du ni// byed pa'i char ni dbye bya ste// gsang ba spyod
24b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ldan pa yi// de nyid shes yin gzhan ma yin// 'gal ba'i dam tshig la sogs pa'i// gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod// rtags can gzugs lag nas gyur nas// 'jig rten spyod las 'das gyur te// smad pa rnams
24b8(rgyud 'grel): la gsal po ru// nyams su len par byed gyur cing // nus pa dag ni ma skyes par// kun rdzob nyid du 'jug 'gyur ba'i// dman pa'i rigs la sogs pa la// rtag tu dam tshig sogs spyod cing // 'dod dang bcas pa'i 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid kyis// thab khung dkyil 'khor sogs byed pa// rtag dang chad pa smra ba yi// gang zhig cho ga 'dir gnas pas// de ni bstan pa 'jig byed gsungs// gal te rtags dang ldan gyur pas// 
25a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa 'di ni byed 'gyur na// de ni mtshan mo dam tshig sbyar// nyin mo shin tu gsang bar bya// dman pa'i 'gro ba nyan thos sogs// ji ltar gzhan gyis mi rig pa// de ltar sngags pas bya ba ste// bdag nyid sgrub phyir shin tu 
25a3(rgyud 'grel): spang // 'jig rten gyis mi gnod cing // 'jig rten kun la mi gnod par// de bzhin sngags pas 'dir bya'o// bde gshegs dngos grub 'dod gyur na// gsang ba grub pa la gnas shing // sgrub pa po la nus pa zhig/ ji srid 
25a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar ma gyur pa// de srid brtul zhugs rtags mi bzung // nus pa zhig ni skyes 'gyur ba// de nas gsang ba'i spyod pa spangs// de rjes rig pa'i brtul zhugs bzang // de dag rtag tu blang bar bya// go 'phang nyams 
25a5(rgyud 'grel): dga' der gnas pas// rnal 'byor der gtad bsgom par bya// 'du 'dzi thams cad der bral nas// go 'phang mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'du 'dzi ring du spangs shing rang bzhin g.yo ba'i sems nyid rab sbyar nas// dngos
25a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dngos med rang bzhin bde ba'i mchog ldan de nyid la gnas bsgom par bya// nyon mongs pa yi dgra tshogs mang po las rgyal mi nyams bzang por gyur pa yi// sems can don ldan sems kyis rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams 
25a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum na spyod// spyan ni cung zhig phye nas srid pa'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i sems dang ldan pa yi// chog shes par gyur pas sna tshogs ma lus brdzun pa'i blo dang sbrang spangs la// mchog tu legs 
25a8(rgyud 'grel): par spyod pa'i sems can don ldan 'jig rten gsum na grags par byed// dngos rnams dpag med byang chub gong phad mchog gyur mnyam med sems can mchog gyur rol pa gang // khyim gyi 'dzin pa rtsa bzhin ma lus sgyu ma bzhin lta ba spre'u dang rlung // 
25b1(rgyud 'grel): dang glog bzhin g.yo ba'i sems zhes bya la dbang du gyur pas gzhag/ dngos po'i de nyid bsgoms pa'i lus can dam pa'i bde ba de nyid mchog/ sems can don la spo ba'i de nyid sems la nges par rnal 'byor dbang phyug 
25b2(rgyud 'grel): rol bar byed// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya ba las// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi sems
25b3(rgyud 'grel): dri ma med par byed pa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa'i rim pa ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // dag cing rang bzhin dri ma med// sna tshogs gzugs rnams phun sum tshogs// 'ching dang mya ngan rnam
25b4(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa// lha yi phyag rgya mchog rnyed nas// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// de bzhin lha min bu mo'ang rung // dri za'i bu mo gzugs ldan pa'i// grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma yang rung // 'di lta'i bu mo rnal 'byor ma'am// 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa dang // zhags pa lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// bkug nas longs spyod nyid du bya// lha rdzas grub pa gang yin te// dam tshig sbyor bar rab tu brjod// bsgrubs na ma ngag gzhug par 'gyur zhing // 
25b6(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur/ des ni sems ni rnam g.yeng bar// nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ro// mi yi bu mo mthu chen gyis// dam tshig bzang po 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul che ldan zhing // chu dang rdul 
25b7(rgyud 'grel): dag rnam par spangs// sna tshogs gzugs dag rab ston pa'i// lha rdzas btsun mo bsnyen par bya// de dang lhan cig mnyam ldan pa'i// skye bo med pa'i tshal song la// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// seng ga 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rnam par spyad// lha rdzas btsun mo 'gugs pa yi// rus pa gal te med gur na// 'dod pas gnod pa nyid gyur la// des ni mi yi bu mo bsten// longs spyod bzang po dang ldan pa'i// g.yeng ba'i 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): myos bzhi bya'i phyir// de phyir grub pa'i dbang po la// mi las byung ba'i bu mo bsten// rnam g.yeng khro ba mang ba dang // snron rnams thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing // rgas shing mya ngan 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis non pa'i// me yi bu mo shin tu spang // de lta'i la rjes med gyur nas// dngos grub bzang po'i chu yi phyir// s+yAd kyi bya ba'i rim pa yis// mi yi bu mo bsten par bya// de ltar za ma la byang chub nyid// sngags 
26a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi cho ga bzhin byas nas// mchog tu dga' ba'i yid can gyis/ byang chub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// tha mal pa yi rim pa yi// phyag rgya de nyid bshad par bya// mthar gyes dang por byas pas ni// gang gi dngos 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): grub po pa 'gyur ba'o// mthar skyes mi sring bu mo dang // nga bzhin chos ma'i bu ma dang // sbed pa'i rigs las byung g+har dang // gangad yang bang ba rgyad pa dang // rbud nas gsungs pa'i ga byas pa'i// b+ha bang 
26a5(rgyud 'grel): du ni bu mo nyid// dam tshig spyod pa thams cad la// byis panyid nas rim gyis brlab// byang chub sems la dga' zhing mkhas// chos nyid la ni bzod byas pas// mkhas pas cho ga ji bzhin du// rdo rje gsum dbyed meng 
26a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsgrub// rgyang nas jis gsungs pa yi// mchod pa de la gnas nas brtsam/ gus pas 'o ma sgron ma dang // phreng ba la sogs rgyan rnams dang // thal ba bzang po bsu bya zhing // ral pa'i cod pan gyis 
26a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan par// sngags pa sa rang gi gzugs nyid dang // de yi gzugs kyang bya ba nyid// stag gi pags pas gos byas shing // sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje la TI gzung zhing / dril bu 
26a8(rgyud 'grel): cad rjelus rnam par brgyan// de bzhin rnanab mgrin dpung pa// rus pa'i dum bus rnam par brgyan// mi yi thod pa g.yan pa ste// de bzhin g.yas par nA ma ru// bdag dang phyag rgyad bzhin du// mam 
26b1(rgyud 'grel): kI'am spyan dag gam// bdag nyid rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas// 'di 'dra'i gzugs su byas nas ni// rgyud las byung ba'i cho ga yis// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bzang po spyad// gnyis med nges par byas 
26b2(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba las rig pa'i brtul zhugs nges par bstan pa zhes bya/ 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): bste le'u bdun pa'o// // mthar skyes ngo mtshar chen po las// rgyud las sgrub thabs gang gsungs pa// ji ltar nges par nges 'thob pa// de nas yang dge bshad par bya// skyob pa'i nges pa 
26b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs spangs la// tshogs kyi dbang phyug gzugs byas nas// gang du sus kyang mi shes par// mthar skyes nang du 'jug par bya// tshogs kyi mtshan ma blangs nas ni// mgo bo'i sgra ni bregs nas 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang // ral pa sbom po gcig bzhag nas// gtsug pud gcig ni bzung bar bya// ru ngag sha dang shel bzang po// tshan chen dag tu spel byas pa'i// phreng ba'i do shal 'phyang ba dag/ mgul pa'i rgyan 
26b6(rgyud 'grel): du bzung bar bya// dpung rgyad gdu bu bzang po dag/ 'od zer 'phro zhing 'khrug gyur dang // 'bad pas mtshan gsum byas nas ni// mdzub mo la ni zangs ma'i rgya// mdun gyi phyogs su 'phyang gyur pa'i// smad/ 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs dum bu de nas bzung // lcags mdung la btags me tog sdod// phrag pa dag la dgal bar bya// yan lag thams cad rnam brgyan nas// tshogs kyi dbang phyug gzugs su bya// phrag pa/ 
26b8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni dgab byas nas// mthar skyes khyim du 'jug par bya// bzang po de ltar gsang byas nas// de nas bsgrub par bya phyir dpyad// gang zhig sus kyang mi shes par// bzang po'i yul du 'byung/ 
27a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// grong khyer sum brtsegs nye ba'i mthar// mthar skye sa nang du 'jug par bya// yang dag tu na lta gzhan ni// des ni shes par mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu khrus dang lha mchod cing // rtag tu rang gi 
27a2(rgyud 'grel): grub mthar bsgom// yi ge las ni cung zhig gis// rang byung lha la chags gyur pas// gdol pa'i gzugs kyi tshogs nyid kyi// de ltar de yi nang zhugs la// byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya// chos dang grub 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' sngon 'gro bas// de nas de la ston par byed// dus kyi phyi ma la sogs pa'am// yang na dbugs kyi sgom pa ston// de nas rgyud nas gsungs kun gyis// yid brtan pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur// dbang dang // 
27a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sngon 'gro bas// bdag nyid kyis ni slob mar byas// de yi byin pa'i rdzas rnams dang // snga na yod pa dang bcas pas// de ni de la gtad byas la// de yi bla ma mchod phyir byin// de yi bkas gnang
27a5(rgyud 'grel): blang bya ste// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// de ni smad don bden pa la// mkhas shing dam tshig 'dod byas nas// sangs rgyas nyid du nges byas la// blo ldan rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// nges par rgyud 
27a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs dam tshig gis// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// ri 'am rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam// sngon rnams spangs pa'i yul 'khor dang // dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam// phug dang grong khyer rnying pa dag/ 
27a7(rgyud 'grel): dri med chu yi gang ba dang // me tog 'bras bu sogs pas brgyan// ljon shing 'khri shing gi sa brgyan pa// khyad par du ni dben gyur pa// der ni phyag rgya dang bcas par// sgrub po brtan zhing nges pa yis// sgom pa'i 
27a8(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba der gtad pa'i// rtag tu nags su bsod snyoms blang // byang chub sems la dga' zhing mkhas// lus ni nus pa can byas nas// yang dag rim pas der gnas nas// yang dang yang du goms 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// ljon shing rgyal po de dag kun// sgrub po dbang po mdangs ldan pas// de nyid sbyor bas bkug byas nas// zhal zas bzang po ster rab 'gyur// blo bzang rtag tu 'dod med cing // blo yis rtag tu 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): goms par byas// rdo rje theg pa la dga' zhing // rtag tu bde gshegs bsam pa can// brtan bcos ma lus la goms shing // de bzhin gtong ldan dpa' zhing gsal// phongs par gyur pa'i tshe na yang // mnyam pa'i 
27b3(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid gcig tu bsgom// phyag rgya'ang de 'drar shes bya ste// chags med zhen pa med pa dang // zab mo'i chos dang ldan pa dang // sgrub po 'dod bzhin rjes su 'brang // bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ma// gzugs 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// byang chub sems la dga' zhing gsal// rdo rje sgrub la shin tu gsal// ci ltar bu bzhin brtse ba dang // de bzhin spun dang pha ma ltar// rtag tu sgrub po mthong ba na// brtse bas shin tu goms 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): byed na// bud med sgyu bral yid du 'ong // skal ba bzang zhing snyan par smai// phrag dog spangs shing rjes su mthun// sgrub pa po yi bka' bzhin byed// dmar ser lus phra gzugs bzang ma// tshul 
27b6(rgyud 'grel): khrims yon tan gyis brgyan pa// mdog snum chog shes pa dang // ring min thung ba ma yin pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa 'am// yang na de bzhin bcu drug gam// de nyid rig pa dang ldan pas/ 
27b7(rgyud 'grel): mur gong mtha' ni rnam par mdzes// yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs// skra yi rtse kun cung zhig 'khyil// skad snyad shin tu dga' ba can// lta ba bzang po rnams rgyas pa// 'bad pas bu mo 'di 'drag 
27b8(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub don gnyer gyur nas su// rtogs las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs brtsam// 'bad pas de ni bzung byas nas// go 'phangs mchog ni sgrub par bya// rang gi 
28a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mchod nas ni// byang chub sems ni btang bar bya// de nas sku yi rdo rje kun nas bzung // de yi b+ha gar byung ba'i khrus// sems kyi rdo rje rab tu mchod// de la gus pas mchod nas ni// 
28a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba las// de nyid sbyor la bsgom par bya// cu dang 'am ni mA ma kIr// dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bsgoms nas// thams cad bya ba kho na yin// dam tshig gi ni khyad par dang // bud med
28a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni bsten por bya// b+ha gang li ngag bzhag nas ni// byang chub sems ni btang mi bya// der bskyed pa yi dga' ba yis// sems ni bkang bas bsgom par bya// ji srid rnal 'byor byang chub sems// 
28a4(rgyud 'grel): gtong bar byed pa ma yin pa// de srid kun dka' las byung bde// ci yang rgyud mi 'chad par 'thob// bde ba de yi ngo bo dang // yang dag ldan pa'i byang chub mchog/ bdag nyid rtag tu bsgoms nas ni// 'brus 
28a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dngos grub kun gyi rten gyur pa// byang chub sems ni der lhung bas// phung po rnam shes brgyal gyur nas// ma slad dngos grub ga la yod// phyag rgya ma la dam 'khyud nas// yang dang / 
28a6(rgyud 'grel): yang du 'o byas la// gnas de ru ni bskyod pa yis// byang chub sems ma rab 'bab pas// phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgoms la// lha mo de la 'o yang bya// mig gnyis dag ni rgyas gyur nas// bde ba chen po'i
28a7(rgyud 'grel): ros gang ba// ma mchu cung zhig rgyas pa yis// num cung zhig dam par 'dzin// brla gnyis dri ma med pa mchog/ mig kyang cung zhig rgyas pa dang // rdo rje theg par ngal byas pas// der gtad pa yi bsgom dang 
28a8(rgyud 'grel): ldan// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu der gtang bsam pa can// 'o ma byin nas yang dang yang // khyad par du ni rab tu mchod// rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya bzhin// de nyid sbyor bas bsgom par bya// 
28b1(rgyud 'grel): yid 'od bcos ma'i zas dang ni// dri dang me tog sogs bsnyen bkur// nya dang sha dang bung chang sogs// sems ri spro bar byed pa can// 'bad pas de lta bus mchod nas// de nyid ched du bsgob par bya// cho ga 'di/ 
28b2(rgyud 'grel): yis bskul nas ni// rdo rje sems dpar bdag 'grub 'gyur// byang chub sems dang ldan pa yi// bdud rtsi me tog blang bar bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas pa// de ni rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod// bsgom dang ngas 
28b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig nyams len pas// de lta'i dngos grub myur du thob// sems kyi dam tshig sdang ba la// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dngos grub med// lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom pa dang // dam tshig bsrung bar bya ba ni// shes 
28b4(rgyud 'grel): pas 'bad pas bsgoms byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ji skad gsungs pa'i sa phyogs su// rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad na ni// sdig pa ma lus sbyangs nas ni// rig ma dang bcas grol 
28b5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// grong dang grong khyer dag tu 'am// sems ni rab tu dga' ba der// der ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyang // dgag pa dang ni bsgrub pa med// dpal ldan 'dus rab yongs gsal ba'i// sgrub 
28b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs rgyud las gang gsungs pa// rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// gsang ba'i sbyong bas rnam brgyan pa// de ni dngos grub myur thob par// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nas gsungs// dam tshig spyod pa/ 
28b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan par// rtag tu goms par bya ba yin// don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba las tshogs kyi brtul zhugs nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i/ 
28b8(rgyud 'grel): le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // me dang chu dang dug sogs la// thabs ni gang gis mi shes pa// de ni tshig deng nub pa dang // 'chi bar 'gyur bar the tsom med// de bzhin gsang 'dus rgyud kyis ni// shes rab 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs ni spangs gyur pa// 'gal ba dag ni spyod byed pa'i// bsam ngan de ni brlag par 'gyur// gang gis de yi de nyid shes// yang dag rab sprin la gnas nas// dpal ldan 'dus pa la dga'
29a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// sems can de ni steng du 'gro// gsang ba'i spyod dang portul zhugs dang // phyag rgya rgyas pa gang gsungs pa// 'di dag thams cad rtog don yin// bsgom pa 'ba' zhig tsam yin te// gang yang rgyas pa'i 
29a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid can// kun kyang sems can bsam pas gsungs// bsgom pa la ni rab gnas pa'i// ye shes ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// rnam rtog du ma rgyas gyur pa// 'di ni thams cad spangs byas nas// phyag 
29a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po la 'bad pas// shes rab ldan pas rtag tu bsgom// 'du 'dzi thams cad spangs nas ni// gnyis pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// yang dang yang du goms byas nas// pad+ma rdo rje'i tshig bzhin du// 
29a5(rgyud 'grel): dus mi ring bas 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig dag ni thams cad las// bla ma mchod pa mchog yin te// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ dpal ldan 'dus pa 'am gzhan du bstan// bzung min brjod pa ma yin pa// / 
29a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun la yang dag gnas// lus ngag yid kyi bde ba yin// rnam rtog med cing gnas med pa// dag cing ngo bo nyid med pa// byang chub sems zhes dran par bya// bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// 
29a7(rgyud 'grel): de ni myur du thob par 'gyur// khams gsum rin po cher gyur pa// slob dpon las ni mchog gzhan med// gang las bka' drin thob pa yi// mkhas pas dngos grub du ma 'thob// yang dag gsungs pas 
29a8(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa gang // dpal ldan mnyam nyid gnyis med gsungs des ni slob dpon bya ba ste// gzhan gyis 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// gos dang rgyan dang longs spyod dang // rang gi phyag rgyas brgyan byas nas// bla ma mchod// / 
29b1(rgyud 'grel): cing phul byas pas// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya phul nas ni// rgyud nas gsungs pa'i dngos grub 'grub// gzhan dag phyi rol dam tshig gis// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 
29b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// 'di ni rgyud kyi bden don gyis// dam tshig gtso bo mchog yin no// sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir// dpal ldan rdo rje mngon gsungs pa'i// dam tshig dag ni thams cad las// gnyug ma'i phyag rgya dbul// 
29b3(rgyud 'grel): ba mchog/ gzhan du phyi rol tshul dag gi/ dam tshig 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// gus pas bla ma mchod par bya// rang gi phyag rgya pad+ma yi// mchod mchog mgrin pa'i dbyangs dag/ 
29b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // brlabardab pa yi rol mo dang // rdo rje 'jug pa'i spyod pa dang // rig ma'i ma mchu'i ro myang dang // cung zhig 'khyud par spro ba yi// bza' ba chos pa sna tshogs gang // nya dang khur ba la sogs dang // sha dang bur chad
29b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang po dag/ rgyud nas gsungs pa sna tshogs dang // phyag rgya gnyug ma phul byas nas// de nas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// 'di lta'i gzugs su ma byas na// gzhan du dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// rdo rje ston 
29b6(rgyud 'grel): la gang gus pas// 'di lta'i tshul du byed 'gyur ba// de nyid rig pa'i las nyid kyis// dri med rdo rje gsum dbyer med// yang dag rab sbyin gsang 'gyur ba// sems can des 'dir thob par 'gyur// bla ma/ 
29b7(rgyud 'grel): rdorje mnyes 'gyur bas// dngos grub bzang po kun sbyin byed// rgyud nas gsungs pa'i dam tshig bzang // de ltar rtag par rab bsgrub pas// rdo rje slob dpon thugs rje mchog/ man ngag myur du thob par 'gyur// 
29b8(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta'i tshul gyis 'angs gyur pa'i// de nyid gsal por yongs shes nas// gus pa'i dngos po 'phel 'gyur bas// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// mchod pa'i dus su 'bad pa yis// gus
30a1(rgyud 'grel): pas bla ma phyag byas nas// phyi nas sangs rgyas dngos grub gtso// rab sbyin rtse gcig sems kyis bsgom// slob dpon mchog la dmod pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' khyad par du/ 
30a2(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la dmod pa dang // 'di dag 'bad pas spang bar bya// gang gi sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos// na mkha' lta bu mi shes pas// theg pa mchog 'di zos gyur nas// sems can de ni skrag gyur 
30a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zag pa med pa dang // ngan 'grong btu 'gro bar 'gyur// dmanal mos pa'i sems can rnams// bskal pa brgya yi bar du yang // ngan 'gro sa tu 'gro bar 'gyur// ngan 'gro gnas byung nas yang // de na 'a'adzi/ 
30a4(rgyud 'grel): padang med par ni 'gro bar 'gyur// gang zhig gus pa dang ldan pas// chos nyid bsgom par byed 'gyur bas// de ni sdig pa kun spangs nas// gtso bo'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// 'dod 
30a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan lda ldan pas// 'khor ba'i rgyamatsho 'jigs pa las// sems can rnams ni nges grol 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi gnas// blan med pa'i chos rnams ni// 'jig rten kun la stonas 
30a6(rgyud 'grel): bor// dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur// mi shes sgrib pas ljongs gyur pa'i// sems can rnams mi don dam gyis// ye shes snang bar byed 'gyur te// mun pa la ni mar me bzhin// bde chen mgan pa gcig 
30a7(rgyud 'grel): bunyid// gang shig cag tu dran byed cing // zhabs kyi bad+ma gnyis gus pa'i// sdig pa thams cad zad gyur nas// sems can de nyid de yi mthus// pad bsdams 'jig rten mngon po ldang // dngas tham 
30b1(rgyud 'grel): kur gyi gter gyur pa// dus pi ring bar 'gyur ba nyid// gang zhig dag pa'i de nyid sems// gus pas lcags kyus brtan bkug nas// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// gsang ba'i sgrub thabs gang byas pa// gal te/ 
30b2(rgyud 'grel): de ni bzang gyur ra// bzang nas ci phyir rjod par byed// gal te mar dang 'dres gyung na// slob dpor rnams kyi de bzod mdzod// gang zhe ga rgyud kyi rjes 'brings nas// brjod pa dag gis ma shes pa'i// rang gi bu bzhin 'phags 
30b3(rgyud 'grel): parnapas// ma lus pa dag bzod par mdzod// dpal ldan mgon po bde chen gyis// zhabs kyi padas nyer 'tsho ba// pad+ma rdo rje sems can kun// rjes su bzung phyir byas pa yi// gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba// dngos grub kun 
30b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bla pa'i bla// grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po// 'bad pa nyid kyis bsten par bya// blo bzang rtogs pa'i cho ga bzhin// gsang ba grub par gang spyod pa// mi yi tshe 'di nyid la ni// dngos grub ma lus 'thob par 'gyur/ 
30b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun dang dus gcig tu// gsang ba'i spyod pa gang grub pa'i// legs pa ma lus gang yod pas// dpal ldan slob dpo zhabs grub shog/ sangs rgyas thob pa'i rgyur gyur pas// yul gzhan la ni sems/ 
30b6(rgyud 'grel): ne pas// sgrub dka'i yul dang ldan cig tu// kur rdog thams cad spang bar bya// gnas gabs lnga gdod gyu ra// sang cig gis ni 'khor bar ltung // snyoms dang ga nyid dang 'gyud pa dang // rgod dang be tshom zhes bya ba'i/ 
30b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa lnga po sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mi bzhed do// lnga po da ni yongs spangs nas// sangs rgyas nyid du nges byas nas// smon pa'i brtul zhugs kyi sa rol na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba de nyid 
30b8(rgyud 'grel): mchog de nyid// grub pa gang zhig de brten pa// der ni rgyal ba kun 'byung ba// gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod ces bya'o// dgubacu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa'i// tshigs su bcad pa lnga 'argyar ni// dngos grub thams cad bsdus 
31a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// gsang ba grub pa zhes byar brjod// pad+ma rdo rje'i dga' bas thob gyur bsod nams gang yin pas// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i sar gyur 'jig rten gyur pa yon tan rgyan gnas pa// sangs rgyas
31a2(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i rgyur gyur gsang ba grub pa gtan du nyin dang mnyan du sbyor gyur cig/ sems can 'di kun ma lus byang chub snying po'i bar du legs par spyod gyur cig/ gang zhig rgya mtsho dang bcas sa gzhi ri dang ljon shing sogs pas brgyan 
31a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams// de dag de nyid gzugs brnyan bzhin du chen por gyur pa'i khongs su chud par snang gyur pa// rdzogs pa'i byang chub dri med zla ba'i 'od zer dpal ldan gsang ba grub pa mchog/ mdzad pa thugs rjes gzhan gyi 
31a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang gyur dpal ldan pad+ma rdo rje gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// // don dam pa'i yi ge gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi don nges par bsdus pa dpal gsang ba grub pa zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes par bya 
31a5(rgyud 'grel): babal sa// don dam pa'i slob dpon gyi mchod pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // lha dang lha min la sogs pa ma lus pas/ zhabs kyi pad+ma zung la me tog gi phreng bas mchod pa dpal mgon po 
31a6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po pad+ma badz+ra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// bkra shis// 6// gnyis su med pa dru sgrus/ 
31a7(rgyud 'grel): ma mam pa pa sa s+ho/ @#// rgya gang sad du/ pradz+nyA pa ya bi ni thA ya sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa sgrib pa/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal/ 
31a8(rgyud 'grel): lolo// rang bzhin dri ma med cing thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin sems gang las ni sangs rgyas kyi// yang dag ma yin kun rtog mtha' dag dri mas mgos chos sku dang ni mtshungs med pa'o// dam chos char gyi gzhir gyur longs 
31b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod dang ni sna tshogs pa yi gzugs dang spyod ldan pa'i// yang dag sprul pa skye 'gyur de la gus par phyag byas nas ni de nyid bshad par bya// de yi rang bzhin mi shes pa'i// skye bo ma lus la phan phyir// dpal ldan yan lag 
31b2(rgyud 'grel): modo rdorje// bdag gi de nyid mdor bsdu bya// byis pas 'khrul pa'i bden min pa'i// kun tu rtog pa las byung dngos// kun tu rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can// de ni srid par mkhas pas bshad// de las bzod dka' rgyun chags pa'i// nyon 
31b3(rgyud 'grel): mongs ma lus tshogs rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs rgya che ba'i// las kyi tshogs ni skye bar 'gyur// de gnyis las ni skye ba dang // 'chi ba la sogs rab rgyas pa// mi bden la zhen sems ldan pa'i// shin tu sdug 
31b4(rgyud 'grel): bsngal 'khor mor 'byung // shes rab nyams chung de dag ni// ji srid dngos 'dzin chen po yod// de srid srid pa'i brtson dang gnas// bdag dang gzhan phan ga la yod// de phyir 'gro ba gsum po dag/ dga' bar byed 'od 
31b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ni// 'khrul pa gsal bar 'dod pa yi// bshes gnyen can gyi dngos 'dzin spangs// gal te ming tsam thad da kyang // rtog pa nyid du dbyer med phyir// mkhas pas dngos 'dzin yongs btang ste// dngos med par yang mi 
31b6(rgyud 'grel): brtag go// mar me 'bar ba bsad rung gi/ shin ci yang byar med par// dngos por 'dzin pa nyid rung gi/ dngos med 'dzin pa de ltar min// yang dag dngos po med rtog pa// de yi dngos po mtshon 'gyur te// gang phyir nam mkha' 
31b7(rgyud 'grel): zhig pa ni// med pas dang po bral ba min// thabs dang bral bar gyur pa yi// dngos med tsam zhig sgrub gyur kyang // med phyir na mkha'i me tog bzhin// bdag gzhan don ni nus ma yin// mig 'phrul lta bur 'phrul pa'i 
31b8(rgyud 'grel): phyir// de ltar dngos po yongs su btang // sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yi// med phyir dngos med de bzhin no// de gnyis ji ltar yongs btang dang // btang nas gang du gnas pa ni// 'khor min mya ngan 'das min pa// de ni mkhas 
32a1(rgyud 'grel): pas mnyan par gyis// shes dang shes bya rab phye ste// sbyor bas yongs su brtags nas ni// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid// shes rab de nyid du ni brjod// ma lus sdug bsngal rgya mtsho dang // sdug bsngal las 
32a2(rgyud 'grel): 'don gang yin pa// snying rje sems can la chags pas// 'dod chags zhes ni bya bar grags// rtag tu rjes mthun sbyor ba yi// skye bo mngon par 'dod pa yi// 'bras bu gang yin nyer sbyin pas// de nyid thabs zhes bya bar bsgrags// 
32a3(rgyud 'grel): chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin// gnyis med rnam par sbyor ba yis// gnyis po 'dus pa gang yin pa// shes rab thabs zhes bya bar brjod// de ltar gang la bzhag pa dang // gsal bar nus pa ma yin zhing // bzhag dang bsal ba spangs/ 
32a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// chos rnams de bzhin nyid ces brjod// bzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba// yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs shing // mtshan gzhi dang ni mtshan nyid grol// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// gnyis dang gnyis med zhi ba dang // 
32a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la gnas dge ba ste// so so rang rig mi g.yo zhing // thabs dang shes rab mi 'khrugs pas// de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa'i gnas// legs dang lha yi phun tshogs byed/ 
32a6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings su rab tu grags// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa ste// yid 'ong bdag byin brlabs pa'i gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba// theg pa gsum dang sku gsum dang // 
32a7(rgyud 'grel): bye ba grangs med sngags dang ni// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // 'jig rten pa dang de las 'das// lha dang lha min mi dang ni// yi dwags la sogs de bzhin gzhan// de nyid las ni byung nas su// de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur/ 
32a8(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa yi 'gro rnams la// yid bzhin nor ltar kun tu gnas// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// spyod dang grol ba yang dag gsol// de nyid yang dag rtogs nas su// sngon gyi bde gshegs sangs rgyas la// thams 
32b1(rgyud 'grel): cad du ni sangs rgyas zhing // 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur// dpag med bde ba'i rang bzhin phyir// dpal ldan bde chen zhes bya ba// kun tu bzang po mchog nyid dang // mngon par byang chub byed pa po// mtshungs pa med/ 
32b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thugs rjes 'gro ba gsum gyi sdug bsngal ma lus pa// 'joms par byed pa gcig pu rab 'jug dang ni dpag med snga tshogs pa'i// tshogs la chags pa las ni rnam grol blo mchog mnyam 'dus pa// bdag 
32b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan phan dang bde rgyud de nyid du ni thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs// de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsgrub pa las shes rab dang thabs rnam par spros pa'i rim par phye ba ste dang po'o// / 
32b4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa gzhom dka' 'khrul pa yi// nad kyis gnom pa dag la phan pa dang // de nyid rin chen thob bya'i phyir// de nas 'di la cung zad bshad// dpal ldan yan lag med rdo rje// snying rjer zhugs pa'i sems kyis ni// sngon
32b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// thabs ni ji bzhin mdor bsdu bya// de 'di yin zhes rgyal bas kyang // de ni brjod par nus ma yin// so so rang rig rang bzhin phyir// ngag gi lam ni bzung bya min// de lta na yang dus 
32b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi// sangs rgyas 'gro rnams dag mdzad pas// mdo sde du ma gsang sngags kyi// spyod pa la sogs rim gyis bshad// sgra dang don dag 'brel med phyir// thos pa la sogs shes pa yis// yul du 
32b7(rgyud 'grel): nam yang 'gyur ma yin// bstan bcos mtshan nyid ston pa yin// de phyir skyes bu dam pa yi// bla ma dam pa bsten pa'i rigs// de ma gtogs par de nyid ni// bskal pa bye bas thob mi 'gyur// zhing bzang shin tu 
32b8(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa las// sa bon med pa'i myu gu bzhin// de nyid rin chen ma rnyed par// nam yang dngos grub 'gyur ma yin// rnam par mi rtog lam la gnas// thabs dang shes rab don ston pa'i// man ngag ldan pa 'ga' tsam ste// 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung // sa steng gi ni slob dpon te// nges par yongs su shes byas la// dngos grub mchog ni bdag sgrub phyir// de ni 'bad pas bsnyen bkur bya// gang zhig gis ni gzi 
33a2(rgyud 'grel): brjid kyis// khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// 'byung po kun gyi dge legs dang // dpag med byang chub bde mchog thob// ltos pa med par thugs brtse ba'i// thugs rje'i sku can de la ni// bsam 
33a3(rgyud 'grel): ngan rgyu yi dri bcas pa'i// sems kyis ci phyir 'dud par byed// ji srid 'dod pa rnyed par du// kun tu phyag dang bkur sti dang // 'bad de chang la sogs pas mchog/ bsnyen bkur sri zhu bla mar byed// sangs rgyas kun 
33a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi y-in naganas// rin chen nyid thob gyu nas// sdang las skyon rnams rtog byed cing // 'dri med tsam yang byed mi 'gyur// de bzhin gzhan yang ngan pa'i bdag/ bla ma rdo rje can bsnyen nas// tso 'dre ba na 
33a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i bdag/ bsam ngan dang la co 'dri 'am// dkon mchog gsum gyi bskor dang ni// bla mi'i phyag rgya 'phrog par byed// rnal 'byor pa yi dam chos la// ma spyad pas na dmod par byed// 
33a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ngo mtshar che gyur la// rtag tu slong byed blo ldan la// nga yang shin tu skrag byed ces// dpal ldan rdo rje mgon pos gsungs// bsnyen bkur med par myur ba ru// bdag ni rjes su bzung 'tshal brjod// sdang ba'i sems/ 
33a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis gzhan brten te// kha cig nyes pa sgrogs la brtson// sangs rgyas don du mi gnyer zhing // rnal 'byor pa dang slob dpon zhes// bdag ni ci nas shes 'gyur ba// de tsam la ni zhugs pa yin// brgya la ye shes/ 
33a8(rgyud 'grel): rnyed 'gyur na// khengs pa bla ma las sdang bar// sngags kyi rim pa las 'ongs pa// 'di ni bdag gis shes zhes brjod// slar la 'bul gyi yas rang bzung // de nas brtsams te yas kyis ni// slob ma/ 
33b1(rgyud 'grel): ngadamin slob dpon min// khro bces smra ba gnan dag yod// bla ma smra ba'i bsam pa yi// co 'dri byed cing khyad byed pa// tshe 'di bde ba yod min na// de dag ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// de lta bu yi sems can gang // rang gi don la rgyab 
33b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs yin// de ni ngan 'gro kun snod du// dpal ldan rdo rje mgon pos gsungs// bdag nyid sun 'byin byed pa de// dmyal bas 'gro ba gzhan yod min// shin tu mi zad las rnams kyis// sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos 'tshed// 
33b3(rgyud 'grel): de bas dam pa don gnyer ba'i// skyes bus dngos po thams cad kyis// dpag med 'bras bu rab ster ba'i// slob dpon kun tu bsten par bya// byang chub tu ni nges byas pas// phrag dog nga rgyal ser sna dang // de bzhin g.yo dang sgra dang ni// skyo 
33b4(rgyud 'grel): dub 'du shes yongs spangs te// rtag tu ngu yi spyod pa bzhin// mi g.yo ba yi sems kyis ni// dngos grub kun don ster ba'i bla// 'gro ba'i mgon po bsnyen bkur bya// shin tu gus pas dus gsum du// zhabs la spyi bos phyag 
33b5(rgyud 'grel): byas shing // rang gi lus la'ang ltos med par// maN+Dal sngon 'gro mchod pa bya// de nas bla ma'i bka' drin gyis// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// de nyid dam pa bgegs med par// slob ma yis ni thob par 
33b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// rtag tu 'od gsal dag pa ste// rgyal ba'i gnas 'gyur byang chub sems// gsal ba chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos// phun tshogs ma lus byed par 'gyur// mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms byed pa'i// nyi ma dang ni nye ba yi// 
33b7(rgyud 'grel): me shel gyi ni nor bu las// rab 'bar me lce 'byung ba bzhin// slob ma'i sems ni nor bul// 'gro ba gzigs pa nyer 'gyur na// dri ma 'joms byed rnal 'byor gyi// me lce rno 'bar de bzhin no// dpal ldan de nyid rin chen ni// 
33b8(rgyud 'grel): rab tu rtogs pas 'bar rjes la// phyogs bcun bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// thugs rjes thugs ni 'phangs nas su// myur du byin nas slob ma ni// sangs rgyas byi no drab gdon mi za// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'gyur// brtan pas g.yo dang grol dngang rgyal sgrib pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas ni// man ngag ldan pa'i tham mtshungs pa med pa dad pas 'dir ni bsten par bya// des de des 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ba'i yon tan gtor 'gyur de nyid rin chen rnyed gyur nas// bde gshegs kun gyis brnyes pa'i byang chub mchog ni 'thob par 'gyur/ de dge ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa las rdo rje slob dpon 
34a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen bkur nges par brtan pa'i rim par bye ba ste gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dod pa'i// srub pa po la pan gdags phyir// dbang bsrung srid gsum phran tshogs gnas// de nas 'di la yang dag 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad// bde gshegs gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du// rgyud kyi lam gyi rjes 'brangs nas// mkhas pas gang tshe dbang ba srung na// sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum yin// dpag med 'jig rten khams dbang phyug/ bdag byin 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa'i dbang thob pa// dam tshig nyams kyi 'jigs pas na// blo ldan de dag gis kyang 'dzin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du// sngags kyi lam las de bzhin gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i// dmachis 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu 'ad 'a dka' ba'i// sngags kyi lam du de bzhin gsungs// de bas don kun la 'bad pas// dbang bskur don gnyer rgyal bdag sras// de rje slob dpon yon tan mtsho// ji ltar rig pas bsnyen par bya// gzugs dang lang tsho phun 
34a7(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs// mig bzang phyug rgya rnyed napa ni// gos dang can dan phreng sogs kyis// rab tu brgyan te dbul bar bya// dri dang med sogs bsnyen bkur dang // chang dang ston po rgya chen dang // phyag rgya rabarnyas pa'i gtso bos ni// gus pas 
34a8(rgyud 'grel): 'bad dmang dag mchod// skabams dpas bras ltang // sa la lags par bcugs nas ni// thal myor bcas pa'i bstod pa 'dis// ston pa la ni gsol gdang bya// nam rtog thams cad spangs pa yi// stong nyid stong pa ba stid phyag/ 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can// ye shes sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa po// bdag don de nyid ston mdzad pa// chos bdag med las yang dag byung // rdo rje sems khyod la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems rnams dang // ma dang pha rol phyin yon tan// rtag tu mgon po khyod las byung // byang chub sems khyod la phyag 'tshal// dkon mchog gsum dang theg chen gyi// de nyid brtan dang g.yo bcas pa// khams gsum 'di dag 
34b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi// 'gro ba'i sa bon khyod la 'dud// 'gro don sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung // dpal ldan bde gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad// sangs rgyas sras po khyod la 'dud// yon tan rgya mtsho bka' drin
34b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi// de nyid bla med shes par 'tshal// kun mkhyen ye shes dbang bskur ba// da ltar bka' drin mdzad du gsol// dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po// rdo rje chos la bstan pa bzhin// de ring mgon
34b5(rgyud 'grel): pos bka' drin gsol// khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni// bdag la gzhan ni skyabs ma mchis// 'khor ba'i dgralas rab rgyal ba'i// mgon pos de phyir brtse bar mdzod// de nas dpal ldan slob dpon ni// phan pa'i bsam 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): pas rjes brtse bas// snying rje slob ma la bskyed de// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas gang ba'i// dril bu sil snyan skra dang bcas// bla re 'bar ba zes pa ru// me tog bdug pa nyams dga' 'jigs// phreng ba dri zhim mchog tu bde// 
34b7(rgyud 'grel): rdorje sems dpa' lan gyi lha// rnal 'byor ma ni rnal 'byor ldan// mchog tu rmad dbyung gnas gyur pa'i// tshogs kyi 'khor lor bkug nas ni// de nas slob dpon bskal bzangs kyis// phyag rgya dang ni sbyar byas te// rgyal ba'i gnas gyur 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems// pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni// bkra shis klu yi tshigs bcad dang // gdugs dang rnga yab rgyal mtshan bcas// phyag rgyar ldan pas slob ma ni// gro ba'i gtso bor dbang bskur bya// slob dpon dbang phyug mchog 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): gis ni// dbang bskur rin chen byin nas su// rang bzhin gsal zhing mngon sbyangs pa// dam tshig nyams dga' sbyin par bya// rin chen chen po ga bur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba dang // rdo rje yi ni chu dang bcas
35a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa dag las yang dag byung // 'di ni bu khyod dam tshig ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs// bzang pos rtag tu bskyang bar byos// de ni ston pa mnyan par gyis// srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing // bud med rin chen spang
35a3(rgyud 'grel): mi bya// khyod kyi slob dpon yod mi spang // sdom pa shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas// slob ma sdig dang bral bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sras mchog de la ni// rjes su gnang ba de nas sbyin// byang chub snying // 
35a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i mthar thug par// phyogs kyi 'khor lo kun tu ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa// sems can mchog gis bskor ba gyis// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin bdag/ yid bzhin nor ltar rgya che ba// chags dang bral zhing mi skyobs// 
35a5(rgyud 'grel): da ni sems can rnams don gyis// rjes gnang bcas pa'i dbang bskur thob// bya ba byas shing rab dga' bas// 'gro kun dga' bar byed pa yi// 'jam pa'i tshig ni brjod par bya// de ring bdag gson 'bras bu yod// de ring skye ba
35a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu yod// de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes// de ring sangs rgyas sras por gyur// skye la sogs pa'i rba rlabs dang // nyon mongs 'dam ni rgal dka' ba'i// rtog pa'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen las// mgon pos de ring bdag 
35a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgral to// khyod zhabs bka' drin shes nas su// byang chub gang gis bdag 'tshal ba'i// bag chags thams cad spangs nas su// rdzogs pa'i bzhin du bdag 'gyur ro// mig mdangs 'dzum dang bcas pa yi// gus pas zhabs 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): la btud nas su// 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// rdzas ni gang dang gang bzhed pa// de dang de ni dbul bar bya// bla ma thugs rje can gyis kyang // slob ma'i 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir// de la phan phyir blang bar bya// bla ma'i yon ni phul
35b1(rgyud 'grel): nas su// de nas mchod de phyag byas la// mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas// slar yang 'di yi mkhyen par gsol// de ring sangs rgyas mchog khyod kyis// bka' drin bdag gis thob par 'gyur// de mthus bla med byang chub ni// / 
35b2(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin bdag gis sgrub par bgyi// mchog kun gyis ni mchod pa'i gnas// bla med byang chub thob nas ni// srid gsum gnas pa'i sems can gnas// de nyid la ni dgod par bgyi// cho ga 'di dag nyid kyi dbang bskur byin nas na// slob ma'i 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis brtag byas la// zab cing rgya che ba la lhag par mos na ni// tshig gi rin chen dbang bskur sbyin par bya// dbang bskur mchog ni ma lus thob par gyur pa de// rdo rje mchog 'dzin rnyed dka' mtshungs pa med pa'i 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): pa du shwA sa// nga rgyab sems dbang rdzu hA/ rnam bsgru bas/ rgyang chub sems 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba nges par bstan pa rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o// // gzhan don la phan brtson 'grus can// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// shes rab thabs kyi bsgom pa mchog/ de nas 'di las gsal bshad bya// 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig bsgom pas 'khor ba yi// 'jigs dung rgal da ka'i rgya mtsho min// rang don tsam gyis mya ngan 'das// der yang rnal 'byor pa mi gnas// gang zhig rab kyi mthar phyin pas// dri med rmad byung sangs rgyas nyid// 'phel dang 
35b7(rgyud 'grel): 'grib las rnam grol ba'i// bla med byang chub skye 'gyur ba'o// phung po lnga la sogs chos rnams// gang yang dor bar bya min zhing // nam yang gzung bar bya ba'ang min// chos kun mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid// stong nyid sgom par bya min la// 
35b8(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid min pa'ang mi sgom mo// stong nyid rnal 'byor pas mi gtang // stong nyid min pa'ang yongs mi btang // stong nyid stong min nyid 'dzin pa// rtog pa rab rgyas skye bar 'gyur// yongs su btang ba'ang rtog pa ste// de bas de 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis yongs su spangs// 'dzin pa gnyis ka yongs btang na// chags bral rnam par grol ba'i gnas// de dang 'brel bdag ces pa yang // kun rtog de phyir de gnyis spang // chags pa med cing 'gyur ba med// sdig pa dang 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): bral mngon zhen med// thog ma tha ma'i rtog las grol// mkhas pas nam mkha' lta bur bsgom// snying rjer ldan pas sems can la// rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya'o// sems can yod dang med ces par// rnam rtog nyid
36a3(rgyud 'grel): nimi bya'o// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin gang // shes rab ces byar rab tu grags// yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhin du// ma lus 'gro don byed snying rje// mi dmigs gnas kyi shes rab dang // mi dmigs snying rje chen po ste// nam mkha' 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): la ni nam mkha' bzhin// blo ldan lhan cig gnyis su med// gang na'ang bsgom pa po med cing // rnam par bsgom pa'ang ci yang med// bsgom bya nyid kyang yod min pa// de ni de nyid bsgom par bshad// bya ba'ang cung zad yod min 
36a5(rgyud 'grel): la// dpyad par bya ba nyid kyang med// byed po dpyod pa las grol ba// don dam rnam par bsgom pa yin// gtong bar byed pa'ang yod min zhing // 'gog par byed pa'ang ci yang med// des na dor bar bya med cing // 'di la blang bya 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): gang yang med// gzugs rnams kun tu blta ba dang // de bzhin sgra rnams nyan pa dang // rgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang // ro rnams sna tshogs myang ba dang // las rnams thams cad byed pa ni// sems ni mi g.yo gnas byas nas// / 
36a7(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// rnal 'byor rgyun tu skye bar 'gyur// de nyid gnyis med brtan pa ste// byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nyid// pha rol phyin 
36a8(rgyud 'grel): pa kun dngos kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin 'di nyid// 'di ni mnyam nyid brjod pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bsgom pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs// brtan dang 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba'i bdag nyid kyi// 'gro ba thams cad 'di las skyes// dngos dang dngos med dang bral ba'i// rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid bsgom// dngos dang dngos med las grol ba// bsgom pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa ma lus dang bral zhing // nges par sdug bsngal ldog 'gyur na// dpal ldan bde gshegs yon tan ni// mtha' yas de las 'byung bar 'gyur// kun rtog mun pa sdug bsngal ba// stug pos mngon par zil gnon 
36b3(rgyud 'grel): cing // 'dod chags la sogs bzlog bka'i dri mas g.yogs gyur pa'i// rab tu 'thor rlung gis bskyod grogs ltar g.yo ba yi// sems ni 'khor ba yin par rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rtog pa las ni rnam par grol zhing
36b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal ba// 'dod chags la sogs dri ma'i sgrib g.yogs rab tu spangs// bzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa med na de nyid ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i don du sems can mchog gis gsungs// de bas sdug bsngal mang po tshogs kyi 
36b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyur gyur pa// 'di las gzhan pa gang yang yod pa ma yin la// thar 'dod 'phags pa khyed kyi bde ba dpag med pa// skye ba'i rgyur yang 'di las gzhan pa gang yang med// sdug bsngal ma lus zad bya'i go cha bgos nas 
36b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde mchog thob par 'dod pa yi// sems ni brtan byas de la 'bad de dpyad byas la// de yi rang bzhin bdag gi rang bzhin nyid du bya// skye ldan rnams kyi yid 'di ji srid rtog pa'i mun 
36b7(rgyud 'grel): pa snam bu 'thug pos dkris gyur pa// de srid sdug bsngal dpag tu med yin de nas de ni ji srid bshus par gyur pa na// de srid bde ba rgya chen mtshungs med yin pas 'phags mchog de la nan tan gyis shig dang // de zad nas/ 
36b8(rgyud 'grel): ni de nyid la gnas yon tan rgyas pa rang nyid kyis ni snang bar 'gyur// de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa las de kho na nyid bsgom pa'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// // chos kun mnyam 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid rmad byung ba// de nyid spyod pa bla na med// rnam rtog dgra rnams gsod byed pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa gzhan// rdzogs sangs rgyas la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas la phan bya'i phyir// de nyid yan lag med// 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes// de nas 'di las gsal bshad bya// na ba la sogs rba rlabs 'khrigs// skye ba'i rgya mtshor cher 'jigs las// 'byung po thams cad sgrol ba'i gru// nyes med par ni 'gro ba'i gru// yid 'ong yon tan kun gyi 
37a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// myur du dngos grub bzang po byed// 'dod pa'i don kun rab sgrub pa// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung // ma lus pa yi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyur 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin pas rab tu bsngags pa ste// 
37a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ma gtogs par dngos grub skye bar 'gyur ba min// de phyir thar pa 'dod pas spyod pa mnyam med 'di spyad bya// lha min sgra dang brgya byin grong khyer gsum dgra nor sbyin tshangs sogs rnams kyi zhabs kyi 
37a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar mchod byas pa// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phangs mchog ni myur du thob byed sdig pa zad byed 'di ni mkhas pas spyad par bya// dpal rdo rje sems dpas 'gro la phan pa'i phyir yang dag spyod pa 'di gsungs te// 
37a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs gzhan dag ma lus gdul bya'i skye bo du ma'i dbang du byas nas ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs bla med dngos grub ma lus rab sgrub min// kun bzang mtshungs med spyod pa 'di las 'grub 
37a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can// mgon la kun nas phyag byas la// bya ba byas pa'i blo can gyis// gsang ba'i spyod pa brten par bya// de nas rang 'dod nges byas la// 'du 
37a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dzi kun la rgyab phyogs te// seng ge'i bdag nyid kun rgyu ba// de nyid ldan pas spyad par bya// 'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis// ji bzhin yang dag don rig pas// yang dag ldan pas 'jug pa bdag/ gnas med 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): sems ni brtan par bya// khams gsum 'di dag de nyid de// phung po khams la sogs mtshan nyid// thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam bzhin// mdor bsdus 'di ltar shes byas la// 'gyod dang rmugs dang gnyid la sogs// 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rgya chen 'du 'dzi dang // de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad po// shin tu thag ring spang bar bya// gnyis med nges par byas nas ni// rtag tu g.yo ba med pa yis// pha rol phyin drug sbyor ba ni// sangs rgyas dngos grub sgrub/ 
37b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// sems can rnam par mi rtog bzhin// sems can don la shin tu chags// sems ni byang chub nges byas la// de nyid spyod pa la brten bya// shes rab thabs su ldan pa yis// chags pa kun la rgyab bstan te// 
37b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid goms pa la 'bad pas// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// bdag byin brlab par rab gsal bas// sems ni ji ltar rjes 'thun par// sngags kyi lam las rab bshad pa'i// dam tshig dag ni kun spyad bya// 
37b5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs dang bdud tshogs zhi bya'i phyir// bdud rtsi lnga po byin gyis brlabs// bshang gci la sogs rnams gnas pa// 'di ni bsrung ba bla med yin// rims dang dug dang dbyig du gnang// mkha' 'gro mo dang 
37b6(rgyud 'grel): gdon gyi 'tshe// bdud dang log 'dren nyid dag ni// 'di yi rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// mi dang rnga mo las byung dang // rta dang glang po las byung ba// lnga pa khyi las byung ba ste// sgron ma shes rab can gyi bza'// sems ni dga' bar byed 
37b7(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// dam tshig chen po gzhan dag kyang // rlung ni 'khrug pa zhi bya'i phyir// thugs kyi rdo rje can mnyes bya// thams cad du ni thar 'dod pas// shes rab pha rol phyin bsten bya// dam pa'i don du gang gnas pa// kun rdzob dag/ 
37b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lus bzung nas// bud med mdzes pa'i gzugs kyis ni// thams cad du ni kun tu gnas// de bas phyi rol don las byung // rdo rje mgon pos don de gsungs// bram ze rigs sogs las byung dang // mtha' las 
38a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang phyag rgya dang // gzhan gyi chung ma tshul nyams dang // dman dang cha lugs mi sdug dang // skyed ma dang ni skrag mo dang // rang gi bu mo sring mo dag/ de nyid sbyor bas don spyod na// sgrub po myur du 'grub par 
38a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// sems ni tshim par byed pa yi// gling bu sogs las byung ba mnyan// phyi rol phyag rgya kar na// ro de sna tshogs tshim byed bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan mchog rnams kyis// 
38a3(rgyud 'grel): sems ni rin chen dag bya'i phyir// rtag tu bdag nyid mchod par bya// chu skyes rdo rje chu dang ni// sgron ma'i 'o ma rab rgyas mchod// phreng dang tsan dan gos bzod sogs// sems ni skyo ba med par bya// bgrod dang 
38a4(rgyud 'grel): bgrod min sogs pa ni// 'dir ni nam yang bya ba min// snyam lta bu sogs sbyor bas// thams cad la ni longs spyod bya// chos kyi dbyings las byung bas na// mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med// dogs pa med/ 
38a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin rab spyod bya// sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa// 'di dag thams cad longs spyad phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa yin// ye shes 
38a6(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas rnyed pa yi// de bzhin gshegs la'ang phyag min na// rtag tu bsgom la 'grus pa yis// lugs ma la sogs smos ci dgos// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 
38a7(rgyud 'grel): te// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// de bas bdag nyid lha yin no// spung ba dang ni dkyil 'khor 'bri// phyag rgyab cing dang mchod rten las sbyin sreg dang ni gsang sngags bzlos// po ti klog pa la sogs pa// dpal ldan rdo rje mgon po 
38a8(rgyud 'grel): yis// bos pa'i dbang du mdzad nas ni// gzhan dgal ni bstan pa ste// de nyid rig pa'i sems kyis min// mang mar 'dod pas snying po ni// thangs te dar ba 'dor bar byed// de ltar chos kyi snying thob pas// rtog pa ma 
38b1(rgyud 'grel): lus spang bar bya// rnam par mi rtog gnas blo can// gnas min dogs pa spang byas na// thugs kyi rdo rje bka' bzhin du// de nas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// phyag rgya sbyor bas kun tu 'khyud// rdo rje bcug/ 
38b2(rgyud 'grel): ste bskyod pa dang // ma mchu'i spyang mchog btung bya zhing // de yi mgrin pa'i sgra gsal ba// blang zhing dul bas longs spyad na// nges par dga' ba rgya chen gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod pa'i rgyal// ring por 
38b3(rgyud 'grel): mi thogs 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar yid 'khrugs mi 'gyur bas// de lta de ltar spyad par bya// sems kyi rang bzhin 'khrugs gyur na// nam yang dngos grub 'gyur ma yin// de bas dngos grub mchog 'dod pa'i// / 
38b4(rgyud 'grel): grub pa pos ni 'dzin pa spang // sems dang rjes 'thur sbyor ba yis// dngul chu bzung bar bsgrub ji bzhin// thabs kyi gzhi yi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin sems kyi dngul chu bzung // sbyor ba dag ni gang yin pa// 
38b5(rgyud 'grel): de ru de yi gnas par bya// dus dang grangs ni yongs spangs nas// de nyid rig pas 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med mtshungs pa med pa gang yin nyin re zhing // de nyid mchog ni rgyun tu rjes su bsten par bya// 
38b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di sa rje pa / pa wA ba sapa nga ba/ sa sma swA na// mchog sheg 'byang sgrub ba gA/ de bzhin gyis de ma 
38b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'byed de// 'jig rten gsum gyi sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir// nyin rer brtson 'grus go cha chen po bgos nas su// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje sems// yon tan ma lus pa yi gter 
38b8(rgyud 'grel): gyur bsgom par bya// sems ni byang chub ngo bor gzhag nas yul gyi ni// bde la dga' bas tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rang bzhin gyis ni ma lus 'di dag rnam dag ste// tha mal yul rnams bdag med sgyu malta 
39a1(rgyud 'grel): bu dang // mig 'phrul dang ni mig yor dag dang mtshungs pa ste// gnas med rtog pa'i tha snyad dag las rnam par grol// gang tshe skyes bu dag pa rgya che bsam pa dang // 'dzin pa med pa'i sems
39a2(rgyud 'grel): ni kun tu rtogs 'gyur ba// de tshe lhan cig skyes pa'i rtog pa zil mnan te// yul 'di rnams kyi nus pa 'ching bar nus ma yin// gang rnams rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags dang // bde ba dang ni sdug 
39a3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal rab tu rgyas pa dang // bstod dang smod pa'i dri ma rab tu ma lus pa// zad pa rang gi sems ni mnyam pa nyid du bya// chags pa med dang 'gro la snying ni brtse ba yi// rnam par rtog pa thams cad las/ 
39a4(rgyud 'grel): grol spyod pa dang // ldan pa de yi phyag na bde gshegs go 'phang ni// gnas pa yin zhes rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gsungs// gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i blo can gyi// skye bo gshes ngan kha yi bu ga ni// 
39a5(rgyud 'grel): zab zla'i b+h+yanas byu cig das // rtsub pa'i lngas 'i ga 'jigs mi 'byung / shi d+hi pa dga' bred rod kyi thed can te// 'od zem tsha skyes kyis ni bzod par min sa skar/ yid 'brog byed pa'i 
39a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi mang du bshad pa yang // skye bo 'dzangs min yid ni chags par byed pa min// zla ba'i 'od zer de nyid chu shel nor bu dang // shin tu nye bar 'dus nas bdud rtsi chu 'dzag bzhin// de nyid skye bo bzang yid
39a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi ros brlan zhing // mi gnas 'chi ma 'dzag bzhin chags par byed// de bas bdag ni chos nyid gnas pa'i skye bo bzang // 'phags pa shes ldan khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni// bdag gis mdor/ 
39a8(rgyud 'grel): bsdus te gsal bar bya ba ni// rab mchog gang yin de ni khyod la dbul bar bgyi// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa ni// bdag gis kyang ni 'di ru de bzhin nges par bstan// 
39b1(rgyud 'grel): ci ste nyes par sbas pa yod gyur pa// de lta na yang 'phags pa bzod par zhu// bla ma zhabs kyi pad+mar bsten pas rnam sprul pa'i// bdud rtsi dge ba rnams kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba// gang yin can de 'gro ba rnams kyi 
39b2(rgyud 'grel): thun mongs yun rang du// pan byed ma lus brtse bas bdag gis byas pa ste// dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum gyi rgya mtsho yon tan mtsho// rab mchog lha dang lha min dbang po'i cod pan gyis// sgrub thabs de nyid rig pa rnams 
39b3(rgyud 'grel): la myur du ni// 'bras bu ster ba gang yin 'di ni byas pa las// bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen thob gyur pa// 'di yis 'gro rnams rtog pa'i dgra yi tshogs las ni// rgyal bar 'gyur te blo ldan yon tan rgyur 'gyur ba// byang chub 
39b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dang de dag shin tu ldan gyur cig/ de dag ni thabs dang shes rab rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa las// de kho na nyid kyi spyod pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o// / thabs dang shes rab rnam par 
39b5(rgyud 'grel): gtan la dbab pa'i sgrub pa slob dpon chen po yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lha btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @6/ ye shes grub pa 
39b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sgru thabs dam zer blos mdzad pa bzhugs so// @#/ rgya gar sad du/ dz+nyA na sid+d+hi nA ma sA d+ha no pe k+Sha/ bod skad du/ ye shes grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 
39b7(rgyud 'grel): kun dang dngos grub ni// nam mkha' lta bur khyab gyur pa// rgyal mchog mchod dang bcas pa yi// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje mchog/ sems can kun la kun gsol ba'i// 'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal te// dngos 
39b8(rgyud 'grel): grub kun la bdag gus pas// sgrub pa'i rim 'di bshad par bya// ma lus sbyor rgyud las gsungs pa'i// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// rmongs pa gang gis mi shes pa// de ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyam/ 
40a1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig rtog pa kun spangs pa'i// de nyid la ni yang dag gnas// sgrub pa po de tshe 'di yis// byang chub dam par gnas par 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sogs// bzlas dang bsgom la 'bad pa 
40a2(rgyud 'grel): yis// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du'ang // dngos grub mchog ni thob mi 'gyur// gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs// longs spyod dbang phyug stobs rnams dang // rigs dang rgyud dang gtsor
40a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i// sems la nga rgyal bcang mi bya// bdag ni blo ldan mkhas pa dang // bzo dang sgyu rtsal thams cad la// mkhas pa dag ni rgyal po zhes// sems ni bskyed par mi bya'o// tshul khrims ldan zhing thos 
40a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan brtan// sbyin pa la sogs yang dag ldan// bshad dang gzhan yang ma bshad pas// bdag tu dmigs par mi bya zhing // sems can kun gyi yid khyab par// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid zhugs// de ltar 
40a5(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas rnal 'byor gyis// dbang pos gang la'ang brnyas mi bya// byis pa blun dang dbul po dang // tshul khrims 'chal cing nad kyis gzir// de la sogs pa dpag med dang // yang dag ldan yang
40a6(rgyud 'grel): brnyas mi bya// dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus// byang chub sems kyis rnam par brgyan// sems can kun la rjes su brtse// dam tshig dang ni sdom la gnas// dri chen dmar dang sha nyid dag/ byang chub 
40a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dang rab sres la// chu chen dang ni yang dag ldan// de nyid rig pas rtag tu bza'// mi khyi rta dang ba lang sgron// sA can dang ni khur skyed kyi'ang // rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs la// de nyid grub phyir bza' 
40a8(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// srid gsum las byung bsad bya zhing // pha rol nor ni 'phrog pa dang // gzhan gyi bud med la 'dod spyod// brdzun gyi tshig ni smra bar byed// las gang gis ni sems can rnams// bskal pa
40b1(rgyud 'grel): bye ba ba rgya phrag tu'ang // mi zad dmyal bar 'tshed 'gyur ba// des ni rnal 'byor pa grol 'gyur// thabs chen yang dag ldan pa yi// rnal 'byor 'jig rten don sgrub pa// sems can kun gyis smad pa yi// bya ba de la mi bya me// 
40b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs dang ldan pa la// sdig par grags pa yod med ces// rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa las// rdo rje can ni nyid kyis gsungs// bza' dang bza' mi ni las 'das dang // btung dang btung min rnam par spangs// bgrod 
40b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bzod min ma tho bdag / nam 'thor pa'i mnyam 'jog 'gyur// na 'brel las byu yang dag pos// dngos po thams cad rnam par btug/ 'a dag pa sa na ma grol zhing // skye ba med pa bdag med can// 
40b4(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma 'dra sogs dpe yis ni// de rnams sbyor bar rab shes pas// nga dang bdag ni rnam rtog dag/ de nyid shes pas der mi bya// rdo rje chen pos kun khyab cing // nam mkha' kun la rab tu zhugs// sems 
40b5(rgyud 'grel): tsacani kun gyis yid khyab cing // bsod nams thams cad 'byung ba che// phan tshun khyab mdzad rdo rje ni// kun rig 'jig rten 'dren pa po// de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// rgyud rnams kun tu gsungs pa yin// gang la 
40b6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i drin yod pa// de yi de nyid mchod rten 'gyur// gzhan du byis pas yun ring du// rnam par rmongs pas nyon mongs 'gyur// tha mas sangs rgyas chos 'gyur cing // dge 'dun yang ni de bzhin te// de yi drin 
40b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis shes 'gyur bas// de bas dkon mchog gsum yin no// mi shes rab rib kyis ldongs la// 'di ni lam rab ston byed yin// bde ba kun gyi mchog 'gyur dang // 'dod pa thams cad rab ster 
40b8(rgyud 'grel): yin// zab mo'i chos la nges pa'i bdag/ shin tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can// dkon mchog gsum rnams don du gnyer// chos sbyin pa la zang zing med// bla ma de ni slob ma sdud// sangs rgyas kun rjes sgrub 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): byed cing // 'gro ba'i mgon gyis bka' stsal te// gzhan dag bla ma min par bshad// de bas de dang mnyam pa yi// mchod bya blo chen yod ma yin// des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis// brtul zhugs
41a2(rgyud 'grel): can ni bra mchog mchod// de snyam 'gro ba 'jig rten na// khams gsum na ni gzhan med de// rdo rje sems nyid 'jig rten na// phun sum tshogs kun phyir zhugs yin// slob ma phun tshogs mchog 'dod cing // 
41a3(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams mi zad 'dod pa dang // bgegs kun rnam par bzlog byed pas// rnam pa du mas mnyes par bya// dam tshig dag ni thams cad kyis// bla med dam tshig 'di yin te// phun sum tshogs kun ster 
41a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// brtson ldan rnams kyis rtag tu bsrung // rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// ye shes mchog bzang thob pa yi// rdo rje ye shes dbang bskur bas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// yang dag ye 
41a5(rgyud 'grel): shes kun ldan na// bris pa'i dkyil 'khor logs gzhan du// dbang bskur ba ni len ce na// 'di ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pas sdug bsngal ni// lus dang de bzhin yid dang ni// de yi don
41a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams nyams 'gyur zhing // myur ba nyid du shi bar 'gyur// shi nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ni// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu'ang // myong nas gnas las 'phos gyur na yang // gdol pa 'am dman pa'i rigs su skye// 
41a7(rgyud 'grel): lpags pa 'am yang na 'on pa'am// skye zhing skye bar dmus long du// skye bar 'gyur bar the tshom med// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// rdo rje ye shes zhes byar bshad// blo ldan de yi dbang bskur na/ dbang bskur ba na shes 
41a8(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// 'gro ba'i bdag po lha sogs pa'i// tshogs kyis thal mo sbyar nas ni// byas nas mngon par phyag byed 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen dang // bdag nyid/ 
41b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po sangs rgyas kyang // dpal chen bsrung ba mdzad gyur te// rdo rje sku yi rtag tu bzhugs// bden pa'i chos 'dzin mi 'khrug cing // sangs rgyas gdung ni rab 'jug pa// byin gyis brlabs dang ldan pa 
41b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// gus dang bcas pas bsngags par mdzad// 'jig rten skyong dang de bzhin gzhan// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa rnams// gnas rnams kun tu rtogs pa na'ang // bsrung bzhin du ni rab tu gnas// gang 
41b3(rgyud 'grel): yang sems can thams cad la// bdud dang bgegs su gnas pa rnams// de yang de la mi byed de// bgegs rnams skrag nas 'byer bar 'gyur// lha la sogs dang grub pa rnams// mkha' la rgyu dang mi rgyu kun// 
41b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'gror 'gro bas 'jigs pas na// de yang de la 'jigs mi byed// gal te rmongs pa'i dbang gis ni// rnam par rmongs rnams mgon byed na// brtson dang ye shes rnam shes dang // dngos grub dag kyang 
41b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams par 'gyur// kun mkhyen mchog sbyin gsungs pa'o// dbyibs kun dang ni rnam bral zhing // 'gro dang 'od las rnam grol bdag/ rlung kun gyis kyang bskyod mi nus// me yi phung pos mi tshig cing // 
41b6(rgyud 'grel): chu rnams kyis kyang g.yengs mi 'gyur// rab tu 'bad pas mtshon cha ni// rnon pos kyang ni chod mi 'gyur// ji ltar mi gnas nam mkha' ni// khyab cing mtshan nyid rnams dang bral// 'di ni don dam de nyid de// 
41b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ye shes bla med yin// kun tu bzang po zhes bshad cing // phyag rgya chen po zhes kyang bya// 'di ni chos skur shes bya ste// me long ye shes zhes kyang bya// ji ltar gzugs brnyan me long la// rang nyid nges par 
41b8(rgyud 'grel): snang ba ltar// de bzhin chos skur ye shes ni// snang bas me long zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes dang // rang gi dad ni 'gro ba'i yang // dngos nyid gcig pur thugs su chud// mnyam nyid ye shes 
42a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o// gdod nas dag cing skye ba med// rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal ba// par tshun khyab pa'i ye shes pas// so sor rtog pa can zhes bshad// kun tu kun nas sangs rgyas kyis// mdzad pa// / 
42a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la 'jug pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mdzad gcig pas// bya ba sgrub pa zhes bshad do// gang tshe nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib// thams cad las grol de yi tshe// rnal 'byor pa mchog rdo rje can// shin tu rnam// 
42a3(rgyud 'grel): dag ces bshad do// ji ltar gdul ba'i chos rnams dang // 'dod yon kun las sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad longs spyod gcig pas na// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur 'dod do// mtshan rnams kun dang 
42a4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag ldan// sna tshogs sku ste mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa bas// sprul pa'i skur ni bshad pa yin// phyag rgya chen po rab sgrub phyir// shes nas rnal 'byor pas de bsgom// kun rtag 
42a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam spangs na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag mdzad pa// phyag rgya che zhes shes par bya// grub sde du ma'i rgyud rnams su// rnal 'byor mchog rnams la bstan te/ 
42a6(rgyud 'grel): mngal 'byung rig pa gang yin dang // zhing dang zhing du so sor brtul// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// der ni yang dag brtul zhugs 'dzin// gzhon nu'i rol pa thams cad dang // de bzhin bzog nas 
42a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bsdar// btsun po'i 'khor las mngon 'byung zhing // bdud rnams 'dul bar mdzad nyid dang // lha yul nas ni 'bab pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mya ngan 'das chen yang dag bstan/ 
42a8(rgyud 'grel): gang yang rol pa gzhan rnams dang // thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin las// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom// 'dir ni sngon chad ma byung med// sngon gnas pa ni sbyor mi bya// de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad 
42b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos bzhi pa// dus gsum lam gyi mthar thug pa// thams cad de bzhin lta bar bya// ngag gi spyod yul kun las 'das// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa// sangs rgyas 
42b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kun sbyar ba po// rnal 'byor 'di ltar bsam par bya// sa kun las ni rnal 'byor zhing // rga dang 'bras bu rnam spangs la// grub pa bzhin du rnal 'byor bsgom// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje can kun/ 
42b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa// thabs kyi cho ga kun shes nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i gsung bzhin du// bla med de ni grub par 'gyur// 'dug dang nyal dang gnas pa dang // yang na 'chag pa dag la yang // rdo rje tshig ni spu byed na// rdo rje 
42b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang reg/ brtul zhugs can ni rtag spyod tshe// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni// bya'o zhes ni yang dag spyod// de bzhin bza' dang gis sogs sam// 
42b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang ci yang rung ba dag/ sems can rnams la ci ster ba// cho ga de bzhin spyad par bya// glu gar de bzhin rol mo dang // me tog phreng sogs rgyan rnams dang // chun 'phyang rnga yab gdugs rnams kyis// pha 
42b6(rgyud 'grel): rol bdag nyid mchod par bya// dri bzangs dri yi byug pa sogs// cho ga bzhin du byugs pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran zhing // rnal 'byor pas ni thams cad mchod// brtul zhugs can nam mgo bregs 
42b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'am// khyim pa 'am bsnyen bkur ba dag gam// rgyal po 'am sde dpon rnams kyang rung // brtul zhugs can gyis ji bzhin spyad// rnal 'byor pa ni ci spyod pa// thams cad du ni sma mi bya// rtog pa kun las rnam/ 
42b8(rgyud 'grel): krogrol bas// ji ltar 'dod par bya ba byed// de ni dngos kun ngo bo ste// khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par spyod// sems can kun gyi snying la bzhugs// de nyid thams cad bla 
43a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa// de nyid rnal 'byor dbang po sa bsgom// rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun 'grub pa// rdo rje nyid ni myur thob 'gyur// 'dir ni bgegs med bdud kyang med// thams cad kyang ni dbang du 'gyur// sdug 
43a2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal kun las rnam par grol// brtul zhugs can gyi bdag nyid sgrub// bdag nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// brtul zhugs che ldan gang tshe mthong // nyin zhag dang ni tshad bral bar// sangs rgyas thams cad// 
43a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'grub 'gyur// mchod pa kun gyi khyad par gyis// bdag nyid la ni rtag tu mchod// rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa// phan tshun du yang de bzhin sbyin// sems can kun lus las byung dang // phyi sa las 
43a4(rgyud 'grel): byung srog chags rnams// rnal 'byor chen pos legs blangs la// de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya// sgron ma che dang yang dag ldan// spad ba'i dam tshig gzhan rnams dang // bdud rtsi lnga rnams rtag bza' zhing // 
43a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mchod// yan lag kun ni smad pa dang // brnyas pa dag tu mi bya ste// bud med rigs kun las byung ba// rdo rje can gyis mchod par bya// ma skyes me tog yang dag ldan// byang 
43a6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dang ldan pa dag/ mi rtog cho ga la gnas te// de nyid grub phyir bza' bar bya// swesme sha can gyi rigs las byung // sme sha can dang khyad par du// smad pa'i rigs las byung ba rnams// brten na dngos 
43a7(rgyud 'grel): grub thob par 'gyur// bram ze la sogs rigs las byung // bu mo rnal 'byor pas sprad de// ji ltar sems sun mi 'byin pa// de ltar shin tu mdzes par bya// spang ma skyugs pas 'dres pa dang // bshar la 
43a8(rgyud 'grel): sogs dang bsres pa yi// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid mchod// ci 'dod bya ba byed pa dang // ji dga' bar ni spyod pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub bya ste// gzhan du nges 
43b1(rgyud 'grel): par nyon mongs 'gyur// brtul zhugs spang ba sdom pa dang // sna tshogs phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i// lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa yi// sgrub pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam gling rdul phran mnyam pa yi// 
43b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags bzlas dang bsgom pa la// brtson pa che dang ldan gyur kyang // sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dpag med pa'i// byis pa rnams kyis brtags tshul gyis// bde 'gro skye ba 
43b3(rgyud 'grel): rnyed dga' na// rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar 'gyur// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gzugs la sogs// bcom ldan thub pas gsungs pa ni// yang dag ye shes mnyam sbyor gyis// skal ba dang bral ba dag 
43b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid la'o// gang zhig rang rig ngo bo nyid// de nyid rin chen bla med pa// lung dang rig pa'i tshul gyis ni// gang zhig 'dzin par mi nus pa// mi shes rmongs pas kun tu khebs// spyod pa med pa'i blo/ 
43b5(rgyud 'grel): can rnams// dang po'i las can rnal 'byor te// dman pa'i chos kyi snod yin te// 'gro ba mgon gyis de don du// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs bsgom pa// sku mdog phyag mtshan kun ldan zhing // phyag 
43b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gsungs// gang yang gzhan rkyen kha ra ma las// zab mo'i ye shes dag gi snod// sdig pa'i grogs dang bdud dang bgegs// log 'dren rnams kyis mi bskyod pa// 
43b7(rgyud 'grel): de la de nyid dag pa ni// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// sems can kun dang tshangs sogs kyis// rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa'i// shin tu rmad 'byung ye shes ni// sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba 
43b8(rgyud 'grel): dag/ tshe 'di nyid la grub byed pa// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yin// ye shes grub pa las/ phyag rgya chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo las// phung po 
44a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga ni rgyal bar bshad// khams rnams spyan la sogs yin te// de bas sangs rgyas skur 'dod do// de lta yin na srog chags kun// srid gsum rtag tu rdzogs sangs rgyas// 
44a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid phyir bya kun dang // thos dang bsgom pa don med do// 'jig rten thams cad sangs rgyas na// phongs pa kun kyang mi 'byung la// bde dang sdug bsngal bsgom la sogs// gnod pa 
44a3(rgyud 'grel): de la yod ma yin// gal te sangs rgyas skar gyur na// mngon shes drag la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas yon tan 'byor pa yang // ci phyir de dag med par 'gyur// gang yang de ltar mi shes pa// de 
44a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs ji ltar 'gyur// 'ga' zhig de ltar shes pa ni// 'di ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yin// ga shig rims kyis brlabs pa yi// sbyor bas sems ni 'jug 'gyur ba'i// rnal 'byor pa ni 
44a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'gyur// gzhan dag sangs rgyas 'grub pa min// gal te ngang gis sangs rgyas na// bslab pa dgongs pa ci zhig yod// rig par bcas pa'i goms bya yin// rig pa med par goms bya/ 
44a6(rgyud 'grel): min// gal te mgon med skye ba 'ga'// rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bsgoms pas// bskal pa bye ba brgya yis kyang // 'di ni rgyal po thob mi 'gyur// gang zhig log pa'i rtog pas ni// gang la rgyal 
44a7(rgyud 'grel): po yod min ltar// de bzhin log par bsgoms pa yis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ma yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rgyud rgyal du// phung po skye mched la sogs pa/ de nyid dam tshig skad ces pas// / 
44a8(rgyud 'grel): de dang de ming gis bstan pa// dri chen rnam snang zhes bshad de// gci ba de bzhin rdo rje chu// ji ltar mo dbang pad+ma ste// ji ltar po dbang rdo rje yin// gang phyir lung dang rig pa yi// rjes 'brang smra bar mi 
44b1(rgyud 'grel): nus pas// de bas gang gis lha yi sku// sma bar nus pa ma yin no// gal te byas pa'i lha yi gzugs// rdo rje sems dpa' gyur na go// gang phyir 'dus byas las byung bas// bum pa la sogs/ 
44b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du 'jug/ de bas byang chub spyod pa'i// du ma'ang 'bras bu med par 'gyur// gal te byung nas zhig 'gyur na// bsgom pa nyid ni don cir 'gyur// yid kyi rang bzhin byas pa'i gzugs// 
44b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dus byas yin zhes bshad// de dang de ni ji ltar 'jig/ rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho khyod nyon cig/ 'di rnams sems kyis brtags pa ste// de yang 'dus byas mtshan nyid na// yid kyis 
44b4(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa gang yin de// mi 'jigs par ni ji ltar 'gyur// phyag dang sku mdog yang dag ldan// ji ltar sngon nas rnam bzhugs pa// ma byas pa yi lha'i sku// gal te de nyid du bsgom bya// ma skyes 
44b5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bor gnas pa ste// bsgoms pas dgos pa ci zhig yod// de 'dra'i gzugs su ma gyur pas// de 'dir bdag ces bgom pas ra// rnal 'byor pa rnams gzugs bsgom pa// de 'dra'i 
44b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su gyur pa'am// de ni bdag yin zhes sgom bya// bsgom pa gnyis su 'di rnams brtag/ de 'drar bdag ni 'gyur ro zhes// gang tshe bsam gtan gyis brtags pa// gang che bsam gtan 
44b7(rgyud 'grel): gsal gyur pa// lha rnams su yang de snang 'gyur// khyod kyi ras ris sogs gzugs ltas// gang tshe bsam gtan rnams bsgoms pa// de ni 'ong 'gyur bsam gtan gyis// de bzhin skyes par 
44b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba yin// ma skyes pa yi lha yi sku// khyod kyis bsam gtan gyis byin ra// mngon shes thams cad 'byung 'gyur zhing // de gzugs kyang skad cig des// de ltar khyod la yang dag med// bsam 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): gtan gyis ni gang du 'ongs// khyed nyid kyis ni bskyed pa'i sku// bcos ma yin par bcos ma rtogs// bdag nyid de yin zhes phyogs kyang // gnyis pa der ni yod min te// grub pa'i rna 
45a2(rgyud 'grel): pa min min na// bsam gtan brtag pa ji lta bu// kun mkhyen nyid ni thams cad mkhyen// slar yang thob par med bzhin to// sangs rgyas mdzad pa khyod byed na// sangs rgyas nyid pas byed bcug mod// 
45a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar yang dag khyed la med// ji ltar log par rtog par byed// ma byas sangs rgyas sku gang yin// de dag yin zhes bya don med// ma byas pa yi lha yi sku// de ni de ltar rnam par dpyad // gzugs ni yin// / 
45a4(rgyud 'grel): pas bum sogs yin// ma byas de spu nus ma yin// de bas 'gro ba'i mgon po yis// byis pa rnams kyis rtog pa'i phyir// sku yi mi rtag ston mdzad pas// mya ngan 'das pa gnyis brtan mdzad// 
45a5(rgyud 'grel): de bas sangs rgyas skur ldan par// 'jig rten gar yang 'byung ma yin// sangs rgyas skur ni rab sgrub phyir// gzugs kyi bsgom par bya ba min// ji ltar sangs rgyas gzugs med pa'i// rig pa bems 
45a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdag nyid nyon// yul na gnas gyur gzugs can ni// mngon shes drug tu ji ltar 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched la rnams// mig gi skye mched la sogs// 
45a7(rgyud 'grel): pa// de rnams der ni 'ongs ma yin// gang tshe mig la sogs pa yi// 'gro ba dmigs par mi 'gyur na// de rnams ji ltar phrad par 'gyur// ma phrad na ni kun rig min// seng nas shes par 'gyur zhe na// 
45a8(rgyud 'grel): rims kyis shes par ji ltar nus// shes bya du ma'i ngo bo bas// thams cad mkhyen pa de 'dra med// sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa yi// de bas dgongs pa yod ma yin// mig sogs dbang po ma 
45b1(rgyud 'grel): gtogs pa// lus gzhan dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan lta bur sems med par// sangs rgyas sku ni shes byas na// gang phyir yang dag rigs med pas// sangs rgyas sku ni kun 
45b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen min// rtser ldan rnams kyi lha yi spyan// sangs rgyas rnams la mnga' bar bshad// lha yi snyan ni thams cad mnga'// ji ltar thams cad mkhyen te min// gal te ye shes kyis mkhyen na/ 
45b3(rgyud 'grel): de tshe sangs rgyas skus ci bya// skur gnas ye shes der rig pas// de bas sku ni skra mkhyen yin// sku las tha dad tha dad min// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni// sku dang yan lag ldan zhe na// mya ngan 
45b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das na de yang 'jig/ lus ni 'jig pa'i chos can pas// ye shes kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur// de bas sangs rgyas ye shes sku// 'jig par rig pa ma yin no// sku med pas na sku mkhyen min// rten 
45b5(rgyud 'grel): 'brel las byung ye shes de// de bas 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur// nyams 'gyur ye shes sku rnams ni// thams cad mkhyen nyid mi rigs so// de bas sangs rgyas sku dag ni// thams cad mkhyen par bya ba 
45b6(rgyud 'grel): min// ye shes las gzhan phyogs la yang // sangs rgyas skur ni ji ltar 'gyur// 'di ltar sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan du// de ltar rnal 'byor smra ba'i rigs// gang zhig 'jig rten rmongs pa 
45b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams// gzugs gang bsam par 'dod pa ni// sangs rgyas ye shes rab sgrub phyir// nam mkha' za bar 'dod pa yin// 'gro la snying rje dman pa dang // thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa// 
45b8(rgyud 'grel): zab cing rgya che'i chos rnams la// de rnams blo gros yod ma yin// de lta'i chos dang bral ba ni// phan tshun dag ni chug pa na// chos la rmongs rnams smyon pa bzhin// g.yangs dag tu btung 'gyur 
46a1(rgyud 'grel): ba// de dag kun la khyad par du// snying rje chen po bya ba ste// yang dag ye shes nyer shes pas// de la brnyas par rigs ma yin// ye shes grub pa las gzugs su bsgom pa dgag 
46a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de ltar gzugs su bsgom pa yi// rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'grub ste// rnam bcus rtog pas kyang de bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' mi 'grub po// rnam nyid / 
46a3(rgyud 'grel): shes de yin pas// rnam pa las ni tha dad 'gyur// 'on te rnam pa ye shes 'gyur// de ltar 'di ni mi rigs so// rnam pa ye shes de min te// shes la rnam pa nyid med de// dper na brab pa mthar 
46a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur// mkha' yang bum par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs med gzugs su mi 'gyur te// gzugs med gzugs can yod ma yin// ye shes gzugs ni med par grags// rnam pa gzugs/ 
46a5(rgyud 'grel): can yin par bshad// ji ltar de gnyis gzhan min nyid// 'gyur ba yin zhes brtag par bya// rnam par ye shes nyid yin zhes// rtog pa 'di yang mi rigs so// nges par gzhan du thal 
46a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba// mdo tsam du ni mnyan par bgyi// gal te rnam de shes yi rar// 'das byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur// ngo bo 'dus ma byas 'gyur ba// byis pa rnams la yod ma yin// byis pa 
46a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang rnam 'jig nyid// sangs rgyas ye shes ji ltar 'gyur// thog mtha' med cing zhi ba zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam gsungs la// de sras rgyal ba chen po yang // ye shes 'dus 
46a8(rgyud 'grel): bas min zhes gsungs// de kun sgyu ma lta bu dang // mig yor lta bur nges bshad de// phye dang 'gag pa med pa dag/ ye shes su de cis mi 'gyur// mig gi rnam shes zhes bya gang // 
46b1(rgyud 'grel): shes su ni de mi rtag/ 'gyur ba nyid du thal 'gyur na// sangs rgyas ye shes gzhan du min// ye shes de ni mi 'gyur bar// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gsungs te// de ba sa gcig/ 
46b2(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du'ang // nges par smra ba rigs ma yin// shes pa'i rab tu snang de yin// ye shes dag tu de mi rtag/ so sor snang ba dgag pa las// ye shes ci phyir dgag mi 'gyur// 
46b3(rgyud 'grel): de bas gcig pa nyid mi 'grub// tshig de shin tu nges yin na// ci phyir de dag gcig nyid du// khyed ni yongs su rtog par byed// lung dang rigs pa dang 'gal bas// rnam pa kun tu 
46b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu med// ye shes de nyid rnam par shes// de ltar yang ni mi rigs so// rnam pa las ni tha dad med// shes pa'i shes nyid mi rigs te// shes bya las ni shes 'gyur gyi// 
46b5(rgyud 'grel): shes bya med par ma yin no// gal te shes pa tha dad 'gyur// ye shes su ni brtag na ko// rnam pa tha dad gyur pa ni// ye shes nyid las gnas med yin// ye shes 'byung ba'i dus su
