95b8(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa khyad par can gyi thabs dang bral nas/ thabs mngal gnyis ka la mtshungs pa mo yin no// de kho na dka' ba med par gang 'di 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa nyid 
96a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis yun mi ring bar rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid 'bras bu chen po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i 'phyir ro// dka' thub brtul zhugs kyis brtul bas// sdug bsngal gyur nas lus skabs te// sdug 
96a2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal nyid kyi sems g.yengs te// g.yengs pas byang chub gzhan du 'gyur/ zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan nas kyang / dka' thub dka' spyod drag po yis// bsten na 'grub par mi 'gyur te// 'dod pa 
96a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga la longs spyod cing // bsten na mAr du 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa dang / pha rol byin pa'i tshul la yun rings dka' bas 'bras bu smin sngags tshul dka' ba med par myur du byang chub 'thob par 
96a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhes bstan pas so// chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'o// snyam du rtogs pa de yang rang rig ma rtogs pa med pa la/ rang rig pa yang bde ba chen po'o zhes bya zhing / de yang sngags 
96a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi bstan bcos nye bar bstan pa ma rtogs par nam yang 'byung bar mi 'os te/ shin tu spros pas chog go/ dbang po rnon po ni sngags kyi theg pa 'di la so so skye bo nyid kyis kyang sngags kyi de kho na nyid rtogs
96a6(rgyud 'grel): par nus te/ dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa slob bzhin pa'i gnas skabs su yang / de lta bu la brtan par 'gyur ba srid pa'i phyir/ rgyu dang 'bras bu 'dus par 
96a7(rgyud 'grel): byas nas phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni sa brgyad pa nyid la ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/ de skad du phyi nas sa brkyang pa la ni/ dogs pa 
96a8(rgyud 'grel): ldog par 'gyur ba yin/ zhes gsungs so// pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la ni de lta bur 'gyur ba nyid yin no zhes zer yang / de lta bu nyams su myong ba med pa'i phyir/ so so'i skye bor 'gyur ba las 
96b1(rgyud 'grel): 'a la thas par rang pa' ma sum 'am mamamamam ca mam ba sa sa sa ba ra 'ang babang 'tha sa sa ga sa thas sa 'grub la ya pas sa lag 
96b2(rgyud 'grel): byaphyir mi ldog par zhes brjod par mi nus te/ 'di na ji srid dus brgyad pa mthar thug pa'i dbugs sbyin pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i byor ro// grogs dag nyon cig theg pa chen po bas// gal te yul la spyod kyang mos la 
96b3(rgyud 'grel): lpag/ e ma'o 'khor ba 'di dag kun// yul gying po rtog pa nyid kyis su// de bzhin nyid kyi de dag rnam dag pa// yin nam snyam du de dag drar byed kyang // dpe'u 'gu 'dzi'i phung po la de bzhin// 'jigs pas/ 
96b4(rgyud 'grel): ga par byed cing snyoms pa yin// gang yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par mos pa'i dbang po rnon po yod do zhe na/ de ma yin te/ rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag med na mi rung ba'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa 'dis/ 
96b5(rgyud 'grel): chog go// gang yang 'phags pa chos 'phags sa bcu thob pa la 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa bag tshab med par sgrub 'di ni dag pa kha na yin te/ 'dir ni de bzhin du khyad par can gyi thabs yod pa'i dbang gis slob bzhin/ 
96b6(rgyud 'grel): bsang par du 'gyur ro// gzhan slob pa'i dbang du byas nas lam stabs can dang stobs med pa dpyad pa'i skabs su byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa'i dbang phyugi dper byed pa ni/ rig pa med pa kho na'o// gzhan yang 
96b7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid mal byan nas thug pa chen po do ga smras pa ra dag pa med pa ste/ sngags kyi pa nyid 'a du chud pa rtogs par de mngon par byed pa med pa'i gyu ro// de yang dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid du 
96b8(rgyud 'grel): bcu zhag yod/ dngos pakun kyang po 'di/ sa sang rtogs pa dka' ba yin zhes gsungs so// gang yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i rtog pa dang bral ba zhes zer ba de ni bden te/ kha ba cag ni mchog dang dga' bral 
96b9(rgyud 'grel): dgag dbus su rang gi rig pa grub pa la/ sdug bsngal lam bde bar rtogs pa ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te// gsum pa 
97a1(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa de nyid ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i byang chub 'dod// ces gsungs so// 'on kyang kun tu rtog pa med pas rang rig rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba grub pa yang med do zhes gang smras pa de mngon 
97a2(rgyud 'grel): sum du 'gal ba ste/ chad par smra bar thal por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de skad du yang / rang rig ma rtogs ye shes su// gal te spyod par byed na ni// sangs rgyas ye shes dag pa min// de dag mkhas pas spang 
97a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal mda' bstan gyi zhal snga nas kyang / rtog pazhi pas blo de'ang zhi bar 'gyur// blo gros dman pa kha cig slu zhes grag/ blo bzangs nyid ni blangs nas ci yang rung // mkha' lwa 
97a4(rgyud 'grel): lhag par ci ste mi 'gyur ro// rtog pa thams cad bcos pas gyur pa'i blo// gang yin de ni bde ba dam par gsal// de ni bya ba byas pa mkhas pa ste// gzhan pa gang de rkang gnyis phyugs yin no zhes gsungs so// 
97a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag 'dod chags kyis 'dul ba gang yin pa'i don du 'di bstan gyi/ de kho na nyid ma yin no zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas pa'i tshig ma yin no// 'dod chags can 'dul ba'i don du ni 'dod chags chen po bstan par
97a6(rgyud 'grel): mi rigs te/ de dag gi 'dod chags zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ mi sdug par bstan pa ma yin nam zhe na/ 'dod chags 'dod pa zhi bya'i phyir// gtso bo mnyam par dgod par mdzad// chags bral chags pa bar 
97a7(rgyud 'grel): mal// 'dod chags chen po 'joms pa yin// de yi theg pa ni gcig nyid de// gang 'di theg pa chen po'o// bstan pa yang ni gcig pu ste// gang 'di 'dod chags chen po bstan pa'o// de skad du yang / 
97a8(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gang phyir theg pa gcig cing tshul yang gcig/ 'dren pas bsten pa 'di yang gcig pa ste// gang yang theg pa gsum du bstan pa ni// nga yi thabs la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin nyid 
97b1(rgyud 'grel): ces gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang / ji srid sems ni 'jug pa'i bar/ theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// sems ni yongs su gyur pa ni// theg pa med cing 'gro ba'ang med// ces gsungs so// gzhan yang nor bu 
97b2(rgyud 'grel): dang sngags dang / sman gyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed pa yang / gang zhig thob nas/ tshe 'di nyid la mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i lha bzhin du 'gyur ro// lam 'di ring 
97b3(rgyud 'grel): du bgrod pa ste// rtog gi skam po'i bya dag gi/ blo yi rgya mtsho pha rol 'gram// mtha' yas mthong nas song ba ldeg/ blo yi yul min de kho na// skye ba med pa rkyen las skyes// sna tshogs de ni rang rig ste// bla ma 
97b4(rgyud 'grel): dam pa med par min// gsang sngags theg pa 'di la ni// bla ma dam pas skye ba 'dzin// de ltar kho bos skye bo dag/ nyon mongs rgya mtsho rgal bar mthong // de la sngags kyi theg pa chen po bstan pa ni gnyis te/ 
97b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ phyi rol bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gsum ste/ rdzogs pa dang / yong 
97b6(rgyud 'grel): su grub pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa'o// rnam pa lnga po de dag ni rim pa gnyis su so sor mngon par sbyor ro// de la bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bdag med ma gsal ba las bstan pa ste/ ji skad du gsungs pa'i bdag med ma'i 
97b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bsgom pa yang / bla ma dam pa'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las khong du chud par bya'o// de yang gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas ma bris so// rdzogs pa'i rim pa gang zhe na/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod/ 
97b8(rgyud 'grel): pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi don du/ dgod pa dag la slob dpon ste// de bzhin lta ba gsang ba nyid// lag bcangs pas ni shes rab ste/ de yang gnyis 'khyud rgyu yin no// zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan nas 
98a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang dbang bskur ba drug ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba'o zhes gsungs pas/ phyi rol bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// zab mo'i rim pa ni// las kyi phyag rgya ma'i ye shes ni/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 
98a2(rgyud 'grel): dbugs dbyung ba'o// rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni/ chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ ngo bo nyid kyi bde ba gang thob pa// de nyid 'di yin zhes pas mthong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa'o// skad cig la dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen 
98a3(rgyud 'grel): pos mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir/ gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa nyams na/ mchog tu bde ba nyid du brjod do// sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi chos rnams thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni sdom pa ste/ ro gcig pa'o// 
98a4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid ma yin pa yang ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ chos kyi phyag rgya zhes brjod do// dga' ba la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa yang / 'dir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa bston pa las shes par bya ste/ 
98a5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa'i zhal snga nas kyang / las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to// dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni yongs su grub pa'i rim pa ste/ sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang thabs
98a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bdag nyid mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang / 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku dang / dkyil 
98a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du gsal ba gang yin pa de ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ dga' ba la sogs pa ni las kyi phyag rgya bzhin bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las rtogs par bya'o// de yang las kyi phyag rgya nyid
98a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so// ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa yang gang kun tu bzang por gyur pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi khyad par las/ bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gi 
98b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pa med par skad cig ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'di phyag rgya chen po zhes brjod do// chen po yang yin zhing / phyag rgya thams cad la rgyas 'debs pa'i 
98b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// de nyid kyi phyag rgya 'dis rgyas btab pas thams cad kyis kyang phyag rgya chen po'ago 'phangs thob pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa/ lhan cig skyes pa brjod du med ces gsungs so// / 
98b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po brtag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyi/ lung bstan par sla ba ni ma yin pas 'dir dpyad par mi bya'o// blo yis dpyad nas de 'di'o zhes shes rab rgyal bas kyang mi dpyod do// 'on kyang de yi bdag 
98b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni// de nyid 'di yin snyam du gsal ba ni// blang dang dor bas stong ba'i phyir// bdag cag lta bus mi brtan pas// bskal pa bye ba brgyar brtags kyang // mi rtog ji ltar rnam rtog pa// byang chub nye 
98b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ring bar 'gyur// dpyod pa min pa'i ngo bo nyid// chos nyid de bzhin nyid sna tshogs// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// snying rje bdag nyid blangs pa ni// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub bla ma 
98b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa las// de phyir bla ma dam pa'i zhabs// pad+ma nyid las 'bab brten dang // dngos por 'khrul pa'i mun pa ni// nyi ma brgya yi 'od bzhin 'jam// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa'i zhabs kyis ni// 
98b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i rdul gyi bka' drin nyid thob pas// mngon sum po yi lam son ji lta bzhin// thos pa'i lam las gnas pa gang yin pa// srid dang zhi ba ro mnyam rang rig de la 'dud// ma 'ongs pa yi de bzhin 
98b8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa nyid ni bdag gis bya ba'i phyir// gang gi sems nyid glog gi 'od bzhin gsal gyur pa// dge ba'i lus can brten bya de yi zhabs kyi pad+ma gnyis// rab tu bus pas thang cig tsam yang spyi bos 
99a1(rgyud 'grel): len pa yin// bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul ni rin chen 'od 'bar ba// yid kyi mun pa 'joms par skad cig tsam gyis byed// rnam pa thams cad kyis brgyan de bzhin nyid 'di ni// 'jig rten/ 
99a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag kun gyis nye bar mthong gyur cig/ theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags thams cad dang 'brel ba// bla ma dam pas bstan pa nyams su myong ba ni// gang zhig bdag gis bstan pas dge ba bas rba/ 
99a3(rgyud 'grel): pa des// 'gro ba thams cad rgyal ba mchog gi go 'phang thob par shog/ shes rab ye shes gsal ba 'di// sems can kun la phan don du// dam pa'i lam ni thob bya'i phyir// mkhas pa pa/ 
99a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes byas// shes rab ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba// mkhas pa chen po de ba tsan+da'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // par+t+ti ta badz+ra pA Ne dang / lo tsa ba d+harma kir+t+tis bsgyur ba'o// 
99a5(rgyud 'grel): gsapa phrus pa da la na cig rgyas pa sa ma la bklags/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ s+thi ti sa muts+tsha ya/ bod skad du/ gnas pa bsdus pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal/ 
99a6(rgyud 'grel): lo// mdo sde bye brag spa rnams rig/ dbu ma'i rim bzhin gsal ba yi// chos dang gang zag bdag med la// btud de de nyid bshad par bya// kha cig gang zag ces bya smra// rtag min mi rtag ma yin 
99a7(rgyud 'grel): zer// nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis// 'dus ma byas gsum rtag pa yin// 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag ste// 'gro ba phung po lnga bdag nyid// srid pa sdug bsngal bden pa ste// de ni 
99a8(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu shes par bya// rgyu ni kun 'byung bden pa ste// las dang nyon mongs bdag nyid do// bden pa de gnyis zag bcas te// phyi ma gnyis ni zag pa med// las dang nyon mongs yongs zad nas// 
99b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu'ang 'gog par gyur pa na// dam pa'i rnam thar mngon sum don// zhi ba sdug bsngal zad pa yin// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad de ni// goms pas nges par 'byin pa'i mchog/ yang dag bstan/ 
99b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs zhes// yan lag brgyad lam thub pas gsungs// de nyid nyan thos mya ngan 'das// rang sangs rgyas kyi bsgom pa yang // lung bstan pa la mi ltos par// rang gi sngon gyi smon lam gyis// 
99b3(rgyud 'grel): don mngon byas nas mya ngan 'das// lhag mar bcas pa'i lus 'dis su// bdag nyid chen po de kun nas// bdag dang gzhan don nus pa nyid// rang gi 'dod pas bstan nas su// mar me ltar yongs mya
99b4(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das// 'di ni 'bring po'i sangs rgyas te// bye brag smra ba'i gnas pa'o// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma// de dag bdag med pa ru ni// yang dag 
99b5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'i yul du byas// dam pa'i shes pa gnyis kyi tshul// mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag ste// yul gyi rang gi mtshan nyid la// mngon sum lkog tu gyur pa'o// yul dang dus ni nyi tshe pa// phra rab rdul dang skad 
99b6(rgyud 'grel): cig mas// don gyi bya ba nus pa'i phyir// de nyid don dam dngos po yin// nam mkha' la sogs lta zhog gi/ bya ba'i don kun 'dod pa yis// tshad ma'i yul du byas nas su// de nyid 'dir ni yongs su 
99b7(rgyud 'grel): brtag/ 'di ltar bum pa la sogs gzugs// rtag tu don gyi bya byed pas// so so'i skad cig de nyid la// rang gi dngos po nyid byed pa'o// bya ba'i don cig byas nas ni// de nyid byed pa ma yin la// 
99b8(rgyud 'grel): byed pa byed par mi sbyor te// byas na de nyid gzhan du 'gyur// snga ma'i rang bzhin rnams kun tu// skad cig gzhan gyi rjes mi 'jug/ skad cig ma yi rgyun 'dra bas// mngon shes la sogs so sor gan// 
100a1(rgyud 'grel): da lta mngon sum gyur pa'i don// yongs su spyod pa de bzhin yang // de ni rnam par gcod pa ste// mngon sum las byung bsgom pa yin// snang ba rnam par nyams nas ni// rgyud gzhan dgos pa
100a2(rgyud 'grel): ma yin te// bskyed pa gzhan ni 'jigs pas na// rang rig d+hA yi nyams par 'gyur// phra rab rdul ni 'dus pa las// rigs pa'i gzugs su mthong ba yi// lus la shing dang ma la sogs// rags pa cung 
100a3(rgyud 'grel): zad gcig pa min// ji ltar de bzhin bde dang sdug/ bum pa la sogs so sor ro// gcig la bskyod dang dmar pas so// kun bskyod pa dang dmar por 'gyur// gcig la g.yogs par gyur pa yis// 
100a4(rgyud 'grel): lus kun khyab 'gyur de bzhin no// 'on kyang cha shas bskyod sogs pas// yan lag can la min zhe na// yan lag can nyid mi baspyod na// ji ltar yul gzhan thob par 'gyur// rdul phran 'dus par bya 
100a5(rgyud 'grel): rol gyi// snang ba skad cig gang yin pa// shes pa rang gi rnam pa ni// skyes pas yul nyid thob par 'gyur// de nyid tsam gyi spyod yul gyis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob min te// tshogs pa gcig la rag 
100a6(rgyud 'grel): las pas// rgyu ni dbang po dang mnyam 'gyur// bye dang mgye rnam rtags pas// shes pa'i bye brag skyes don med// bems po sems min rnam brtags pas// kun nas skye ba yod ma yin// 'phags pa'i bden/ 
100a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi po yang // 'di la blo dang ldan pas bsgom// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems// tshogs ma rdzogs na yod ma yin// mngon du byed pa mi bya ste// byas na theg pa dman par 'gyur// zab mo'i rim 
100a8(rgyud 'grel): la goms pa yis// byang chub rtse ba snying rje yin// snying rje rtsa ba rab sbyor bas// bye brag smra ba'ang de bzhin te// theg chen rim pas goms pa yis// rdzogs pa'i byang chub cis mi 'gyur// gzhan du mdo/ 
100b1(rgyud 'grel): sde rtogs pa yi// blo de ji ltar theg chen yin// gang phyir dbu ma dang bral bas// de la'ang sangs rgyas yod ma yin// gnas pa tsam gyi bye brag gis// theg pa nges pa med pa'i phyir// shes rab 'ba'
100b2(rgyud 'grel): zhig dgra bcom dang // dbu ma pas kyang mthong ba'o// theg chen snying rje sbyor ba las// byin sogs lam ni lhag par 'gyur// sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa rnams// gnas pa'i dbye ba gzhan du 
100b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gal te chung ngu 'bring sogs pa'i// dbye ba phye ste rab brtags nas// de ni so so rnam pa dgu/ de ni theg pa gnas par bye// mdo sde pa'i gnas pa bsdus pa'o// // rdul phran cha shas med/ 
100b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// phan tshun yang dag sbyor ba med// thams cad 'brel med bdag nyid pas// rags pa cung zad tsam yang med// dbang po las 'das rang rgyud pas// 'dus pa yang ni de bzhin no// gal 
100b5(rgyud 'grel): te rags pa'i chos kyi don// shes pa ji ltar dngos med 'gyur// bye dang ma gye rab brtags pas// don gyi chos de med pa ste// phra mo'i dbye bas phye ba ni// rdzas de ji ltar rags pa yin// dngos dang dngos
100b6(rgyud 'grel): med 'gal bas na// bye dang ma phye gcig pa med// 'gul dang mi 'gul sogs smyon pas// gcig la'ang cha shas yod ma yin// phyogs dang snam sogs bye brag gis// bsgrub pa'i don la nges pa med// / 
100b7(rgyud 'grel): ga dpyir 'di don dngos med de// rmi lam gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin// sngon po la sogs don med phyir// rnam par shes pa 'thad ma yin// sna tshogs rnam par snang bas na// ji srid sngo sogs gcig 
100b8(rgyud 'grel): pa min// phan tshun 'thad pa ma yin pas// nam shes sna tshogs ma yin no// bag chags stobs kyis bzung ba dang // 'dzin pa lta bur phye ba'i phyir// snang ba'i bye brag sngon po sogs// bden min 'khrul 
101a1(rgyud 'grel): pas rnam pa med// 'gro ba rnam rig tsam du ni// de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// de ltar bus pas rnam brtags pa'i// bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems// don du rab// 
101a2(rgyud 'grel): tu snang bar 'jug/ rnam pa med par mos pa yin// gsum po dmigs pa med pa ste// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// so sor 'khor gsum rtse gcig bya// thos dang bsam pa las byung 
101a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // bsgom pa las skyes shes rab ni// bsam gtan las skyes rnal 'byor gyis// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsungs pa// sems tsam la ni brten nas su// 
101a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol du ni mi rtag go/ de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas nas// sems tsam las kyang 'da' bar bya// sems tsam nyid la 'das nas su// snang ba med las 'da' bar bya// snang med gnas pa'i 
101a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa// des ni theg pa chen po mthong // 'jug pa lhun gyis grub cing zhi// smon lam rnam par dag nas ni// ye shes dam pa bdag med pa// snang ba med pa mthong ba yin zhes gsungs so// sna tshogs
101a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba de nyid kun tu brtags pa sdug bsngal te// kun 'byung gis ni bag chags gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin no// sbyin pa la sogs lam nyid yongs su rdzogs pa 'gog pa ste// rdzogs par 
101a7(rgyud 'grel): yongs su grub pa rnams med rnam par rig pa tsam// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam rnam pa med pa'i gnas pa bsdus pa'o// // gang gang cung zad snang ba ni// de de sems la shin du gsal// 
101a8(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar de bzhin rmi lam sems// gzugs la sogs pa so sar snang // ji ltar so sor snang ba'i sems// bag chags la ni rnam gnas pa// ci ste don med rnam shes ni// ji ltar gzhan las 
101b1(rgyud 'grel): shes par 'gyur// don gyi snang ba'i phyi rol na// bse ru lta bur thub pas gsungs// gzung dang 'dzin pa stong par ni// snad med pa dag 'dod pa yin// rnam shes so sor snang bas na// sngon po la 
101b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs don med de// de phyir kun gyi rnam pa bsgom// mi rtog snying rje chen po yin// kun 'byung bag chags bstan pa ni// sbyin pa la sogs bag chags spangs// sdug bsngal thams cad 'gog pa yang / 
101b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs gnyis su med pa mthong // rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// gzung dang 'dzin pa stong pa nyid// gsal bar byed pa'i chos sku las// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa 'phro// gzung ba la sogs med pa'i
101b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos// snang ba'i bag chags yod ma yin// de bzhin gnyis ka yang ma yin// gzugs las gzhan du mi brtag go/ mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'i// dngos po 'di ni med pa min// rnam par mi rtog 
101b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin yang // ye shes rang rig nyams myong yin// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i las rnam pa dang bcas pa'i gnas pa bsdus pa'o// // mu stegs sangs rgyas par ma btus// gsum ni med par ma 
101b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas// legs shing mdzes pa dam pa'i chos// med par gnas pa'i sdig pa yin// dbu ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid// gnas pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// btud de gnas pa zad byed nyid// lung dang 
101b7(rgyud 'grel): rig pas bshad par bya// khams rnams nyid las grub pa gang // rkyen las skyes pa skad cig ma// gcig dang du ma dang bral bas// de nyid dngos po med pas yin// de yang lus la rkang lag dang // mgo 
101b8(rgyud 'grel): dang rgyab sogs phye ba las// lag pa la sogs gcig kyang med// so sor phye bas byung ba yin// ji srid de yi cha phye ste/ rdul phran rnam par dpyad pa ni// lus po nyid na bshad pa las// rten dang rten pa la 
102a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs shes// gcig gi dngos po bkag pas na// du ma'ang yod pa ma yin no// rmi lam dang ni mnyam gnas par// sngon du bkag pa nyid kyi min// shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// 
102a2(rgyud 'grel): rig pa nyid dang 'gal ba min// gang phyir spyi yi gtan tshigs kyis// brjod pa dam pa'i chos yin no// // kun rdzob don byed nus pa yi// sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med// de ni shes dang shes 
102a3(rgyud 'grel): bya nyid// kho bos ci zhig yongs su brtag/ gzugs sogs so sor snang ba la// de nyid rnam par shes pa la// de ltar sgrub thabs lta byas te// blo ldan rig pas mi 'grub med// kun rdzob du ni skye ba 
102a4(rgyud 'grel): gang // de ni skye ba med pa'i don// de phyir skye ba med pa'i sems// rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bzhin no// skye ba grub pas yod pa yin// yod pa yin pas med pa'ang med// rgyu yi dngos po med pas na// / 
102a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gzhan las skye ba min// ji ltar gzugs brnyan 'byung ba ltar// bden min brdzun pa ma yin gzugs// de nyid chos rnams thams cad de// rang bzhin rig pa rnams kyi lugs// 'dus pa// 
102a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhar dang gos la sogs// brtsams pa kun rdzob dngos po ste// 'di ni rang bzhin ma skyes pas// 'dus pa nyid kyang de bzhin no// de phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis// 'gro ba 'di dag ming tsam 
102a7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// gzhan gyis sbas pa 'di dag kun// bdag gis legs par brjod pa yin// phyogs ni snga mar brjod pa dag/ de yi blo gros bsal nas su// rang gi phyogs ni bdag gis bshad// 
102a8(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar me long la gzugs brnyan// gcig dang gzhan nyid spangs pa ltar// snang las gzhan na yod min te// de ltar dngos po'i rang bzhin no// 'jig rten sgyu ma rmi lam bzhin// rgyu dang rkyen ni rnam par 
102b1(rgyud 'grel): spangs// rtag tu rgyu med par snang bas// rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go// gang la dngos po yod min pas// sems tsam du ni rtogs par bya// ji ltar dngos po med pa'i sems// sems tsam du ni rigs/ 
102b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ gnas ldan pa'i gyi grag gas// zlag ta mas na 'jugs/ lag d+han pams mas da // rnams la na pa gas sa// gras dang pangs sna ba ga/ gang rnal pa kyang bas na// sems ni gnyis 
102b3(rgyud 'grel): su 'gyur ba ste// sems kyi mtshan nyid gnyis man no// gang pyir ji ltar ral gri'i so// dza g+hang rang gi mdzub rtse yi// me tsher po dang mi reg pa// de bzhin sems nyid rang snang ba'o// gzugs 
102b4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan bzhin du snang ba'i sems// sngon du goms par gyur pa'i blos// ji ltar 'byung ba rnam par mthong // don gyi rnam pa don yod min// gang zag rgyun dang phud po dang // de bzhin rkyen dang rdul phran/ 
102b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // gtso bi dbang mug byed pa 'o// sems tsas pa pa rnam par brtags// kyi rib dan mthong log pa ste// don gzhan med pa'i sems nyid do// rig pas yid la brtags nas ni// gzu 
102b6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dzin pa 'gog pa'o// bla yi rnam par gzhigs na ni// rang bzhin nges par gzung du med// de ni brjod du med pa/ phyir// dngos po med par bstan pa yin// yid la b+h+yo yi rnam brtags na// 
102b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dbang med cing kun brtags med// yongs su grub pa'i dngos med na// ji ltar blo yi rnam par dpyad// rang bzhin med cing rig byed med// dngos med gzhi yang yod ma yin// nus pa ro dang / 
102b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs pa'i phyir// rtog ge ngan pas 'di dag brtags// dngos po mtshan ma rnam rig go/ yid log g.yo ba gang yin las// nga yi lus rnams 'das nas su// rnam par mi rtogs pa yi spyod// 
103a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin nyid dang stong nyid mtha'// mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings// skye ba med pa'i chos rnams ni// dam pa'i don gyi rang bzhin no// phyi rol dngos dang dngos med de// sems kyi 
103a2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bzung ba med// lta ba thams cad spangs pa gang // skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do// gang phyir tshogs pa'i rkyen yod na// 'jug pa dang ni ldog par 'gyur// tshogs pa so sor gyur na ni// 
103a3(rgyud 'grel): skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// yod med dngos po skye ba med// sems ni yod min med pa min// gang phyir las gzhan 'dus pa las// 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa min// gang tshe 'jig rten 'di dag kun// 
103a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa nyid ni mthong ba ste// tshogs pa tsam po 'di nyid ni// de tshe sems la mnyam par gnas// gang la cung zad skye med pas// dag pa cung zad yod ma yin// de ni yod dang med min te// 'gro 'di brjod du med 
103a5(rgyud 'grel): par lta'o// zung du 'jug pa yongs shes na// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje che// mkhas pas kun rdzob de nyid kyang // mi spang bar ni spyad par bya// gang phyir kun rdzob log na ni// de phyir de nyid ci yang med// 
103a6(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob nyid kyis skye ba gang // de nyid skye ba med pa'i don// 'di ni zung 'jug de nyid de// rkyen las skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do// de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/ yang dag
103a7(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dang skye ba med// mi dmigs pa dang mya ngan 'das// stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med dang 'dus ma byas// rmi lam sgyu ma la sogs dpe// de nyid rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrubs// theg chen 'di// 
103a8(rgyud 'grel): ni mchog yon te// nges don mdo sder bsdus pa yi// mdo sde lta zhing nyan pa la// 'di ltar 'bad pas bsam par bya// snying rje sems can la bskyed de// byang chub sems ni brtson byas nas// byang chub sdom 
103b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas brtson chen pos// rang bzhin med pa bsgom par bya// 'phags pa'i lam brgyad la gnas te// sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs la 'bad// mkhas rnams gang phyir bden gnyis gnyis med 'dis// ji ltar de 
103b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid don de chad pa lta bur ni// mngon sum grub pa skye dang 'gag pa'i snod yin te// gal te don skyes rnam par nyams pa'i skyon yin no// gang phyir ji ltar me long nang du gzugs brnyan mthong // rig pas brtags 
103b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs kyis de med de mthong med// phyi yi don med 'di med rnam pa sna tshogs sems// 'on kyang rten 'brel dag la rig pas 'gal ba med// 'di ni dbu ma'i gnad bsdus pa'i// de ltar mtha' bzhi rnam
103b4(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa// brtags te brtan par byas nas su// skye ba med cing gnas pa med// 'gag pa med cing mtshan nyid med// rang rig rkyen las skyes pa ste// de nyid pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// phyag rgya bzhi yi rang 
103b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin lung // sngags kyi tshul la brten nas su// bla ma'i khyad par myong ba yis// ma brtags par yang som nyi med// stong pa nyid ni rang rig ste// thabs dang shes rab bde chen po// 'bras gnas 
103b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rtsod pa med// byang chub sems ni rnam par bsgom// de skad du yang / gsang sngags tshul de shes pa yis// sngags kyi lugs kyi khyad par gsungs// don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang // thabs mang 
103b7(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas nas// sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags// gang phyir stong pa rigs pa nyid// ye shes rang bzhin skad cig ma// gang phyir rdo rje sems dpar nges// 
103b8(rgyud 'grel): phung po de bzhin gshegs par rtogs// rig pa'i rtobs kyis gzhag pa gang // ma brtags pa ru sbyor ba don// ci ste yongs su brtag bral ba// sngags kyi tshul dang bral na ni// rnam pa kun tu dpe med ni// 
104a1(rgyud 'grel): zag pa med pa'i bde ba che// lha yi nga rgyal lta byas pa// ji lta stong nyid nyams su myong // las kyi phyag rgya legs grub nas// chos kyi phyag rgya rab phye bas// phan tshun re ba med na ni// dam tshig/ 
104a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu ji ltar yin// thabs ni mang po rnams kyis su// nyams su myong ba'i khyad par dang // las dang chos dang phyag rgya che// dbye ba gzhan du ji ltar yin// shin tu dbang po rnon po yis// stong nyid nyams// 
104a3(rgyud 'grel): su myong ba'am// bde chen mngon par byang chub la// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas// der ni shin tu bde ba nyid// de ltar thabs kyi dngos po yis// dbang po'i dus la goms pa las// gzhan du ji ltar 
104a4(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba min// pha rol phyin pa kun bdag nyid// bsgom pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa la// dbang po rnon pos cis mi 'grub// lhan cig skyes dga' rtogs pa'o// oM ba 
104a5(rgyud 'grel): la ni phyag byas nas// phyag rgya'i rang bzhin mdor bsdus pa// sngags kyi theg pa bshad par bya// / shes rab sprul pa'i gzugs can ma// las kyi phyag rgya bdag med nyid// lus dang ngag dang sems 
104a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi las// ye shes gtso bo'i rang bzhin no// gar phyir de las shes pa gang // dga' ba la sogs rim skyes pa// dbus su rnam par shes pa ste// de ni shes rab ye shes brjod// rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med// 
104a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin dbu ma'i rtogs pa'o// ji ltar mos pa'i ye shes ni// man ngag gis ni thob par 'gyur// gsum pa'i lhan cig skyes par rtogs// bcan thabs dbang gis bzhi pa ste// rlung ga bkod pas sna rtsel// 
104a8(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ba yi sbyor ba yin// ji lta ji ltar bde ye shes// thabs kyis rab tu bsgrub pa yin// de lta de ltar rtogs pa ste// rtog pa lhan cig skyes pa mchog/ gar phyir 'bras bu 'dra ba'i dbang // btsan thabs 
104b1(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes par 'dod// yun rings dus su 'bral med gnas// ma bcos pa yi tshogs yin no// de gsungs pa/ dga' ba khu ba 'bab pa ste// gtsug tor smin phyag pad+ma'i tshad// mgrin pa snying gar 
104b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog dga' ste// de nas dga' ba bral bar 'gyur// sna tshogs rol mos lte ba nas// ji srid gsang ba'i pad+mar son// de srid gsang ba'i nor bu nas// ma 'phos bar du lhan cig skyes// mi gnas pa 
104b3(rgyud 'grel): yi mya ngan 'das// 'dod chags chen po'i khyab bdag gtso// ma 'phos bde ba chags bral te// 'di ni mya ngan 'das par gnas// chags bral las ni sdig pa med// bde ba mchog las bsod nams me// 
104b4(rgyud 'grel): de phyir mi 'gyur bde ba'i sems// rtag tu nges gnas mos par bya// 'pho ba las ni chags bral 'byung // chags bral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung // sdug bsngal bas ni khams zad de// khams zad 
104b5(rgyud 'grel): pas ni 'chi bar 'gyur// shi nas de dag gzhan du'ang 'byung // srid par 'ching zhing skye ba skye// de phyir 'bad pas thams cad kyis// chags pa dor ba rnam par spangs// chags bral 'dod ldan ma yin 
104b6(rgyud 'grel): te// 'dod pa'i sbyor thabs mi 'dod na// nga yi bstan pa rgyun tu yang // ci sterna la 'byor sdug bsngal bskyed// bde ba mi 'gyur rang bzhin gyis// mi 'gyur mchog ni bsgrub par bya// rten ni shor bar gyur 
104b7(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// brten pa chags dang bral ba yin// spyi bor rgyas pa'i theg le ni// shes rab chags las zhu bar 'gyur// gang bar gnas pa'i go 'phang ni// bcings pa dam pa'i don yin no// ji ltar zla ba 
104b8(rgyud 'grel): 'char ba'i rims// 'phel ba'i dus kyis rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin sems bskyed rim pa ni// 'phel ba'i dus kyis rdzogs pa yin// de ni gcugs nas byung nas su// rdo rje nor bur gang bar 
105a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de ni chags dang bral na nyams// rdo rje rtse mor rab rgyas 'gyur// bde chen rang bzhin 'di nyid ni// rdzogs pa'i sgra yis bstan pa yin// rdzogs pa mi bskyod gyur pa yis// skad cig/ 
105a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub// ji ltar chu bo'i chu sna tshogs// rgya mtsho chen por ro mnyam 'gyur// de bzhin dngos po sna tshogs kyang // mi 'gyur ba der nyams par 'gyur// ji ltar khams rnams 
105a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa nyid// gang zhig dngul chus phug pa ltar// dngos po sna tshogs 'di dag kyang // mi 'gyur mchog gis za ba yin// mi 'gyur mchog gi bdag nyid kyis// rnam pa kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// 
105a4(rgyud 'grel): stong pa las skyes dngos po rgya// mi 'gyur las skyes bde 'bras bu// rgyu las 'bras bu bde rgyas btab// 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas btab// stong nyid dngos po 'dzin pas n+ya// mi 'gyur snying rje 'dzin 
105a5(rgyud 'grel): pas 'bras// byang chub sems de ma 'bros na// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pas// 'byung ba zad par mi 'gyur te// sa tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med// dngos dang / 
105a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos med mtshan nyid gcig/ yul dang dbang po'i sgo yis su// sems ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin te// gzhan du sbrul gyis zos pa yi// sdug bsngal tshor ba rig pa min// ji ltar lcags kyi phyogs gci/ 
105a7(rgyud 'grel): na// gang phyir gser 'gyur rtsi gnas pa// 'bar ba'i me yi bsdigs na ni// thams cad gser du 'gyur ba yin// de bzhin sems kyi phyogs gcig tu'ang // mi 'gyur bde la legs gnas pa// 'dod/ 
105a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i me yis rab bsregs nas// thams cad bde bar gyur pa yin// ji ltar lcags ni gser gyur na// nam yang nag por 'gyur ba min// de bzhin sems nyid rtogs pa yang // nam yang bag chags 
105b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba min// gang phyir me yi sbyangs pa'i gser// lcags su gyur pa ma yin no// de bzhin phyir zhing phyir zhing sems// 'dod chags me yi dri ma med// 'dir mang smra ba ci zhig dgos// 'jig rten kun rdzob// 
105b2(rgyud 'grel): bden pa la// lcags ni 'gyur bar byed pa yi// ci yi rang bzhin bsam mi khyab// den dam par ni rab btags na// tho bar drims bsgos pa yi// sems nyid rtogs par gyur pa na// ye shes rang bzhin sa 
105b3(rgyud 'grel): ci dgos// ji ltar ci yi bskur ba'i lcags// lcags kyi rjes su 'gro ba min// de bzhin bde bas bsgyur ba'i sems// sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur ba min// zhes so// yang gsungs pa/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma 
105b4(rgyud 'grel): yirtsa// b+ha ga'i dbus nanam par gnas// 'bad pas nye bar thob nas su// bla ma'i bka' la goms pa yis// mdzub mo cung zad skyong ba yis// phyi nas lce dang rdo rje yis// rtsa de rgyas par gyur pa las// mchog 
105b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bde ba rab tu 'bab// pha rol gyin bcu rdzogs pa ste// stobs dang dbang po rnams dang ldan// sa bcu las ni 'das nas su// de las rtags su gyur pa med ces so// yang gsungs pa/ gang che ye shes mthong ba ni/ 
105b6(rgyud 'grel): nal 'byor pa ni bde bar gnas// 'gyur med thun nas zhag gcig gam// zla byed zla ba la gcig gam// bskal pa'am bskal pa stong du 'am// ye shes mngon par sbyor bas gnas// yang gsungs pa/ ji srid rnal 
105b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor byang chub sems// gtong bar byed pa ma yin pas// de srid rgyun mi 'chad pa 'thob// dga' ba las skyes bde ba yi// byang chub sems de lhung gyur na// dngos grub kun gyi gter yin pas// rnam shes/ 
105b8(rgyud 'grel): phung po brgyal 'gyur nas// dngos grub ma smad ga la yod ces gsungs so// las dang dam tshig phyag rgya yi// dus su lhan cig skyes pa rtogs// chos kyi phyag rgya phyag rgya che// gnyis ni lhan cig skyes pa 
106a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ byang sems bral na bde ba ni// brgya lam na yang mi 'thob po// bde chen nyid ni ma rtogs pa// nam yang gsang sngags theg pa med// shes rab ye shes thob pas na// las/ 
106a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag rgya lhan cig skyes// tha ma 'bring sogs dbye ba yi// de nyid rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgom// las kyi phyag rgya snyoms zhugs pas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// tha mas bskyed pa bsgom pa 
106a3(rgyud 'grel): ste// las kyi yan lag dang bral 'bring // rab kyis kyang ni bsam bya ba// myur du rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// chos kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa ni// thams rtsa dang yi ge rim// gtum mo'i bye brag 'bring gis so// 
106a4(rgyud 'grel): mi shigs pa ni rab kyis te// thig le pra sogs rnal 'byor pas// bsdus pa rig par 'dod pa yin// rab kyi tha mas bsgom bya na// khams gsum po ni gzhal yas khang // sems can rnams ni dkyil 'khor// 
106a5(rgyud 'grel): ba// rnal 'byor pa ni dkyil 'khor ba dag/ de bshad pa/ 'di ni gnas gsum ma yin gzhal yas khang pa yin// srog chags ma yin 'di ni rgyal ba yin// 'khor lo'i bdag po nga yin dbang po ma yin te// 
106a6(rgyud 'grel): sa la sogs pa'ang ma yin gzugs la sogs pa'ang min// chos nyid bdag nyid de nyid des na dkyil 'khor pa yang yin// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'khor lor shes na ci ste 'khrul par byed// ces bstan 
106a7(rgyud 'grel): to// khams bzhi dang ni phung po dag/ lha mo ye shes he ru kas// 'khor lo rgyas btab de bzhin nyid// rab kyi 'bring po'i bsgom bya ba// sna tshogs bdag med de bzhin nyid// thabs dang shes rab stobs 
106a8(rgyud 'grel): kyis su// zung 'jug ldan gyis grub pa ste// dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa nyid// sems ni rtog med sbyor bas kyang // sems de nyid ni brtag mi bya// kun nas thams cad mchog yin te// rnam shes dbang / 
106b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phral las 'das// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin nyid// dngos dang dngos med rnam par sbas// mtha' bzhi las ni nam grol zhing // mtha' bzhi dag ni mnyam par brten// sna tshogs sde btags 
106b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa med// chags med bde ba chen po nyid// 'bras bu de nyid mi mthun phyogs// brtags pa de nyid ma brtags pa'o// de rkyen thob pas skye ba ste// skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin te// bem po med de/ 
106b3(rgyud 'grel): rang rig pas// ye shes pa dang ma mthong ba// brtags pas nam mkha' dngos med de// de ni mi 'gyur brtan pa'o// chad pa min pas dngos med min// skye ba med par rang bzhin nyid// kun rdzob las skyes 
106b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po ste// chos rnams thams cad lhan cig kyis// gnyug ma'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin nyid// bdag byin rlabs pas rang byung ste// mi nyams pas na mi shigs pa'o// chos kyi phyag rgya phyag rgya che/ 
106b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med mos pas ldan pa'o// dbang po mchog gin la 'byor pa// rab kyi yang ni rab yin na// chu dang 'bras bu dbyer med pas// bsgom pa'i rim pa bdag la med// ji ltar basbed pas nyams byung bas 
106b6(rgyud 'grel): dran dang dran pa nyams pa med// ma skyes pa yi tshong bas// de bzhin bsgom pa 'ang rtogs pa'o// gang phyir shes rab bsgom pa yis// stong nyid so sor rtogs pa yin// dpal ldan dgyes rdor sogs rgyud du// 
106b7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal bar gsangs// chos rnams thams cad yongs shes nas// bsgom pa nyid ni sgom pa min// gang phyir bdag byin brlab rim des// zung 'jug rim pa'ang de bzhin no// bde 
106b8(rgyud 'grel): chen mngon par rdzogs byang chub// de bzhin phrag rgya chen po mchog/ chos kyi de nyid rig pa yis// ngal bar gyur pa ma yin no// chos kyi de nyid la bzhugs phyir// de yi 'byed par rab tu bstan// bla mdam 
107a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i man ngag gis// gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// 'di la gzhan gyis bstan pa yis// don rtogs pa ni ma yin no// chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni// ji bzhin 'di la rtogs/ 
107a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gsungs// rang gi mos pas tshig gi don// gzung ba dngos nyid ma yin no// de bzhin bzhi po thams cad kyang // 'di la sogs pa gsungs pa ni// ji ltar de bzhin sku bzhi pa'o// bla ma dam pa'i thabs// 
107a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsal// stong nyid bde ba dngos po ste// bde ba bde ba chen por 'dod// bde ba ro mnyam bde ba nyid// lhan cig skyes pa chos kyi sku// de nyid bde ba'i don byed pas// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa/ 
107a4(rgyud 'grel): yang // rnam pa lnga yo dod nyid// thams cad gzhug mar bye brag med// ces pa dang / sangs rgyas su lnga'i bdag nyid can// zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa yang // skul zab par gyur pa na/ @# 
107a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa yi tshul// sku bzhi du ni rnam phye ba// dbyer med pas na rnam lnga'o// de nyid tsam du gcig pa 'di// sku yang de ltar 'dod pa yin// ji ltar 'di ni bdag gi blos// so sor rig pa nyams par 'jug/ 
107a6(rgyud 'grel): dam chos yul la shes rab kyis// ji ltar blo gros kyis thob ltar// 'di ni cung zad brjod pa las// ji ltar byung ba'i don rtogs pa// 'gro rnams de yi snod du shog/ gnas pa bsdu ba rdzogs so// 
107a7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/ bla ma d+ha ri shI dz+nyA na'i zhal ldan sa dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba rma ba na chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// // byis par ston gyis zhus nas bla ma rgya 
107a8(rgyud 'grel): gang ba dang / mtshur lo tsa bsad pa phyi mo la gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o// @#// bsar gyis mi thal pa'i rim pa'i man gces bya brtsog tu zhabs kyis mang nga ba bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ 
107b1(rgyud 'grel): a tsin+ta kra ma u pa de sha nA maH/ bod skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rim pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 
107b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab mchog gi mngal nas 'gyur// gdod nas gnyis med gnas pa la// phyag 'tshal bzang po'i zhal snga yi// yang dag rim 'ong bri bar bya// thabs dang shes rab gsang ba che// snying rje bsam mi 
107b3(rgyud 'grel): khyab mtshan nyid// ngag gi spyod yul bsam las 'das// ye shes rang las 'char bar 'gyur// rang bzhin bde ba'i 'byung gnas nyid// rang 'byung gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ de ni dngos po'i rang bzhin
107b4(rgyud 'grel): bltas te bsgom pa dmigs su med// byang sems rdo rje can bcas pas// dngos po med pas gzigs mi 'gyur// rtag dang chad pa'i bye brag dag/ don dam du ni gnyis med gzigs// dngos po dang ni 
107b5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid// gnyis su med par mnyam par bsgom// gnyis po 'di dag yod min pas// rnam pa thams cad gnyis su med// gnyis po dag ni rnam spyad na// gnyis med ye shes 'char bar 'gyur// 
107b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa ro mnyam mnyam pa ste// bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes mchog/ rtog dang brtag pa'i sbyor ba yis// gnyis med mchog ni bsgom pa min// bde ba'i rdo rje mi rtog pa// bsam gyis mi khyab kyis thob 
107b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// bskyed pa rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu// mi skye ba yang de bzhin no// gnyis kyi rnam pa dang bral bas// bag chags bag chags ldan par spangs// ye shes bag chags dang bral bas// bzang po'i 
107b8(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyis rim gyis 'ongs// rang byung khrem gnyer med pa ni// rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin gyis// gnyis kyi bag chags 'ching ba nyid// mi rtog pa yi 
108a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyi// bsam gyis mi khyab nyid kyis gcod// rtog pa'i dri ma dra ba yis// rin chen sems ni drin can byas// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyid// dri ma bral phyir sangs rgyas 
108a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod// thams cad rtogs med bdag nyid du// rnal 'byor pa yi rtag tu blta// ting 'dzin bsgom pa 'di nyid ni// bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis bstan// gang gi rang bzhin ma skyes la// 'jig pa nyid ni yod
108a3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin// ye shes de ni gnyis med min// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dpal ldan pade chen rdo rje can// mi rtog don bskyed byed pa po// phyi rol nang gi rnam rtog gi/ 'jig rten thams cad yang dag 
108a4(rgyud 'grel): brten// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyis// rtog pa phyi rol nyid du bstan// gnyis med gnyis las rnam grol ba// ye shes rang nyid skye bar 'gyur// dngos po med par bsgom pa min// dngos por yang 
108a5(rgyud 'grel): ni bsgom pa min// 'jig pa med pa'i bde bsams na// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med gnas// sems can kun gyi bsam pa gang // shes rab mngal na rnam par gnas// snying rje sad pa'i mda' yis ni// 
108a6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po'i 'ben la 'bigs// dogs pa kun las rnam par grol// gnyis su med cing mchog tu zhi// mkha' mnyam rnam rtog las grol ba// de nyid gnyis su med par brjod// bsam gyis mi khyab/ 
108a7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyis// dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom// chos kyi zhal snga'i rim 'ongs ni// bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs// rnam pa'i dbye ba gnyis med la// dpal ldan mgon po bde ba che// 
108a8(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin las// 'gro ba rnams ni rnam par sprul// stong pa dmigs pa smra ba yis// brdzun du smra ba smras pa rnams// rnam rtog rmongs pa'i 'ching ba yis// bde ba dam pa gnyis mi rtog// 
108b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab rnam dag las// phyi rol rtog pa ngan pas brtags// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor che// bde ba chen po gcig nyid do// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// gnyis su med pa'i 
108b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnas// de rnams rang bzhin rnam dag cing // mkha' ltar dri med gnyis med la// nga rgyal gyis ni tha snyad btags// tha snyad de yang yod ma yin// tsher dang tshor po mtshon cha bral// gnyis
108b3(rgyud 'grel): med bde ba chen po nyid// gang yang bsam med rang bzhin phyir// sangs rgyas blo yi spyod yul min// thams cad de yi rang bzhin nyid// rang 'byung bsam pa rnams las 'das// sa stengs srog chags 
108b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni// rtog pa'i 'dra bas nyams par 'gyur// ye shes gcig pu gnyis med pa// rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs pa// rtag dang chad pa ji snyed pa'i// phung po gnyis ni yod min pas// dbu mar yang
108b5(rgyud 'grel): ni mi dmigs pa'i// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gnyis dang gnyis med rnam rtog ste// thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor che// ro gcig gnyis su med par brjod// 'dod chags 'dod chags/ 
108b6(rgyud 'grel): bral ba spangs// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// rang rig pa yi bde ba nyid// de ni gnyis su med par brjod// mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam par grol// rig pa po dang rig bya spangs// bdag med/ 
108b7(rgyud 'grel): so sor rtogs pa yis// rin chen sems ni rab rtogs byas// dngos po rang bzhin med pa'i phyir// dngos med nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur// dbang po'i shes pas rtogs pa yis// gnyis med ye shes ngo mtshar
108b8(rgyud 'grel): che// spros pa thams cad rnam bral zhing // nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// rtog pa'i dri ma rnam gcod cing // bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis med mchog/ gnyis med bcud kyi phug pa na// rdo dang shing yang de yi dngos// 
109a1(rgyud 'grel): lha yi rnam par 'gyur ba ni// bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs// thabs dang shes rab snying rje che// gcig tu ro gcig rnam pa nyid// der ni ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gnyis med bde/ 
109a2(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po nyid// gzugs dang sna dang ro las 'das// dri dang reg bya la sogs spangs// chos dbyings rang bzhin rnam par dag/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ dogs pa kun las rnam par 
109a3(rgyud 'grel): grol// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// rang bzhin rnam dag ma gos pa// gnyis med don ni dam pa'o// ma skyes pa dang mi 'jigs pa// mi 'gyur ba dang mi gnas pa// gnyis su med pa'i ye she/ 
109a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ 'di ni phyag rgya chen po nyid// yon tan rnams dang skyon rnams ni// sems kyi rnam par brjod pa ste// de la dmigs pa ye shes mchog/ khrem gnyer med pa'i rang bzhin can// ye shes rang las 
109a5(rgyud 'grel): skye bar 'gyur// cung zad kyang ni bsgom pa med// gang phyir bsam med chos 'di nyid// gnyis med sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas// shin tu dri med ches dag cing // sgom pa po dang bsgom bya spangs// dpal
109a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan bde ba'i 'byung gnas kun// nam chog med pas nges mthong 'gyur// lha yi gzugs ni du ma dang // rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs sku// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan thams cad dang // rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 
109a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor tshogs// khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad dang // de bzhin rig pa'i lha mo nyid// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bzang po ru// sang ba'i rnam pa dri med nyid// de bzhin mdo sde sde snod dang // gzhan yang pha rol 
109a8(rgyud 'grel): phyin rim dang // sngags dang phyag rgya rig pa dang // de bzhin snying nyid bskul ba dang // sngags kyi smra ba ma lus pa// dkyil 'khor dang ni sbyin sreg dad// bzlas dang mchod pa'i cho ga rnams// gnyis med las 
109b1(rgyud 'grel): ni rang nyid skyes// zhi ba nyi ma palta ba// de bzhin mchod 'os khyab 'jug pa// rig byed tshad mar smra ba dang // gzhan yang rang nyid skye bar 'gyur// kun mkhyen gnas kyi skor ba 'di// bsam gyis mi khyab 
109b2(rgyud 'grel): mi rtogs pa// kun tu bzang po zhes bya'i lha// yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung // sa 'og ral gri ril bu dang // shing lham bum po gnod srin mo// bcud dang mig sman bzang po yang // rang nyid 'grub ste/ 
109b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du min// sngags pas dngos po bsgom bya min// dngos med nyid kyang bsgom bya min// rnam par mi rtog mos pa yis// thams cad rang nyid skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'grub 'gyur na// zhi ba
109b4(rgyud 'grel): khyab 'jug sogs ci smos// de la tha snyad yod ma yin// gzugs dang kha dog mtshan nyid med// sgyu ma'i rnam 'dzin bzang po nyid// dang ba'i rang bzhin dri ma med// rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag ste// 
109b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag du dga' ba de'i 'byung gnas nyid// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang bral// me long me lce 'bar ba 'dra// mchog dga'i bde ba rnam pa ste// rtag tu bde chen 'byung ba'o// yi ge dang ni ming brjod pa// sbyor bas/ 
109b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig tu rab tu bstan// gzhan du ngag gi lam 'das phyir// smra ba nyid de mi nus so// bya ba'i tshul la zhugs pa yin// 'dod pa'i don la rol pa yin// mchod pa'i mchog gi dus su ni// bzang po'i zhal snga nas
109b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis bstan// shes rab gnyis su med pas ni// gcig pu'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin las// bag chags zad par gyur pas ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni nges par 'thob// sna tshogs rigs kyi mthu yis ni// lta ba sna tshogs/ 
109b8(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba las// bag chags dri ma bsags pas na// gnyis med nyid ni rtogs pa min// thog mtha' dbus dang tha ma bral// bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa spangs// bsam dang sems pa dang bral ba// gnyis su med pa'i 
110a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mchog/ gnyis med ces bya sangs rgyas su// bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs// de phyir sangs rgyas rtogs pa las// sgrub po dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// tshig gi sbyor ba bstan 
110a2(rgyud 'grel): pa na// sangs rgyas dang ni gnyis med rtags// don dam tha dad med tshul gyis// gnyis med sangs rgyas gnyis su med// bstan pas ye shes 'char bas na// rtog pas rtog pa ring spangs te// dngos po la
110a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs rtogs pa kun// de nyid las ni lkog tu gyur// bzang po zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis// nyan pa goms pa'i sbyor ba las// gnyis med ming du bzung ba la// bdag la sbyor pas bzod par gsol// 
110a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas rab tu 'bad pas kyang // bag chags rnams ni zad par byas// gzhan du bskal pa grangs med du// bye ba sangs rgyas nyid ma yin// ye shes gnyis med mgon pos ni// bag chags rnams ni zad// 
110a5(rgyud 'grel): par byed// bag chags zad par gyur pa na// gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas brjod// bag chags bral ba'i gnas skabs na// skyes bu tha ma la 'bring po dag/ gang la phyogs ni yod min pas// de ni sangs 
110a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas brjod par bya// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// shes rab cha ni yang dag gnas// thabs ni dngos por skyed pa po// bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis bstan// de dag 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can// 
110a7(rgyud 'grel): ro gcig rnam par sbyor ba las// 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ bzang po'i zhal snga nas kyis gsungs// bas mdang bsgom pa por bstan med// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma// sangs 
110a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas nyid ni thob bya'i phyir// bzang pos bzang po gsungs pa nyid// dpe ni chos rnams thams cad la// gzhag pa nyid du de mi nus// mig sogs yid kyi rnam shes kyis// dpe yi dngos po rnam par 
110b1(rgyud 'grel): spangs// gcig nyid thog ma med pa dang // mtha' med rnam par yang dag gnas// bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las// mchog cig gis ni shes par 'gyur// rnal 'byor skyes bur bshad pa ste// 
110b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes surnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog/ gnyis 'das shin tu rnal 'byor te// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor pa nyid sangs rgyas 'gyur// nyi zla gza' yi zin pa no// shes rab rdo rje'i stong / 
110b3(rgyud 'grel): ba las// zhu bas gnyis med ye shes kyis// skye ba 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid// don dam dga' ba'i rang bzhin te// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// grub pa'i gzugs su the tsom med// snying
110b4(rgyud 'grel): rje gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ gang yang mig gis mthong 'gyur ba'i// gzugs kyi thog ma 'bring po ni// gang yang mig gis mthong 'gyur ba// don dam don gyi rang bzhin gyis// gnyis med dam par// 
110b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bar bya// gang yang rnabs thos 'gyur ba'i// skra dang sgra ngan rnam phye ba// sgra las 'das pa'i ye shes gtso// thos pa gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ gang yang lce yi myong 'gyur ba'i// ro mchog ro ni ngan pa 
110b6(rgyud 'grel): yi// ro drag gcig tu gyur pa yi// gnyis med mchog ni rtogs par bya// sna yi dri ni rnam shes pa'i// ri dwags lte ba la sogs dri// gcig tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gnyis med mchog ni shes par/ 
110b7(rgyud 'grel): bya// lus kyi reg bya'i rang bzhin rnams// rigs bzang rigs ngan rnam phye ba// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis// snyoms 'jug gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ mtha' med thams cad khyab pa'o// ye 
110b8(rgyud 'grel): shes snang ba'i 'od zer las// byang chub mchog tu dga' ba nyid// gnyis med sangs rgyas dam pa ste// 'du byed tshor ba 'du shes dang // gzugs dang rnam par shes pa nyid// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin 
111a1(rgyud 'grel): sku// lnga med gnyis su med pa'i bdag/ rtag pa mi skyod rin chen dang // tshe dpag med dang don yod bdag/ lnga bdag gyur pa'i ril bu ni// drag pa bde ba chen po nyid// sa dang chu dang de 
111a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ri// 'byung lnga lhan cig skyes pa ni// byang chub gnyis su med par 'gyur// me long mnyam nyid bya nan tan// so sor rtog pa chos dbyings rnams// rnam par rtog/ 
111a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rkyen gyis brtags// rang 'byung gcig pu gnyis su med// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni// lta ba la sogs rnam par phye// zhe sogs khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang // kun mkhyen gcig pu gnyis/ 
111a4(rgyud 'grel): su med// mig las byung sogs ma lus dang // yid kyi spyod yul las 'das pa// don dam gnyis med ces bya ba// ngag gi spros pa kun rdzob kyis// gnyis su med la kun tu brtags// don dam gnas// 
111a5(rgyud 'grel): skabs dbyer med pa// gnyis su med la sangs rgyas med// rtog pas nam mkhar sbyor ba sa ni// rag gi spros pa bstan pa yin// bstan bcos rim pas tshig tu ni// rnam par phye ste bshad pa yin// 
111a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med las gzhan sangs rgyas ni// smra ba nyid du mi nus so// stong pa bcu drug bshad pa dang // shes rab bcur ni brtags pa dang // sangs rgyas lngar yang bshad pa dang // rnam rig brgyad ni gaN+Di/ 
111a7(rgyud 'grel): su med// me long snang ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// ji ltar kun tu snang 'gyur ba// de bzhin na/ nyis med ye shes 'dir// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab// khams gsum dag ni thams cad du// 
111a8(rgyud 'grel): mye dang gnas pa'i rgyu rnams kyis// de kun gnyis med ye shes las// skye bo thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho ri dang shing dang ni// rtswa lcug ge la ba la sogs pa// gnyis med ye shes las 
111b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba// 'di la thatsam yang ma yin// pa dang ma yang gcig paste// 'di la gnyis yod ma yin na// gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin las// gzhan yang thams cad smra bar 'gyur// 'di ltar 
111b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang sbyor ba yis// shes rab gnyis med rang bzhin las// skye ba 'dir ni rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'phral du rnyed// ye shes dag gi rang bzhin mchog/ bla ma rgyad pa'i rim pa'i gzhung // 
111b3(rgyud 'grel): snyan nas spyan dang zhal nas zhal// bzang po'i zhal snga nam kyis gsungs// bzang po'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las// bsam med bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'di yi ma ni// sangs// 
111b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas nyid ni nges par thob// na mchog bi na'i zhal ldanas// in+d+rar+d+ha ta la bcas// sreg pa'i rdo rje 'gran de re// slob dpon pad+ma snying rje rje// chos kyi zhal pa'i drim pa las// bzang po'i zhal sa phrad 
111b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ thams cad kyi ni dgongs pa gcig/ sngags kyi smra ba ma lus dang // de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i lugs// mdo sde sde snod la sogs pa// 'dir gcig gnyis 
111b6(rgyud 'grel): med pade chen pos// mchod 'os zhi ba nyi ma sogs// so ma'i grub pa'i mtha' nyid dang // khyab 'jug dang ni shed bu'i chos// gnyis su med par bstan pa'o// gnyis med phyi rol yod min pas// 
111b7(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lha min tha ma ni// thams cad gnyis med ye shes las// so sor snang ba gsal bar 'gyur// stong pa'i bye brag tu phye ba// snying rje dang ni gnyis med 'dres// thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan// 
111b8(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rang bzhin kun bla ma// 'di ni bzang po'i zhal snga'i gzhung // ye shes rgya mtsho dam pa nyid// 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa lam// dam pa thams cad skye 'gyur zhing // tshangs pa khyab 'jug/ 
112a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug che// gang yang sangs rgyas sogs grags dang // nyi zla gza' skar bcas pa yang // ye shes rgya mtsho las byung zhing // legs smin dang ni dbyangs can nyid// ro ya 
112a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni myang ba dang // tshangs bcas lha min mi rnams ni// bdud rtsi las ni thams cad langs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa dge ba// bcu gsum du yang rnam bshad pa// gru gsum rnam par 'byung ba ni// 
112a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin chos kyi 'byung ba ni// 'dir chas kyi 'byung gnas brjid// D+hak+sha tshwa yis gang ba yis// shes rab gzugs ni cheng 'bar ba// de lam bad pa chen po kun// sangs kyis nyid ni ni 'byed pa/ 
112a4(rgyud 'grel): pad chen 'ang ba makyi ba nyid// de yi dbus na rnam par gnas// rtagatug sar bcas pa'i nang // A li kA li yang dge ldan// zla ba'i ma'i gos kyis bkab// shes rab dgu dang yang dag ldan// 'dzag 
112a5(rgyud 'grel): cing 'bar ba'i rnam pa nyid// thig la zla ba 'char ba'im chag/ dga' ba skyed byed bzang moste// ma lus don gyi 'bras ltang ma// dang ba'i bdud rtsi shin tu gang // ning bra rin chan mnyam par ldan/ 
112a6(rgyud 'grel): yon ta namatha' yas pa yi ga'i// bad dpal rnga rnga can gyi gnas// thams cad tshim par byed pa mo// 'byin byed skyed par byed pa mo// lhaye gzugs ni d+ha ma dag/ gnyis pad tu mtsholas ni 
112a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // chos dang longs rgya rdzogasu gzugs dang // rnal pa yini phra nyid kyis// sems can du makun gyi dang// phyogs bcu'i 'jig tan lalas rnams kyi// mtha' yas pathar blag zags

112b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i lta// mchog gi dbang phyug gnyis med pa// pad+mag sum du rang par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa' bang chen po// ma dang cha dang dbang chen dang // rlung gi rnam par brgyad pa nyid/

117a8(rgyud 'grel): ti thA ga nA yai/ ar+d+ha he sa mya kle bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM suSh+Te swaD+h+we/ sa mi ya pra sa ma ye/ shAn+te dAn+te/ sa ma ro pa/ a na a la ma pa/ pra ban pe ya sho ba ni ma hA te dzi ni ku pe/ ni nir b+ha na ka tshe ni/ sarba bud+d+ha ya

122b8(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yod dang med pa'i sbyor bas kyang // spangs pa gang zhig dri med pa// byang chub rang bzhin rtogs pa gang // de bzhin nyid de phyag 'tshal 'dud// de bzhin nyid ni shes 'dod 
123a1(rgyud 'grel): drag// rnam bcas ma yinanam med min// tha ma'i ngag gis ma brgyan pa'i// dbum 'ar 'bring ba tsa ma nyid do// dngas pa 'dini byang chub 'gyur// rmugs pa spangs pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ 
123a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa las ni chags med 'gyur// 'khrul pa'ang gnas pa med par 'dod// de nyid cin dngos rang bzhin// dngos po dngos med gang yin pa'o// dngos po med pa'ang dngos por 'gyur// rgyu dang 
123a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis// de ltar chos rnams ro gcig ste// thogs pa med cing gnas med par// ji lta ba yi ting 'dzin gyis// 'di dag thams cad 'od gsal te// ji lta ba yi ting 'dzin yang 
123a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'jug pa'i sems nyid kyis// gang phyir de yi gnas rig pas// de nyid rgyun mi 'chang las skyes// shes dang shes bya rnam bral ba'i// 'gro ba nyid ni gnyis med 'dod// gnyis dang bral 
123a5(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa yong // de ltar 'od gsal ba nyid do// de lta'i de nyid nges rtogs na// ji lnga de ltar gang den// rnal 'byor mig ni rgyas 'gyur bas// kun tu seng ge ji bzhin no// 'jig rten chos la rnam 
123a6(rgyud 'grel): log 'dis// smyon pa'i spyod pa la brten nas// bdag byin brlab pas rnam brgyan nas// dmigs pa med par thams cad byed// dri med de nyid gang bstan cing // gnyis su med par gang smras pa//

123b3(rgyud 'grel): du me ni grub pa med// de ni 'di dag brten nas 'byung // bdag gi bu bas sngar rmongs sam// 'o na de bu las rmongs par 'gyur// bu nyid la ni sngar zhen pa// de ni rdzas su yod ma yin// de

123b5(rgyud 'grel): ni 'jug par 'gyur// 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin dngos med// rkyen las byung bar rtogs pa'i phyir// ma skyes phyir na rang bzhin med// rkyen las byung ba mi 'gag nyid// dngos dang dngos med nyam / 
123b6(rgyud 'grel): pas na// zang du 'jug pa snang bar 'gyur// stong pa snying rje gcig gyur pa// rang gi rnyog pas byas pa min// stong pa nyid dang rab gsal ba// rang bzhin zung du 'jug pa nyid// rnam pa kun// 
123b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog rgyas ldan pa'o// zab mo gnyug ma'i snying po nyid// mngon sum rig pa sangs rgyas kyis// mchod pa legs sbyor byed pa yin// lus dang ngag dang sems kyis ni// rtag tu blo bzang rab
